T02D2663a:99b-0: sngags rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi sems so zhes gzhung @99b pas gsungs na /
T02D2663a:99b-1: byang chub kyi sems ni phung po dang /
T02D2663a:99b-7: bya ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:99b-8: kyi rang bzhin du yang ngo bo med par yin
T02D2663a:99b-9: la / sngags ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D2663a:99b-10: de ston par byed pa'i sgra dang yi ge'i 'bru rnams te /
T02D2663a:99b-16: mngon spyod pa'i las rnams kyi bya ba byed de /
T02D2663a:99b-17: de ltar mi mthun na de rnams ji ltar rig par bya zhe na /
T02D2663a:99b-19: de ni gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2663a:99b-20: spyad pa sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:99b-21: dpa' rnams gnas bcus rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te
T02D2663a:99b-22: byung ba bsgoms nas sngags tshul gyi rgyud du song
T02D2663a:99b-24: yang kun rdzob kyi chos rnams ni rig pas brtag mi bzod de /
T02D2663a:99b-25: don dam par stong ba'i rang bzhin yin mod kyi /
T02D2663a:99b-26: 'on kyang kun rdzob dang so so'i rgyu dang 'bras
T02D2663a:99b-27: bu nges pa'i bya ba rnams kyang byed par 'gyur
T02D2663a:99b-28: te / med ces byar mi rung ngo //
T02D2663a:99b-29: de ltar stong pa'i rang bzhin las kun rdzob yod
T02D2663a:99b-30: par snang ba ni sgyu ma la sogs pa dang
T02D2663a:99b-31: 'dra'o // de bzhin du sngags kyi rang bzhin yang
T02D2663a:99b-32: byang chub kyi sems de don dam par stong pa
T02D2663a:99b-33: 'dra'o // yin mod kyi / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D2663a:99b-34: sgrub pa po'i sbyor ba'i mthus grub pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2663a:99b-35: rnam pa sna tshogs kun du snang zhing myong bar
T02D2663a:99b-36: 'gyur te / de rnams kyang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dper bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2663a:99b-37: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang zhes
T02D2663a:99b-38: bya ba la sogs pa nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i
T02D2663a:99b-39: bdag po la las me'i mgal pa lag tu blangs
T02D2663a:99b-40: te bskor nas 'khor lor mthong mod kyi //
T02D2663a:99b-41: de bzhin du stong par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T02D2663a:99b-42: de la sgyu ma gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T02D2663a:99b-43: sman dang sngags su sbyor nas /
T02D2663a:99b-44: rnam pa sna tshogs yid dang mig slu ba'i dngos
T02D2663a:99b-45: po rnams sngon ma mthong ba rnams ston te de
T02D2663a:99b-46: yang phan tshun phyogs bcur 'dod pa yang yin no
T02D2663a:99b-48: sgyu ma ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:99b-49: phyir de bzhin du sngags kyi sbyor bas sbyor ba
T02D2663a:99b-50: las thams cad 'byung ngo zhes pa ni ji ltar
T02D2663a:100a-0: sgyu ma mkhan gyis sngags dang sman @100a * //
T02D2663a:100a-2: ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam
T02D2663a:100a-3: pa mang pos yid dang mig chags par byed par
T02D2663a:100a-4: snang ste / de rnams kyang ba lang dang rta
T02D2663a:100a-5: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin
T02D2663a:100a-6: snang ste / pas na / phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa'am 'dod pa yang med de /
T02D2663a:100a-7: 'on kyang de dag la ba lang la sogs pa'i bya ba yang byed do //
T02D2663a:100a-8: de bzhin du sngags kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems de stong pa nyid yin kyang /
T02D2663a:100a-9: sbyor ba las sngags kyi dngos grub sbyor ba sbyar
T02D2663a:100a-10: nas rab dang 'bring la sogs pa grub pa'i 'bras
T02D2663a:100a-11: bu rig 'dzin nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi
T02D2663a:100a-12: snang par 'gro ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna
T02D2663a:100a-13: tshogs su snang zhing myong bar byed do //
T02D2663a:100a-14: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po smig rgyu ba ni
T02D2663a:100a-15: yongs kyis stong pa nyid de yang ming tsam du
T02D2663a:100a-17: de bzhin du sngags 'di yang ming tsam du smos
T02D2663a:100a-18: te dpyad par brjod pa'o zhes pa ni de ltar
T02D2663a:100a-19: sngags kyi 'bras bu sgyu ma dang 'dra na sngags
T02D2663a:100a-20: kyi dngos bo ci zhig ce na /
T02D2663a:100a-22: ji ltar 'brog dgon pa na smig rgyu ba na
T02D2663a:100a-23: ma'i ma ri dags rnams kyis chur 'du shes skyes
T02D2663a:100a-24: te / de na chu yod pa ma yi na
T02D2663a:100a-25: yang smig rgyu ba de ji bzhin pa'i rnam par
T02D2663a:100a-26: shes pa bskyed cing skom pa yang chus de mos
T02D2663a:100a-28: de bzhin du sngags de yang dngos po yod pa yang ma yin /
T02D2663a:100a-29: 'du shes tsam du zad mod kyi /
T02D2663a:100a-30: 'on kyang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bskrun pa'i bya ba byed do //
T02D2663a:100a-31: de bzhin du yang gsang ba'i bdag po rmi lam
T02D2663a:100a-32: na yang nyin par dang skad cig dang yud tsam
T02D2663a:100a-33: dang cha shas tsam dang lo la sogs par bdag
T02D2663a:100a-34: nyid 'dug cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa
T02D2663a:100a-35: mang po myong ba mthong nas slar sad pa dang
T02D2663a:100a-37: de lta bur sngags 'di'i tshul yang rmi lam bzhin
T02D2663a:100a-38: du rig par bya'o zhes pa 'di sngar sngags bsgrubs
T02D2663a:100a-39: pa'i 'bras bu'i dpe sgyu ma las dpe blangs ba
T02D2663a:100a-40: de sgyu ma ni yun ring du 'dug pa ma
T02D2663a:100a-41: yin gyi skad cig yud tsam dag tu zad pas
T02D2663a:100a-42: sngags kyi 'bras bu ni bskal pa la sogs par
T02D2663a:100a-43: yun ring du 'dug na ji ltar dper rung zhe
T02D2663a:100a-44: na / rmi lam gyi dpes yun ring du gnas pa bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:100a-45: ji ltar rmi lam na yun gyi dngos po med
T02D2663a:100a-46: par skad cig dang nyi ma dang zhag dang lo
T02D2663a:100b-0: la sogs @100b pa yul rnams spyod cing bde ba
T02D2663a:100b-1: dang sdug bsngal ba rnam pa mang po myong zhing
T02D2663a:100b-3: de las sad na dngos po gang yang med do //
T02D2663a:100b-4: de ltar yang cis mngon zhe na /
T02D2663a:100b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las kyang gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:100b-6: ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na /
T02D2663a:100b-7: bdag las bu byung ste bu de skyes nas dga'
T02D2663a:100b-8: ba yang skyes de nas bu de shi ba yang
T02D2663a:100b-9: mthong ste / shi nas mi dga' ba yang skyes
T02D2663a:100b-10: par mthong bas de ltar rmi lam na yun ring
T02D2663a:100b-11: mthong ste / por srid do // de bzhin du
T02D2663a:100b-12: sngags bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu yang rang bzhin med pa
T02D2663a:100b-13: las sbyor bas sgrub na grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam
T02D2663a:100b-14: pa sna tshogs tshe rabs dang bskal pa la sogs
T02D2663a:100b-16: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po gzugs brnyan 'byung ba
T02D2663a:100b-17: bzhin du sngags kyi sgrub pa yang rtogs par bya'o
T02D2663a:100b-18: zhes pa ni de ltar sngags grub pa de rnams
T02D2663a:100b-19: dngos po med par yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
T02D2663a:100b-21: sgrub pa thams cad kyis ci'i phyir grub pa mi 'thob ce na /
T02D2663a:100b-22: ji ltar gzugs brnyan de rdo dang shing gzhan la
T02D2663a:100b-23: mi 'byung gi me long gi dkyil 'khor dag pa
T02D2663a:100b-25: de bzhin du sngags kyi sgrub pa de yang sgrub
T02D2663a:100b-26: ba po thams cad la mi 'byung gi gang byang
T02D2663a:100b-27: chub kyi sems bsgoms shing rgyud dag par gyur pa
T02D2663a:100b-29: gzhan yang gsang pa'i bdag bo grub pa'i sgrub gnas
T02D2663a:100b-30: ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bur ltos shig ces
T02D2663a:100b-31: pa ni / ji ltar dri za rnams kyi grong
T02D2663a:100b-32: khyer dri za de rnams kyis gang du bsams pa
T02D2663a:100b-33: der grong rdal byung du gyur te /
T02D2663a:100b-34: de bzhin du sngags kyi sgrub pa de yang bdag
T02D2663a:100b-35: nyid kyi lus rig 'dzin la sogs par grub pa'i
T02D2663a:100b-36: phyir sgrub kyi / gzhan gyi phyir ma grub kyang
T02D2663a:100b-37: nam rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub na lha'i gzhal
T02D2663a:100b-38: med khang dang dpag bsam gyi shing gi grib ma
T02D2663a:100b-39: dang shel gyi brag la bdud rtsi'i chu 'bab pa
T02D2663a:100b-40: phyir sgrub kyi / dang / rin po che'i gsing
T02D2663a:100b-41: ma la sogs pa'i gnas rnams bsams pa tsam gyis
T02D2663a:100b-43: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po brag ca bzhin du sngags kyi sgra yang rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:101a-0: sgra'i phyir brag ca 'byung ba yin te de bzhin du sngags kyi tshul rig par bya'o @101a * //
T02D2663a:101a-1: zhes pa ni ji ltar sgra'i rkyen gyis brag ca
T02D2663a:101a-2: 'byung bas dngos po yod pa ma yin kyang sgrar
T02D2663a:101a-3: 'byung ba de bzhin du yang sngags kyi sgrar yang
T02D2663a:101a-4: sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid mod kyi bsgrubs
T02D2663a:101a-5: pa'i rkyen gyis de 'byung ba de dper na brag
T02D2663a:101a-7: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po zla ba shar ba'i
T02D2663a:101a-8: gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung ba de ni zla
T02D2663a:101a-9: ba'i rang bzhin de nas mi gzhan no //
T02D2663a:101a-10: de bzhin du sngags sgrub pa'i rig 'dzin de yang
T02D2663a:101a-11: rig 'dzin gyi lus bzang po la sogs pa bsgrub
T02D2663a:101a-12: pa'i gzugs de las gzhan ma yin te gzugs de
T02D2663a:101a-14: 'on kyang rig 'dzin ces smos par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:101a-15: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po char 'bab pa chu
T02D2663a:101a-16: bur 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags kyi grub gnas
T02D2663a:101a-17: / rnam pa du mar sprul zhes grags //
T02D2663a:101a-18: zhes pa ni sngags gcig pu las grub pa'i 'bras
T02D2663a:101a-19: bu rnam pa mang po ji ltar 'gyur zhe na
T02D2663a:101a-20: / sngags de gcig pu yin yang grub pa'i 'bras
T02D2663a:101a-21: bu rnam pa mang po 'byung ba chu'i chu bur
T02D2663a:101a-23: ji ltar char 'bab pa na chu de gcig pu
T02D2663a:101a-24: las chu'i chu bur che phra la sogs pa rnam
T02D2663a:101a-25: pa mang po 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags gcig
T02D2663a:101a-26: pu las kyang 'grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du
T02D2663a:101a-27: ma 'byung ngo // gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po
T02D2663a:101a-28: yang sems can med cing srog kyang med pa'i mkhan
T02D2663a:101a-29: po yang yod pa ma yin /
T02D2663a:101a-30: dngos po kun kyang stong pa ste //
T02D2663a:101a-32: zhes pa ni de ltar sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid de sems can nam srog gam /
T02D2663a:101a-33: byed pa'i mkhan po med de stong pa nyid kyang
T02D2663a:101a-34: grub pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa kun snang ba
T02D2663a:101a-35: ni 'khrul par snang bar bsten pa'o //
T02D2663a:101a-36: gsang ba'i bdag po de ni theg pa chen po'i
T02D2663a:101a-37: gnas so zhes pa nas ma lus pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:101a-38: chen po 'byung ba 'di thams cad shes na sems
T02D2663a:101a-39: kyis rim pa de dag thams cad ji bzhin pa'i
T02D2663a:101a-40: de nyid rab tu shes so zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:101a-41: ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa
T02D2663a:101a-42: nyid chud pa de'i rjes su bsngags pa bshad pa
T02D2663a:101a-44: theg pa chen po'i gnas zhes pa ni byang chub
T02D2663a:101a-45: kyi sems de ji lta ba nyid du shes pa
T02D2663a:101a-46: ste theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2663a:101b-0: byang chub kyi sems @101b kyi gnas so zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i sems brgyad nas /
T02D2663a:101b-1: sa rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyi bar gyi rim pa de rnams rab tu shes so //
T02D2663a:101b-2: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gnas so zhes pa la /
T02D2663a:101b-3: mi mnyam pa ni nam mkha' ste /
T02D2663a:101b-4: nam mkha' de mtha' med pas ci dang yang mi mnyam pa'o //
T02D2663a:101b-5: nam mkha' gang dang yang mi mnyam pa dang /
T02D2663a:101b-6: de dang mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid de /
T02D2663a:101b-7: stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin de shes pa ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gnas so //
T02D2663a:101b-8: gdon mi za ba'i gnas zhes pa ni chos rnams
T02D2663a:101b-9: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du phyin ci ma
T02D2663a:101b-10: log par nges par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:101b-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas so
T02D2663a:101b-12: zhes pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663a:101b-13: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du chud pa de
T02D2663a:101b-14: bla na med pa'i byang chub dang tha mi dad
T02D2663a:101b-15: do // ro gcig pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:101b-16: mthar gyis theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i
T02D2663a:101b-17: gnas so zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663a:101b-18: snang mdzad kyi rgyu 'jig rten pa ngang 'jig rten
T02D2663a:101b-19: las 'das pa'i sems 'og ma rnams kyang /
T02D2663a:101b-20: sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems 'di'i nang du
T02D2663a:101b-21: 'dus las dang po nas kun du bzang po'i sa
T02D2663a:101b-22: man chad kyi sems kyang 'di las tha mi dad
T02D2663a:101b-23: pas na de rnams kyi gnas su gyur pas na
T02D2663a:101b-24: mthar gyis theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i
T02D2663a:101b-25: gnas zhes pa'o // ma lus pa'i ye shes 'byung
T02D2663a:101b-26: ba chen po 'di thams cad du shes na sems
T02D2663a:101b-27: kyis rim pa de thams cad ji lta ba nyid
T02D2663a:101b-28: du rab tu shes pa ni sa dang po'i byang
T02D2663a:101b-29: chub kyi sems de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:101b-30: 'byung ba'i gtso bo bsam lus pa'i ye shes 'byung
T02D2663a:101b-31: ba chen po zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:101b-32: de legs par shes pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2663a:101b-33: rgyu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyis rgyud thams
T02D2663a:101b-34: cad rab tu shes par gyur bar bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:101b-35: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub
T02D2663a:101b-36: pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems
T02D2663a:101b-37: kyi rgyud rim pa dang po'o /
T02D2663a:101b-39: // / da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663a:101b-40: kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas thams
T02D2663a:101b-41: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des mtha' yas pa'i sems
T02D2663a:102a-1: khams rnams tshul sna tshogs dang bsam pa sna tshogs
T02D2663a:102a-2: dang thabs sna tshogs kyis bla na med par bsgral
T02D2663a:102a-3: ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis lhun
T02D2663a:102a-4: gyis grub pa nyid du sku mnyam pa nyid mi
T02D2663a:102a-5: zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor los khams gsum thams cad
T02D2663a:102a-7: bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de /
T02D2663a:102a-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang /
T02D2663a:102a-9: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa yongs su dag
T02D2663a:102a-10: pa rnams kyis mngon sum du mthong zhing spyod yul
T02D2663a:102a-11: du gyur na / 'gro ba 'og ma rnams kyis
T02D2663a:102a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2663a:102a-13: de spyod yul du ma gyur te /
T02D2663a:102a-14: sems can de rnams kyi don du sku la sogs
T02D2663a:102a-15: pa'i 'khor lo de rnams dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang
T02D2663a:102a-16: phyag rgya la sogs par byin gyis brlabs par bcom
T02D2663a:102a-17: ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje sa gsol pas
T02D2663a:102a-18: 'chad de / gsol pa de yang de nas phyag
T02D2663a:102a-19: na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:102a-20: rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D2663a:102a-21: zhes pa nas deng yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying
T02D2663a:102a-22: rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba /
T02D2663a:102a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa na /
T02D2663a:102a-24: sems can mang po'i don dang /
T02D2663a:102a-25: phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sngags spyod
T02D2663a:102a-26: pa'i tshul de bshad du gsol zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:102a-27: ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid
T02D2663a:102a-28: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi dbyings
T02D2663a:102a-30: sems can gyi sa las 'das pa de thugs su
T02D2663a:102a-31: chud pa sku la sogs pa'i 'khor los sems can
T02D2663a:102a-32: gyi khams thams cad du khyab par sems can rnams
T02D2663a:102a-33: so so'i dang pa dang rjes su mthun pa so
T02D2663a:102a-34: so'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed /
T02D2663a:102a-35: rnam par sprul pa phyag na rdo rje ji ltar
T02D2663a:102a-36: mthong zhing chud pa de bcom ldan 'das la slar
T02D2663a:102a-37: bzlas te / gsol ba la bya ste ;
T02D2663a:102a-38: de ltar slar bzlas pa yang tshul gyis ston pas /
T02D2663a:102a-39: ci bshad pa rnams nyan pa pos mjal to bar slar mnyan na /
T02D2663a:102a-40: ston pa po yang spro la skabs 'og ma mtshams sbyar ba la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:102a-41: ngo mtshar che'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:102b-0: de ltar stong pa nyid brjod cing spyad pa las 'das pa chud @102b kyang ;
T02D2663a:102b-1: sku la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshul sna tshogs dang /
T02D2663a:102b-3: thabs sna tshogs su sprul pa de ngo mtshar che ba la bya'o //
T02D2663a:102b-4: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:102b-5: chos kyi dbyings bas ma gyis mi khyab pa de gzhan las mnyan te /
T02D2663a:102b-6: thugs su chud pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:102b-7: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis thugs su chud pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:102b-8: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje chen po'i snying rje 'byung ba /
T02D2663a:102b-9: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa na /
T02D2663a:102b-10: sems can mang bo'i don dang phan pa dang bde
T02D2663a:102b-11: bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sngags spyod pa'i tshul bshad du
T02D2663a:102b-12: gsol zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sku
T02D2663a:102b-13: la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de bdag cag gis chud
T02D2663a:102b-14: cing spyod yul du 'gyur na ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro
T02D2663a:102b-15: ba rnams kyi don du sku la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D2663a:102b-16: lo de rnams dkyil 'khor de'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i
T02D2663a:102b-17: sgo nas 'gro ba de rnams kyi spyod yul du
T02D2663a:102b-18: 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab pa'i gsol ba la bya
T02D2663a:102b-19: ste / snying rje chen po 'byung zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor chen po las 'byung ba la bya'o //
T02D2663a:102b-20: dkyil 'khor zhes ni 'og nas gzhung nyid las bshad do //
T02D2663a:102b-21: rgyal po zhes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i byang
T02D2663a:102b-22: chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun kyang
T02D2663a:102b-23: dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na
T02D2663a:102b-25: yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:102b-26: gyi sgo nas sgrub pa lha mnyes par bya ba'i
T02D2663a:102b-27: spyod yul ba rnam pa bcu drug gis bdag gi
T02D2663a:102b-28: lha mnyes par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i sgo nas
T02D2663a:102b-29: bslab pa'i yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs
T02D2663a:102b-30: su sbyang ba la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i lha mnyes
T02D2663a:102b-31: par bya ste / rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub
T02D2663a:102b-32: pa thob nas rim gyis sangs rgyas par 'grub pa
T02D2663a:102b-33: dang rang gi sems yongs su sbyangs pas mngon du
T02D2663a:102b-34: par bya ste / ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa spyad pa rdzogs nas /
T02D2663a:102b-35: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnyed par 'gyur ba
T02D2663a:102b-36: ni dkyil 'khor te yongs su rdzogs pa la bya'o
T02D2663a:102b-37: // ma 'ongs pa'i sems can mang po'i don dang
T02D2663a:102b-38: phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sngags sbyar
T02D2663a:102b-39: ba'i tshul de bshad du gsol /
T02D2663a:103a-1: 'ongs pa'i sems can de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yongs
T02D2663a:103a-2: su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D2663a:103a-3: kyi ye shes de thob pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor de
T02D2663a:103a-4: bshad du gsol lo zhes pa ste don gyi phyir
T02D2663a:103a-5: zhes pa ni / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don gyi phyir bya'o//
T02D2663a:103a-6: phan pa'i phyir zhes pa ni tshe phyi ma la phan pa'i phyir bya'o //
T02D2663a:103a-7: bde ba'i phyir zhes pa ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:103a-8: yang na don gyi phyir zhes pa ni phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir yang bya'o //
T02D2663a:103a-9: sngags spyad pa'i tshul zhes pa /
T02D2663a:103a-10: sngags kyi spyad pa ni dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa la sogs pa ste de dag nyid tshul lo //
T02D2663a:103a-11: tshul zhes pa ni rgya gar skad kyi gzhung dang sbyar na 'gro ba'am thob pa la bya ste /
T02D2663a:103a-12: sngags spyad pa des bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:103a-13: par 'gro ba'am thob pa de bshad du gsol zhes
T02D2663a:103a-14: pa'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663a:103a-15: mdzad 'khor de dag thams cad la gzigs nas zhes
T02D2663a:103a-16: pa ni 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de'i nang nas
T02D2663a:103a-17: g-yeng ba yod dam med pa dang /
T02D2663a:103a-18: snod du mi 'gyur ba'i nyan pa yod dam med brtag pa'i phyir gzigs pa la bya ste /
T02D2663a:103a-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor byang
T02D2663a:103a-20: chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa sha stag na
T02D2663a:103a-22: snod du mi 'gyur ba 'byung zhe na /
T02D2663a:103a-24: bcom ldan 'das 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
T02D2663a:103a-25: la g-yeng ba dang snod du mi 'gyur ba med
T02D2663a:103a-26: mod kyi / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos nyan
T02D2663a:103a-27: pa rnams la de lta bu srid pas de dag
T02D2663a:103a-28: la brtag pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:103a-29: phyag na rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:103a-30: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor spyad pa
T02D2663a:103a-31: bshad pa'i chos kyi gzhung nyon cig pa ni /
T02D2663a:103a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa'i rnam pa bcu drug bshad pa dang /
T02D2663a:103a-33: de bzhin du rim gyis sgrub pa'i sgo nas lha
T02D2663a:103a-34: mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa bzlas pa yan lag
T02D2663a:103a-35: bzhi dang / rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar byas pas lha mnyes par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:103a-36: rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa mngon du thob
T02D2663a:103a-37: nas rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs
T02D2663a:103a-38: su rdzogs par 'gyur bas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2663a:103b-0: ye shes yongs su rdzogs @103b pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes
T02D2663a:103b-1: bya'o // dkyil 'khor spyad ba zhes pa ni dkyil
T02D2663a:103b-2: 'khor bri ba la sogs pa'i spyad pa rnam pa
T02D2663a:103b-5: gzhung zhes pa ni ngon gyi dngos po gcig la
T02D2663a:103b-6: tshig mang po'i sgo nas dmigs bstan pa la bya
T02D2663a:103b-7: ste / de yang skabs 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba ni /
T02D2663a:103b-8: pha rol phyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur /
T02D2663a:103b-9: sngags spyad pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:103b-10: de bas na dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i tshul bshad pa'i chos kyi gzhung zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:103b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos
T02D2663a:103b-12: kyi dbyings kyi don ma rdzogs pas sems can gyi
T02D2663a:103b-13: khams ma lus par gdon par yi dam bcas nas
T02D2663a:103b-14: zhes pa nas / de dag byung nas phyogs bcu kun du bskor te /
T02D2663a:103b-15: slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la so
T02D2663a:103b-16: so'i gnas su slar zhugs so zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:103b-17: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du snying
T02D2663a:103b-18: rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir
T02D2663a:103b-19: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:103b-21: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa yang snying rje chen po
T02D2663a:103b-22: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slob dpon gyi ting
T02D2663a:103b-23: nge 'dzin 'di lta bu mngon du bya ste /
T02D2663a:103b-24: de nas sa tshon gyi gzugs kyi cha lugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshul bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:103b-25: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi don ma rdzogs pa zhes pa /
T02D2663a:103b-26: chos kyi dbyings ni stong pa nyid de /
T02D2663a:103b-27: de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
T02D2663a:103b-28: de'i don ni sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i
T02D2663a:103b-29: rgyan gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad kun du
T02D2663a:103b-31: sems can de rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral bar bya ste /
T02D2663a:103b-32: sems can de rnams kyang ma lus par ma bsgral ba ni don ma rdzogs pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:103b-33: sems can gyi khams ma lus par gdon par yi dam bcas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:103b-34: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi don de ma rdzogs par zad pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:103b-35: bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na thugs yid ma mdzad pa ni /
T02D2663a:103b-36: bdag gis byang chub thob nas sems can yang bsgral bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:104a-0: de bas na sems can gyi khams @104a * //
T02D2663a:104a-1: ma lus par gdon par yi dam bcas zhes so //
T02D2663a:104a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mol te zhes
T02D2663a:104a-3: pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da
T02D2663a:104a-4: ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams tshogs dang /
T02D2663a:104a-5: chos kyi sku 'gro ba'i don byed par sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ;
T02D2663a:104a-6: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad gsung gcig tu 'bad par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:104a-7: gnyis su na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mol te zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:104a-8: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid mngon du byas nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:104a-9: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mol
T02D2663a:104a-10: te zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba nga
T02D2663a:104a-11: rgyal can rnams nga rgyal bcag pa dang /
T02D2663a:104a-12: zhu blag mi byed pa rnams bla ma dang grogs
T02D2663a:104a-13: po la dri zhing zhu blag byed par brtson pa
T02D2663a:104a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang gzhan
T02D2663a:104a-16: dang bka' bgros mdzad cing chos ston na bdag cag
T02D2663a:104a-17: tshod lta ci zhig snyam nas nga rgyal bcag nas
T02D2663a:104a-18: gzhan la 'dri ba la brtson par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:104a-19: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung //
T02D2663a:104a-20: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2663a:104a-21: so zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin de las snying
T02D2663a:104a-22: rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'am snying rje chen
T02D2663a:104a-23: po ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba la bya'o //
T02D2663a:104a-24: ting nge 'dzin la zhugs ma thag tu /
T02D2663a:104a-25: bcom ldan 'das yan lag thams cad nas /
T02D2663a:104a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang po sems bskyed nas
T02D2663a:104a-27: sa bcu'i bar du sems can gyi don byed pa
T02D2663a:104a-28: 'byung ngo // de dag byung nas phyogs bcu kun
T02D2663a:104a-29: du bskor te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663a:104a-30: sku so so'i gnas su slar zhugs so zhes pa
T02D2663a:104a-31: ni bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa
T02D2663a:104a-32: 'byung ngo // de la / ba spu'i bu ga
T02D2663a:104a-33: re re nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dra
T02D2663a:104a-34: ba rnam par sprul pa 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:104a-35: sems can gyi don byed pa ni sa dang po
T02D2663a:104a-36: nas brtsams nas sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
T02D2663a:104a-37: ba'i phyir ro // de dag slar bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:104a-38: kyi sku la so so'i gnas su zhugs pa yang
T02D2663a:104a-39: ba'i phyir ro // / ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'i
T02D2663a:104a-40: mthus ba spu'i bu ga gang nas byung ba de
T02D2663a:104a-41: nyid du slar ma 'khrul par zhugs pa'o //
T02D2663a:104a-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D2663a:104a-43: phyag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor bri ba nyon cig
T02D2663a:104b-0: ces pa ni ting nge 'dzin de las @104b bzhengs
T02D2663a:104b-1: nas / phyag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor bshad pa la bya ste /
T02D2663a:104b-2: dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad pa de yang rgyu dang
T02D2663a:104b-3: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu rnam pa gsum du blta
T02D2663a:104b-4: ste / de la rgyu ni slob dpon no //
T02D2663a:104b-5: rang bzhin ni dkyil 'khor sa dpyad cing bri ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:104b-6: 'bras bu ni slob ma gzung zhing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:104b-7: de la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rgyu ni gtso bo ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
T02D2663a:104b-8: de bas na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid thog mar bshad do //
T02D2663a:104b-9: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad de /
T02D2663a:104b-10: slob dpon du 'jug pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2663a:104b-11: slob dpon du rdzogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2663a:104b-12: de rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2663a:104b-13: slob dpon du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub
T02D2663a:104b-14: kyi sems su song ba'i yid dang ldan pa la
T02D2663a:104b-15: sogs pa'o // slob dpon du rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni lung thob cing dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:104b-16: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:104b-17: de yang lus kyi yon tan dang /
T02D2663a:104b-18: ngag gi yon tan dang yid kyi yon tan dang gsum ste /
T02D2663a:104b-19: gar rigs par sbyor bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:104b-20: de la byang chub kyi sems su song ba'i yid
T02D2663a:104b-21: dang ldan zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang
T02D2663a:104b-22: skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams stong par 'jig
T02D2663a:104b-24: shes rab dang ldan zhes pa ni shes rab rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:104b-25: rang bzhin gyis shes rab rno ba dang /
T02D2663a:104b-27: bsam pa la sogs pa'i shes rab ste /
T02D2663a:104b-28: de dag gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:104b-29: snying rje can zhes pa ni snying rje ni sems can sdug bsngal ba las 'don pa ste /
T02D2663a:104b-30: de yang rang bzhin gyis snying rje can dang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i snying rje ste /
T02D2663a:104b-32: thabs la mkhas pa zhes pa ni sbyor ba 'jig
T02D2663a:104b-33: rten gyi sgra thabs la sogs pa rnam pa mang
T02D2663a:104b-34: ste / skabs 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02D2663a:104b-35: mchod pa'i yan lag rnams la mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:104b-36: rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul mkhas pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:104b-37: don dam pa dang kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mkhas te /
T02D2663a:104b-38: don dam par ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2663a:104b-39: phyin pa'i tshul thams cad thog ma nas ma byung
T02D2663a:104b-40: ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2663a:105a-1: rdzob tu ni de ltar shes rab stong pa nyid kyi bsgom pa las lang sa nas /
T02D2663a:105a-2: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad nas /
T02D2663a:105a-3: de la yang mi chags par 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul du sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663a:105a-4: theg pa gsum 'byed shes pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2663a:105a-5: nyan thos kyi theg pa gang zag bdag med par
T02D2663a:105a-6: chud nas phung po dang khams la sogs pa mi
T02D2663a:105a-7: rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med par chud pa dang /
T02D2663a:105a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phung po la sogs
T02D2663a:105a-9: pa de rnams kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:105a-10: rang bzhin du chud pa dang //
T02D2663a:105a-11: theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad thog ma nas
T02D2663a:105a-12: ma byung ma skyes par chud pa rnams kyis mtshan
T02D2663a:105a-13: nyid bye brag tu 'byed mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:105a-14: de la spyir theg pa gcig la gsum du dbyer ci yod ce na /
T02D2663a:105a-15: theg pa nyid gsum du dbye ba la ni mi bya'i /
T02D2663a:105a-16: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so sor ji
T02D2663a:105a-17: ltar chud pa'i mtshan nyid 'byed mkhas pa la bya'o
T02D2663a:105a-18: // sngags kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas pa
T02D2663a:105a-19: zhes pa ni sngags rnams spyi'i de kho na'i mtshan
T02D2663a:105a-20: nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D2663a:105a-21: de la mkhas pa dang sngags dang yi ge sa
T02D2663a:105a-22: bon dang ting nge 'dzin rnams la mkhas pa ste
T02D2663a:105a-23: / sngags la mkhas pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams bskul
T02D2663a:105a-24: ba dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin la 'byed mkhas pa'o
T02D2663a:105a-25: / // yi ge sa bon la mkhas pa ni /
T02D2663a:105a-26: lha rnams so so'i sa bon snying po gang yin pa dang /
T02D2663a:105a-27: de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang las gang yin pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663a:105a-28: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa ni ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa las dbang chen dang /
T02D2663a:105a-29: chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing de rnams kyis las bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663a:105a-30: bsam pa shes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi bsam pa shes pa ste /
T02D2663a:105a-31: de yang pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pa la ni mi bya'i /
T02D2663a:105a-32: sngags kyis cha brtags pa'i tshul gyis slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:105a-33: tshul la brtags na lha zhi ba dang khro bo rnams gang la bsnyen par 'os pa dang /
T02D2663a:105a-34: grub pa rab 'bring gsum las gang bsgrub par 'os pa la sogs pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663a:105a-35: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dad
T02D2663a:105b-0: pa @105b zhes pa ni de rnams kyi yon tan
T02D2663a:105b-1: la mos shing yid ches pa'o //
T02D2663a:105b-2: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las byed bar lung thob cing
T02D2663a:105b-3: dbang bskur zhes pa la dbang bskur ba ni dbang
T02D2663a:105b-4: bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du dri dang me tog dang
T02D2663a:105b-5: sman dang rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'i
T02D2663a:105b-6: bum par chu blugs te dbang bskur ba la bya
T02D2663a:105b-7: / lung thob pa ni de ltar dbang bskur nas
T02D2663a:105b-8: dkyil 'khor bri ba dang sgrub pa la spyod pa
T02D2663a:105b-9: khyod kyis gyis shig ces tshig gis gnang ba'o //
T02D2663a:105b-10: de la lung thob cing dbang bskur zhes pa dbang ma bskur bar lung mi thob ste /
T02D2663a:105b-12: ma smos kyang zhar la go bar 'gyur nas //
T02D2663a:105b-13: gnyis ka ci'i phyir smos she na /
T02D2663a:105b-14: gdon la sogs sel ba'i las phran tshogs la dbang
T02D2663a:105b-15: ma bskur kyang byos shig pa'i lung thob pa srid
T02D2663a:105b-16: kyi / de bas na lung thob cing dbang bskur zhes smos pa'o //
T02D2663a:105b-17: brtan pa zhes pa ni shes pa dang longs spyod

T02D2663a:105b-21: sbyor ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub
T02D2663a:105b-22: pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor

T02D2663a:105b-26: gsang ba'i bdag po slob dpon de lta bu dang
T02D2663a:105b-27: ldan pa de ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes
T02D2663a:105b-28: pa ste / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang bsngags so //
T02D2663a:105b-29: zhes pa la slob dpon de lta bu dang ldan pa dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:105b-30: gong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:105b-31: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa //

T02D2663a:105b-34: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la mos pa las
T02D2663a:105b-35: byung ba ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa
T02D2663a:105b-36: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:105b-37: rnams kyis bsngags so zhes pa ni de lta bu'i
T02D2663a:105b-38: yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob dpon de ni sangs
T02D2663a:105b-39: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags so
T02D2663a:105b-40: zhes bya'o // // de ltar slob dpon de sangs
T02D2663a:105b-41: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags na
T02D2663a:105b-42: mi bsngags pa'i slob dpon yod dam zhe na yod
T02D2663a:106a-0: zhes bya'o // // de / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems @106a * //
T02D2663a:106a-1: dpa' rnams kyis bsngags so zhes pa'i tshig des slob dpon rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:106a-2: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa can no //
T02D2663a:106a-3: de la skabs 'dir slob dpon yon tan de lta
T02D2663a:106a-4: bu dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D2663a:106a-5: dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa ni zab cing rgya che
T02D2663a:106a-7: dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni
T02D2663a:106a-8: 'og nas slob dpon gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i
T02D2663a:106a-10: da ni slob dpon de lta bus 'khor gzung ba'i slob ma rnams brtag par bya ste /
T02D2663a:106a-11: slob ma de rnams brtag pa yang rang bzhin gyi
T02D2663a:106a-12: yon tan dang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i yon tan
T02D2663a:106a-14: de bas na gsang ba'i bdag po slob dpon de

T02D2663a:106a-16: 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob
T02D2663a:106a-17: ma rnams kyis gsol ba btab kyang rung zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:106a-18: // yang na sems can gyi snod du 'gyur ba'i dri ma med pa mthong ba na /
T02D2663a:106a-19: rang gis bskul ma btab ste /
T02D2663a:106a-20: shes pa la snod du 'gyur zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i snod du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663a:106a-21: dri ma med ces pa ni sdig pa med pa ste /
T02D2663a:106a-22: de la sdig pa ni sems kyi rgyud la yod de /
T02D2663a:106a-23: ji ltar slob dpon des mthong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2663a:106a-24: sems kyi rgyud de la gnas pa'i sdig pa med
T02D2663a:106a-25: par mthong ba la ni mi bya'i sdig pa'i rgyu
T02D2663a:106a-26: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi spyod par
T02D2663a:106a-27: mthong ba ni sdig pa med par mthong ba'o //
T02D2663a:106a-28: de lta bu'i slob ma mthong na phas ma gsol kyang /
T02D2663a:106a-29: slob ma de'i snod du 'gyur ba yin pas 'og
T02D2663a:106a-30: nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas chos bshad cing
T02D2663a:106a-31: sngags kyi tshul la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2663a:106a-32: mang du mos pa zhes pa ni sa dang pha
T02D2663a:106a-33: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom
T02D2663a:106a-34: ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyis chos rnams ma chud
T02D2663a:106a-35: cing mngon du ma byas kyang mnyan pa dang bsgom
T02D2663a:106a-36: pa'i sgo nas 'di nyid yin gyi gzhan ma yin
T02D2663a:106a-37: no zhes pa ni mos pa mang ba'o //
T02D2663a:106a-38: bstan zhes pa ni gong du slob dpon gyis bstan pa nyid bshad pa dang mthun no //
T02D2663a:106a-39: dad pa zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la yid ches pa ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D2663a:106b-0: sngags byed pa'i tshul la yid ches @106b pa'i dad pa'o //
T02D2663a:106b-1: gzhan la phan par dga' zhes pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2663a:106b-2: gzhan sdug bsngal ba las bral bar dga' ba de
T02D2663a:106b-3: lta bu dang ldan pa'i slob mar shes shing mthong
T02D2663a:106b-4: na / rang gis bskul mar btab ste zhes pa
T02D2663a:106b-5: gong du smos pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang
T02D2663a:106b-6: ldan par mthong nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:106b-7: bos pa la 'di skad ces smros shig ces pa
T02D2663a:106b-8: ni gal te slob ma de bdag cag sngags grub
T02D2663a:106b-9: pa'i 'bras bu zhig rig 'dzin la sogs pa 'dod
T02D2663a:106b-11: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod do snyam du sems pa la /
T02D2663a:106b-12: sngags kyi sgo nas bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2663a:106b-13: thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos shod cig ces pa'o
T02D2663a:106b-14: // bu 'di theg pa chen po ste //
T02D2663a:106b-15: sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga yin //
T02D2663a:106b-16: khyod la yang dag bshad kyis su //
T02D2663a:106b-17: khyod kyang tshul chen snod du 'gyur //
T02D2663a:106b-18: zhes pa ni sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di theg pa chen po'o //
T02D2663a:106b-19: de yang khyod la yang dag par bshad pa ni ;
T02D2663a:106b-20: khe dang bkur sti'i phyir bshad pa ma yin gyi
T02D2663a:106b-21: slob ma de snod du 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad pa'o
T02D2663a:106b-22: // 'das pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2663a:106b-23: gang rnams phyis kyang byon pa dang //
T02D2663a:106b-24: da ltar mgon po de rnams kyang //
T02D2663a:106b-25: 'gro rnams don phyir bzhugs pa yang //
T02D2663a:106b-28: ma byon pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sngags spyad pa'o //
T02D2663a:106b-29: tshul dam pa 'di las byang chub kyi shing drung
T02D2663a:106b-30: du bdud rnam bzhi bcom nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2663a:106b-32: de bas na slob ma khyed rnams kyis kyang tshul
T02D2663a:106b-33: dam pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:106b-34: thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:106b-35: de bas na gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:106b-36: de dag kun gyis dam pa ni //
T02D2663a:106b-37: sngags gtso bo mchog mkhyen pas na //
T02D2663a:106b-38: bstan pa thams cad mkhyen thob pa //
T02D2663a:106b-39: byang chub drung du mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T02D2663a:106b-40: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pas //
T02D2663a:106b-41: stobs can rnams kyang bcom pa ni //
T02D2663a:106b-42: bdud sde shin tu ma rungs rnams //
T02D2663a:106b-43: sh'akya seng ge mgon po yis //
T02D2663a:106b-44: de bas blo can bus 'di ltar //
T02D2663a:106b-45: thams cad mkhyen ni thob par gyis //
T02D2663a:106b-47: de dag kun gyis zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:106b-50: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:107a-1: chub drung du mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T02D2663a:107a-2: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi shing drung du thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan ma med pa thob pa'o //
T02D2663a:107a-3: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pa'o //
T02D2663a:107a-4: zhes pa ni gang dang yang mi mnyam pa'i sngags
T02D2663a:107a-5: kyi sbyor ba des thams cad mkhyen pa thob par
T02D2663a:107a-7: de bas blo can bus 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen
T02D2663a:107a-8: pa ni thob par gyis shig pa ni de ltar
T02D2663a:107a-9: sh'akya seng ges kyang sngags spyad pa'i sgo nas thams
T02D2663a:107a-11: khyod kyis kyang 'di'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis shig ces bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:107a-12: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa thob par yang /

T02D2663a:107a-14: par mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa gzhan yang

T02D2663a:107a-18: yod mod kyi / to // de bzhin sngags mkhan

T02D2663a:107a-20: gyis slob ma de mang du spro ba skyed cig

T02D2663a:107a-23: ma yin gyi slob ma de dag la snying rje'i
T02D2663a:107a-24: yod mod kyi / to // ces pa'o // phyir ro // slob ma de brtan gyur rig nas //
T02D2663a:107a-25: zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams de ltar gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis yid ches te /
T02D2663a:107a-26: gzhan du mi 'gyur bar gyur nas slob ma de
T02D2663a:107a-27: dag gis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa rnams brtag par
T02D2663a:107a-28: bya ste / de yang sa nyid kyi yon tan
T02D2663a:107a-29: gyis dga' ba dang 'phags pa rnams kyis bcag pas
T02D2663a:107a-30: bya ste / dga' ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba dang /
T02D2663a:107a-31: sngags mkhan nyid gang du dad pas dga' ba'o //
T02D2663a:107a-32: de la sa nyid kyi yon tan gyis dga' ba'i
T02D2663a:107a-33: gnas dri dang me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i ri
T02D2663a:107a-34: gtsang zhing dga' ba'i chu 'gram zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:107a-35: gang na chu bo mang po rnams //
T02D2663a:107a-36: ngang pa'i chu bya mang brgyan pa //
T02D2663a:107a-37: de ru sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02D2663a:107a-38: snying rjes byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2663a:107a-40: sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:107a-41: sa phyogs thub pas bde bar bsngags //
T02D2663a:107a-42: zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa rnams kyis zhabs kyis bcags pas dga' ba la bya'o //
T02D2663a:107a-43: gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi //
T02D2663a:107a-44: phyogs rab bzang dang gtsug lag khang //
T02D2663a:107b-1: lha rnams kun gyi gnas rnams dang //
T02D2663a:107b-2: khyim stong rnams su de bzhin te //
T02D2663a:107b-3: dkyil 'khor nan tan du bris shig / slob ma rnams la phan pa 'dod //
T02D2663a:107b-4: ces pa'i bar du ni lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba'o //
T02D2663a:107b-5: yang na ni yid du gar 'ong bar yang rung ste /

T02D2663a:107b-7: gzhan pa'i sa sngags pa nyid gang du dad pa der dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs so //
T02D2663a:107b-8: de bsal ba'i rnam pa bya ste zhes pa ni bsal ba rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:107b-10: de bas na slob dpon la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:107b-11: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa can no //
T02D2663a:107b-12: de la zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i
T02D2663a:107b-13: slob dpon gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas
T02D2663a:107b-14: phyi'i nyes pa rnams kyi dngos po thog ma nas
T02D2663a:107b-15: ma byung ma skyes par chud de /

T02D2663a:107b-17: zug rdu la sogs pa bsal mi dgos mod kyi

T02D2663a:107b-23: byang chub kyi sems goms par ma byas pas phyi'i
T02D2663a:107b-25: de la nang gi sa sbyang ba ni /
T02D2663a:107b-26: byang chub kyi sems goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:107b-27: phyi'i sbyang ba ni rdo dang gyo mo dang sa

T02D2663a:107b-31: tshes grangs dang nyi ma zhes pa nas snga dro'i
T02D2663a:107b-32: dus na ltas bzang por brtags te zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663a:107b-33: du ni dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sa brtag pa'i tshad
T02D2663a:107b-34: do // yongs su bzung ba rtsom pa'i tshes grangs
T02D2663a:107b-35: dang skar ma shis pa zhes pa ni skar ma
T02D2663a:107b-36: 'ba' zhig shis ba la mi bya'i /

T02D2663a:107b-38: snga dro'i dus la ltas bzang por brtags na zhes
T02D2663a:107b-39: pa ni ltas bzang por brtags pa rab 'bring rnam
T02D2663a:107b-40: pa gsum ste / lha'i dang bar snang gi dang sa las byung ba'o //
T02D2663a:107b-41: de la lha'i nam mkha' las sgra snyan la sogs pa 'byung ste mchog go //
T02D2663a:108a-0: bar snang gi ni bkra shis kyi tshig dang bram @108a * //
T02D2663a:108a-1: ze'i smrang la sogs pa thob ste 'bring ngo //
T02D2663a:108a-2: sa las 'byung ba ni dung la sogs pa sa la 'dug pa mthong ste tha ma'o //
T02D2663a:108a-3: de ltar thog mar rtsom pa la snga dro'i dus
T02D2663a:108a-4: na ltas de rnams las gang yang rung ba cig
T02D2663a:108a-5: byung na bzang ste sa yongs su gzung ba la
T02D2663a:108a-6: sogs pa'i las rnams brtsam par bya'o //

T02D2663a:108a-8: gnyis sgrogs par bya'o zhes pa de ltar snga dro'i
T02D2663a:108a-9: dus na ltas bzang po dang ldan na dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:108a-10: gang du bri bar bya ba'i sa gzhi der sa'i
T02D2663a:108a-11: lha mo la khyod kyi steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:108a-12: bri'o zhes gsol ba btab ste yang bstod pa'i tshigs
T02D2663a:108a-13: su bcad pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2663a:108a-15: dpang du lha mo khyod gyur ba //
T02D2663a:108a-16: skyob pa sangs rgyas kun gyi ste //
T02D2663a:108a-17: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
T02D2663a:108a-18: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sa dang
T02D2663a:108a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis tshul khyad par

T02D2663a:108a-24: lha mo khyod kyis ji lta ba nyid shes te dpang du gyur to zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:108a-26: spyad pa'i tshul gyis spyad par ni //
T02D2663a:108a-27: pha rol phyin pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2663a:108a-28: ji ltar bdud dmag mang bcom pa //
T02D2663a:108a-29: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2663a:108a-31: de bzhin bdag gis bdud btul nas //
T02D2663a:108a-33: zhes pa ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub
T02D2663a:108a-34: pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad

T02D2663a:108a-37: pa de bzhin du bdag kyang ma lus pa'i sems

T02D2663a:108a-40: rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes pa'o //

T02D2663a:108a-43: pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas der spos dang
T02D2663a:108a-44: me tog gis mchod nas bsngags pa'i sa de bzhin
T02D2663a:108a-45: gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal cig ces sa'i lha

T02D2663a:108a-48: pa rnams dang lha mo de la mchod cing phyag
T02D2663a:108b-0: pa yang / @108b byas la / lag pa sa

T02D2663a:108b-2: bcad pas bskul te gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2663a:108b-3: de 'og tu tshul bzhin mkhas pas sa rnams tshol
T02D2663a:108b-4: cig ces pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2663a:108b-5: btsal bar bya'o // de nas phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2663a:108b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te
T02D2663a:108b-7: btsal bar bya'o // / bcom ldan 'das la 'di
T02D2663a:108b-8: skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni dus dang yul
T02D2663a:108b-9: dang las byed pa yang dge ba dang mi dge
T02D2663a:108b-10: ba'i ltas rnams la smras pa rnams kyis 'bras bur
T02D2663a:108b-11: 'dzin pa chos 'di mi shes pa'i phyir du'o //
T02D2663a:108b-12: de dag don phyir sems dpa'i bar du gong du
T02D2663a:108b-13: nyi ma tshes grangs dang skar ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:108b-14: ltas rnams bshad pa sngags rnams kyi rang bzhin no

T02D2663a:108b-18: mod kyi don gyi bya ba byed pa ste /
T02D2663a:108b-19: skar ma dang tshes grangs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'di rnams ni don dam pa dang 'gal /
T02D2663a:108b-20: kun rdzob tu don gyi bya ba ma yin na /
T02D2663a:108b-21: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de dag bshad ces gsol ba dang /
T02D2663a:108b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin mod kyi /
T02D2663a:108b-23: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyis don dam pa'i
T02D2663a:108b-24: tshul de mi shes pa de 'gro ba de rnams
T02D2663a:108b-25: bkri ba'i phyir / mtshan ma rnams bshad pa'i rigs pa bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:108b-26: 'gro ba de rnams la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:108b-27: dngos po la chags pa dang /
T02D2663a:108b-28: dngos po med pa la chags pa'o //
T02D2663a:108b-29: dngos po la chags pa rnams la yang tshes grangs
T02D2663a:108b-30: dang dus dang yul la sogs pa'i dngos pos rjes
T02D2663a:108b-31: su mthun par bshad cing bkri ba dang /
T02D2663a:108b-32: dngos po med pa la chags pa rnams kyang de las zlog ste /
T02D2663a:108b-33: dngos po'i sgo nas bkri ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:108b-34: mtshan mar bral ba sangs rgyas te ;
T02D2663a:108b-35: / zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:108b-36: chos kyi sku la rnam par zhugs pa zhes pa
T02D2663a:108b-37: ni de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2663a:108b-38: dang bral ba sa dmigs su med pa'i chos kyi
T02D2663a:109a-0: sku'o // de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gyur pa @109a * //
T02D2663a:109a-1: ni chos kyi sku la rnam par zhugs zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:109a-2: gsang ba'i bdag po de nas ji lta bur bshad
T02D2663a:109a-3: pa'i gnas la gcig tu snyoms la rdungs shig ces
T02D2663a:109a-4: pa nas bdag kyang yid la spro ba dang /
T02D2663a:109a-5: yang na ji ltar mthong ba yang rung bu (dpe gnyis la byung/) dge'o //
T02D2663a:109a-6: sems dpa' chen po khyod myur du dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2663a:109a-7: shig ces pa'i bar du zhag bdun gyi sngon rol
T02D2663a:109a-9: mi snang ba la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa bslang ste /
T02D2663a:109a-10: de la snang ba ni rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi rnams so //
T02D2663a:109a-11: mi snang ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha dang /
T02D2663a:109a-13: sha za la sogs pa ste lha la sogs pa
T02D2663a:109a-14: la ma bslangs par dkyil 'khor bris na dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:109a-15: gyi lha khro bo la sogs pa'i zer gyis 'jig
T02D2663a:109a-16: rten pa'i lha de rnams la gnod par 'gyur te
T02D2663a:109a-17: / de ltar gnod par gyur na /
T02D2663a:109a-18: lha de dag sgrub pa la bgegs kyi skabs tshol bar 'gyur /
T02D2663a:109a-19: gnyis su ni de dag la gnod bzhin du dkyil
T02D2663a:109a-20: 'khor bris na sgrub pa snying rje med par 'gyur
T02D2663a:109a-21: te / de bas na de dag la stsal ba'i
T02D2663a:109a-22: phyir sngar lha la sogs pa rnams spran zhing sa
T02D2663a:109a-23: te / blangs te / lha la sogs pa de
T02D2663a:109a-24: rnams kyang bag byed cing de nas gzhan du 'dong
T02D2663a:109a-25: ste nyes pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:109a-26: rgyal po la sogs pa mi rnams la yang /
T02D2663a:109a-27: sa slar bslang ba ni phyis brtsad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:109a-28: der slar bslangs nas phyis dkyil 'khor bri ba las
T02D2663a:109a-29: zhag gsum gyi sngon rol du ji skad du smos
T02D2663a:109a-30: pa'i sa der / ji ltar rigs par brtags nas yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2663a:109a-31: thog mar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba dang /
T02D2663a:109a-32: ba'i gcin du bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor bya /
T02D2663a:109a-33: de nas sa de sngags kyis bsrung bar bya /
T02D2663a:109a-34: de nas phyogs mtshams kun du bgegs bsal bar bya /
T02D2663a:109a-35: de'i 'og tu dri'i dkyil 'khor rnams gru bzhi la sor bcu gnyis par byed de /
T02D2663a:109a-36: de nas sngags pa 'grengs te dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi nam mkha' la sangs rgyas bsam par bya'o //
T02D2663a:109a-37: de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams sdud par 'gyur pa ste /
T02D2663a:109a-38: dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings nas bsam mo //
T02D2663a:109a-39: sngags pa 'grengs te bsam pa ni mi gnas par ston pa ste /
T02D2663a:109a-40: sangs rgyas lnga rnams nam mkha' la bsam pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:109b-0: @109b de nas der dri dang me tog la sogs
T02D2663a:109b-1: pas mchod de sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'phags pa
T02D2663a:109b-2: mi g-yo ba'am / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'am
T02D2663a:109b-3: gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis sa de yongs su
T02D2663a:109b-4: mi g-yo ba'am / gzung bar bya'o // de nas
T02D2663a:109b-5: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas par slob ma rnams dkyil
T02D2663a:109b-6: 'khor du gzud pa'i nub mor gshegs su gsol ba'o
T02D2663a:109b-7: mi g-yo ba'am / gzung bar bya'o // // de
T02D2663a:109b-8: nas sngags pa de nub phyogs kyi ngos su nyal
T02D2663a:109b-9: la byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje ldan par
T02D2663a:109b-10: mi g-yo ba'am / gzung bar bya'o // // bya ste / rmi lam bltas te /
T02D2663a:109b-11: de yang rab 'bring gsum du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:109b-12: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong na rmi lam tha ma'o //
T02D2663a:109b-14: sangs rgyas de rnams shin tu spro zhing sngags pa la bu khyod dge'o //
T02D2663a:109b-15: dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces bskul ma 'debs
T02D2663a:109b-16: par mthong na rmi lam rab tu shes par bya'o
T02D2663a:109b-17: // 'di rnams kyang rgyud nyid kyi nang nas zhib tu 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:109b-18: rgyud kyi nang nas ltag 'og tu 'byung bas 'dir
T02D2663a:109b-19: las su bya ba'i rim pa bzhin du bkod do
T02D2663a:109b-20: // dad pa rigs btsun las byung ba //
T02D2663a:109b-21: zhes pa nas gnyis sam gcig bzhi las mang yang
T02D2663a:109b-22: sla'o zhes pa'i bar du ni slob ma rnams brtags
T02D2663a:109b-24: de yang bye brag gi mtshan nyid rab tu byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2663a:109b-25: de la 'dir dad pa rigs btsun pa las byung
T02D2663a:109b-26: ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad
T02D2663a:109b-27: du smos pa rnams bye brag gi mtshan nyid do
T02D2663a:109b-28: // rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02D2663a:109b-29: phal pa'i mtshan nyid ni gong du ji skad du
T02D2663a:109b-30: smos pa'i grangs las gzhan pa ste 'og nas 'byung
T02D2663a:109b-31: ba mod kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang
T02D2663a:109b-32: ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus par yi
T02D2663a:109b-33: dam bca'o // de byang chub kyi sa bon gyi
T02D2663a:109b-34: rgyu'i phyir 'di ltar tshad med pa'i sems can yongs
T02D2663a:109b-35: su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:109b-36: slob ma de rnams la yang rgyud la sogs pa
T02D2663a:109b-37: la mkhas shing byang chub kyi sems goms pa ni
T02D2663a:109b-38: dkyil 'khor du bcug pa de nyid kyi tshe na
T02D2663a:109b-39: de slob dpon nam sgrub par dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2663a:109b-40: // rgyud la sogs pa rnams la ni mkhas kyang /
T02D2663a:109b-41: byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms pa na /
T02D2663a:109b-42: byang chub kyi sems sgom du bcug ste phyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:110a-0: de las gzhan phal rnams kyis ni rgyud kyang @110a * //
T02D2663a:110a-2: byang chub kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms phyis kyang shes par mi 'gyur /
T02D2663a:110a-3: byang chub kyi sems kyang mi sgom pa ni phal rnams te /
T02D2663a:110a-4: dus gnyis kar yang dbang mi bskur gyi /
T02D2663a:110a-5: byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du gzung ngo //
T02D2663a:110a-7: dad pa rigs btsun las byung ba //
T02D2663a:110a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni gong du
T02D2663a:110a-9: slob ma'i mtshan nyid smos par bshad zin pas 'dir
T02D2663a:110a-10: ma smos so // bcu'am brgyad dam bdun kyang rung //
T02D2663a:110a-11: gnyis sam gcig bzhi las mang sla'o //
T02D2663a:110a-12: zhes pa ni ji skad du smos pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:110a-13: ldan pa'i slob ma ni shin tu dkon pas grangs
T02D2663a:110a-15: mang yang sla zhes pa ni mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan pa dkon pa ste /
T02D2663a:110a-16: brgya la de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
T02D2663a:110a-17: yod na grangs ma mchis pa de las lhag na
T02D2663a:110a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2663a:110a-20: yang dris pa nas byang chub kyi sa bon gyi
T02D2663a:110a-21: rgyu'i phyir 'di ltar tshad med pa'i sems can yongs
T02D2663a:110a-22: su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa'i bar du gong du
T02D2663a:110a-23: slob ma'i grangs nges par bshad pa ci'i phyir 'chad
T02D2663a:110a-24: ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba
T02D2663a:110a-25: dang / de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la bya ste /
T02D2663a:110a-26: ci'i phyir slob ma rnam grangs nges par bshad ces
T02D2663a:110a-27: dri bar dgongs pa la dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming gi
T02D2663a:110a-28: ji ltar dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi zhes ji ltar dris
T02D2663a:110a-29: she na / de'i dgongs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D2663a:110a-30: de skad dris na dkyil 'khor gyi nges pa'i tshig dang /
T02D2663a:110a-31: dmigs pa brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2663a:110a-32: slob ma'i grangs nges pa gsum char 'dris par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:110a-33: de la dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi dmigs bstan par bya ba dris pa'o //
T02D2663a:110a-34: ji ltar na dkyil 'khor zhes dris pa ni nges pa'i tshig dris pa'o //
T02D2663a:110a-35: dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste //
T02D2663a:110a-36: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
T02D2663a:110a-37: sangs rgyas 'byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams kyang srid /
T02D2663a:110a-38: sems can gyi byed pa yang yod de /
T02D2663a:110a-39: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'di las kyang sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:110a-40: kyi chos rnams kyang srid cing sems can gyi don
T02D2663a:110a-41: bya ba yang 'phral du byang chub kyi sems bskyed
T02D2663a:110b-0: pa dang / rim gyis @110b mchog la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:110b-1: grub pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams
T02D2663a:110b-2: byed pa yod cing mthar sangs rgyas par 'gyur bar
T02D2663a:110b-4: dkyil zhes bya ba ni snying po'o //
T02D2663a:110b-5: 'khor zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:110b-6: mar gyi snying po'am tsandan gyi snying po dang 'dra
T02D2663a:110b-7: ste mchog dam pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:110b-8: mar dang tsandan gyi snying po de dag la ni mchog pa'am rdzogs pa med kyang srid /
T02D2663a:110b-9: de dag dang 'dra ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2663a:110b-11: de las kyang khyad par du gsungs pa khyab pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:110b-12: khyab pa ni mchog pa'am yongs su rdzogs pa'i don to //
T02D2663a:110b-13: dkyil 'khor 'di snying po mchog pa'am rdzogs pa zhes pa ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
T02D2663a:110b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags nas /
T02D2663a:110b-15: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:110b-16: kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas
T02D2663a:110b-17: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
T02D2663a:110b-18: rgyas pa ni snying por gyur pa mchog dam pa
T02D2663a:110b-19: ste / mchog de las gzhan pa btsal mi dgos
T02D2663a:110b-20: par des chog ste mi 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs
T02D2663a:110b-21: ste / pa'o // gang bla na med pa'i byang
T02D2663a:110b-22: chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa mi 'gyur ba
T02D2663a:110b-24: de nyid sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku
T02D2663a:110b-25: la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lor
T02D2663a:110b-26: gyur pa dkyil 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs pas na
T02D2663a:110b-27: / dkyil 'khor 'di'i snying po mchog pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:110b-28: gsang ba'i bdag po 'on kyang sems can gyi khams
T02D2663a:110b-29: ma nges pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir snying
T02D2663a:110b-30: rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2663a:110b-32: zhes pa sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs
T02D2663a:110b-33: su bskyang ba'i phyir zhes pa ni snying rje chen
T02D2663a:110b-34: po'i dbang gis tshad med pa'i sems can gyi khams
T02D2663a:110b-35: rnams dkyil 'khor 'dir btsud na bla med byang chub
T02D2663a:110b-36: kyi rgyur 'gyur bas kyang bskyang ba'i phyir zhes gsungs
T02D2663a:110b-37: so // snying rje chen po 'byung zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:110b-38: dkyil 'khor 'di snying rje chen po la 'byung ba ste /
T02D2663a:110b-39: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes
T02D2663a:110b-40: nas snying rje chen po 'di'i dbang gis sku la
T02D2663a:110b-41: sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo 'di
T02D2663a:110b-42: 'byung bas na snying rje chen po 'byung zhes bya'o
T02D2663a:111a-2: snying rje chen po de dkyil 'khor de 'byung ba'i gnas so //
T02D2663a:111a-3: yang na dkyil 'khor 'di las snying rje chen po 'byung ba la yang bya ste /
T02D2663a:111a-4: dkyil 'khor 'di'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
T02D2663a:111a-5: tan gyi chos snying rje chen po la sogs pa
T02D2663a:111a-6: 'byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
T02D2663a:111a-8: dkyil 'khor 'phel ba'o zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dir
T02D2663a:111a-9: btsud pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams 'phel ba'i phyir
T02D2663a:111a-10: ro // gnyis su na dkyil 'khor nyid snam bu la sogs pa rim pa 'phel ba ste /
T02D2663a:111a-12: 'on kyang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya mod kyi /
T02D2663a:111a-13: 'di rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ming 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:111a-14: gsang ba'i bdag po gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis grangs med pa'i bskal par bskyed pa /
T02D2663a:111a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2663a:111a-16: chub par byin gyis brlabs pa ste zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:111a-18: gang de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par
T02D2663a:111a-19: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags nas bla
T02D2663a:111a-20: na med pa'i byang chub thob pa de nyid sngags
T02D2663a:111a-21: kyi lha dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyi 'bru rnams
T02D2663a:111a-22: su lhag par gnas par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes
T02D2663a:111a-23: bstan pa'o // des na gsang ba'i bdag po gzhung 'di ltar rig par bya ste zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:111a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa grangs med par
T02D2663a:111a-25: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas thams
T02D2663a:111a-27: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku la sogs
T02D2663a:111a-28: pa mi zad pa'i rgyan sems can gyi khams ma
T02D2663a:111a-29: lus pa la byin gyis rlob ste /
T02D2663a:111a-30: sems can gyi khams gcig gam gnyis la ma yin
T02D2663a:111a-31: pa de'i gzhung gis de bzhin gshegs pa de gang
T02D2663a:111a-32: du 'tshang rgya ba ni sems can gcig gam gnyis
T02D2663a:111a-34: mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bya ste /
T02D2663a:111a-35: de bas na gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang
T02D2663a:111a-36: byang tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni sems can
T02D2663a:111a-37: gcig gi don gyi phyir ma yin gnyis la ma
T02D2663a:111a-38: yin gsum la ma yin gyi sems can gyi khams
T02D2663a:111b-0: ma lus pa rnams la snying rje'i @111b dbang du
T02D2663a:111b-1: gyur pas yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir byang chub tu
T02D2663a:111b-2: mngon par 'tshang rgya ste zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:111b-3: des sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2663a:111b-4: du chos 'chad do zhes pa ni de ltar de
T02D2663a:111b-5: bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i sems can rnams kyi
T02D2663a:111b-6: don du mngon par sangs rgyas mod kyi sems can
T02D2663a:111b-7: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i snod
T02D2663a:111b-9: so so'i dad pa rjes su mthun par de bzhin
T02D2663a:111b-10: gshegs pas chos 'chad pa ni bsam pa ji lta
T02D2663a:111b-11: ba bzhin chos 'chad pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:111b-12: de bas na gsungs pa gsang ba'i bdag po theg
T02D2663a:111b-13: pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa ni
T02D2663a:111b-14: sngags byed pa'i tshul 'di mthong ngam thos na sems
T02D2663a:111b-15: can 'ga' zhig dad pa rnams kyang mi skye ba
T02D2663a:111b-16: gang gis sngon theg pa chen po'i sngags spyad pa'i
T02D2663a:111b-17: tshul mtha' yas pa'i sgo de la goms par ma
T02D2663a:111b-18: byas pa'o zhes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la
T02D2663a:111b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgor spyad pa spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:111b-21: sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa'o //
T02D2663a:111b-22: de la pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa spyod
T02D2663a:111b-23: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sngags kyi spyad pa
T02D2663a:111b-24: spyod / sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:111b-25: dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de
T02D2663a:111b-26: spyod / / de la yang bye brag tu gcig
T02D2663a:111b-27: ni sngags gtsor sgrub cing pha rol tu phyin ba
T02D2663a:111b-28: spyod / / zhar la spyod / gcig ni pha
T02D2663a:111b-29: rol tu phyin pa gtsor sgrub cing sngags zhar la

T02D2663a:114b-29: slob ma rnams ni gang du dkyil 'khor du nyal
T02D2663a:114b-30: ba'i rigs so // lam 'di mchog ste dpal dang ldan //
T02D2663a:114b-31: theg pa chen po rgya mtsho che //
T02D2663a:114b-33: theg pa mchog tu bzang ba 'di //
T02D2663a:114b-35: zhes pa'i bar du yang slob ma de rnams spro
T02D2663a:114b-36: bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po las skyes
T02D2663a:114b-38: theg pa chen po nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i yon tan 'dir bshad de /
T02D2663a:114b-39: de lta bu'i theg pa khyed kyis thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:114b-40: lam 'di mchog ste dpal dang ldan //
T02D2663a:114b-41: zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba'i lam ste /
T02D2663a:114b-42: de yang sngags kyi tshul spyod pa'i lam mo //
T02D2663a:114b-43: mchog ces pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2663a:114b-44: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa rnams kyi lam las 'phags pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:114b-45: byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i lam las ci'i phyir 'phags she na /
T02D2663a:114b-46: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa spyod pa
T02D2663a:114b-47: 'dra yang lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir yan
T02D2663a:115a-0: @115a * // lag bzhi la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas
T02D2663a:115a-1: pa dang mchod pa dang sbyin sreg la sog pa'i
T02D2663a:115a-2: sgo nas sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu
T02D2663a:115a-3: phyin pa rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas 'bras bu
T02D2663a:115a-4: myur du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir mchog go //
T02D2663a:115a-5: dpal ldan zhes pa ni mngon par 'char ba'i mtshan
T02D2663a:115a-6: nyid lha dang mi'i longs spyod kyi bde ba dang
T02D2663a:115a-7: / rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa thob pa dang /
T02D2663a:115a-8: ma lus pa'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid mi gnas pa'i
T02D2663a:115a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa rim gyis thob par 'gyur
T02D2663a:115a-10: bas na dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:115a-11: theg pa chen po 'byung chen la //
T02D2663a:115a-12: zhes pa ni sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis theg pa
T02D2663a:115a-13: chen po ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 'byung
T02D2663a:115a-14: ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pas na 'byung ba chen
T02D2663a:115a-15: po zhes bya'o // gang gi phyir khyed cag dong
T02D2663a:115a-16: ba ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar 'ong do
T02D2663a:115a-17: zhes pa ni de ltar theg pa chen po la
T02D2663a:115a-18: po zhes bya'o // zhugs na / de'i 'bras bu
T02D2663a:115a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos
T02D2663a:115a-20: kyi sku thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:115a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phro ba dang bral
T02D2663a:115a-22: ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis 'di skad gsol to zhes
T02D2663a:115a-23: pa nas ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663a:115a-24: byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D2663a:115a-25: yongs su btang ba ma yin pa'i bslabs pa gzung
T02D2663a:115a-26: bar bya ba med do zhes pa'i bar du yang
T02D2663a:115a-27: sngar dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:115a-28: kyi sdom pa gsungs pa de nyid zhib tu bshad
T02D2663a:115a-29: pa ste / bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ;
T02D2663a:115a-30: rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de
T02D2663a:115a-31: rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dus gsum du ma bsgribs
T02D2663a:115a-32: pa'i sdom pa de bshad du gsol zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:115a-33: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes sdom
T02D2663a:115a-34: pa de la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2663a:115a-36: mngon par mtshar ba dang ma lus pa'i bde ba
T02D2663a:115a-37: thob par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bshad par gsol
T02D2663a:115a-38: ba'o // dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes sdom pa ni bshad zin to /
T02D2663a:115a-40: // / lus dang ngag yid lhan cig gtod //
T02D2663a:115a-41: ces pa'i lus dang ngag yid gsum dus gcig tu stong pa nyid la 'jug pa ste /
T02D2663a:115a-42: de ltar lus dang ngag yid gsum stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:115a-43: kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te dmigs su med pas
T02D2663a:115b-1: chags par byed pa la sogs pa yang dmigs su med de /
T02D2663a:115b-2: de ltar dmigs su med pa ni lus dang ngag
T02D2663a:115b-3: dang yid rnams sdig pa la sogs pa mi byed
T02D2663a:115b-4: pa ste de ni sdom pa'o //
T02D2663a:115b-5: chos thams cad la rtsol ba med pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:115b-6: phung po dang kham dang skye mched la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:115b-7: chos thams cad skye bar byed pa'i rgyu lus dang
T02D2663a:115b-8: dag yid gsum mi byed ces pa ste /
T02D2663a:115b-9: de lte de dag skyed pa'i rgyu ma byas pa'i sdom pa ste /
T02D2663a:115b-10: de dag gi don dam pa'i sdom pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:115b-11: de yang gang zhe na sus sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2663a:115b-12: chub sems dpa' la bdag gi lus rab tu gtod
T02D2663a:115b-13: pa'o zhes pa ni dus gsum du sgrib pa med
T02D2663a:115b-14: pa'i sdom pa de gzhan ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:115b-15: bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:115b-16: rnams la phul ba de sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2663a:115b-17: sems dpa' mnga' ste dbang bdag la med do //
T02D2663a:115b-18: de ltar dbang bdag la med de sangs rgyas dang
T02D2663a:115b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mnga' na sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2663a:115b-20: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni mi dge ba
T02D2663a:115b-21: bcu'i las kyi lam mi spyod do //
T02D2663a:115b-22: de bas na gang gis lus phul ba des kyang chos bzhin du bya dgos te /
T02D2663a:115b-23: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu lus dang ngag
T02D2663a:115b-24: yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi spyod pas sdom pa
T02D2663a:115b-25: zhes bya'o // de bas na gsungs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663a:115b-26: gang gis bdag gi lus yongs su btang ba des ni dngos po gsum yongs su btang pa'o //
T02D2663a:115b-27: gsum po de gang zhe na lus dang ngag yid do //
T02D2663a:115b-28: rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems
T02D2663a:115b-29: dpa' lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pas
T02D2663a:115b-31: de ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sems dpa' ni
T02D2663a:115b-32: lus dang ngag yid gsum btang ba ma yin pa'i
T02D2663a:115b-33: sdom pa gzung bar bya ba med do zhes pa
T02D2663a:115b-34: ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
T02D2663a:115b-35: lus phul bas lus dang ngag dang yid gsum char
T02D2663a:115b-37: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum la bdag mi dbang na /
T02D2663a:115b-38: lus dang ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge
T02D2663a:115b-39: ba'i las bcu mi spyod pas de nyid sdom pa
T02D2663a:115b-40: ste / lus dang ngag yid gsum las lhag pa'i
T02D2663a:115b-41: sdom pa gzhan yod pa ma yin zhes pa'i don
T02D2663a:115b-42: ste / te / mdor na gang gis sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:115b-43: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gi lus
T02D2663a:116a-0: phul ba des lus dang ngag yid gsum @116a *
T02D2663a:116a-1: ste / te / // gyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu'i las mi spyod pa ste /
T02D2663a:116a-2: de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa
T02D2663a:116a-3: med pa thob par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba bstan
T02D2663a:116a-4: pa'o // de nas phyi de nyin par bdag lus
T02D2663a:116a-5: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis rlobs la zhes pa
T02D2663a:116a-6: nas sems dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir spos kyi chu
T02D2663a:116a-7: gtsang ma byin cig ces pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:116a-8: 'dri ba'i nang par slob dpon gyis las su bya
T02D2663a:116a-10: nang bar nyi ma'i rtse la lho byang shar nub la sogs pa brtags na gsal bar mngon te /
T02D2663a:116a-11: de bas na nan par khrus la sogs pa byas
T02D2663a:116a-12: nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa de'i nang du zhugs
T02D2663a:116a-13: te ; bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad yid la bya ste /
T02D2663a:116a-14: phyag 'tshal ba la dam tshig gsum gyis phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2663a:116a-15: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid stong par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663a:116a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2663a:116a-17: de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcings te go cha bgo'o //
T02D2663a:116a-18: de ni rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663a:116a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems shin
T02D2663a:116a-20: tu brtan pa rdo rje dang 'dra ba la bya
T02D2663a:116a-21: ste / de yang gang zhe na /
T02D2663a:116a-22: phyin ci ma log pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub kyi snying po'i sems te /
T02D2663a:116a-23: de nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2663a:116a-24: de ltar slob dpon de rdo rdze sems dpa'i skur
T02D2663a:116a-25: byin gyis brlabs pa la dkyil 'khor gyis lho byang
T02D2663a:116a-26: shar nub la sogs pa brtags te gtan la dbab
T02D2663a:116a-27: pa dang lha rnams gar dgod pa'i gnas rnams kyang
T02D2663a:116a-28: yid kyis gtan la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2663a:116a-29: yang spos chus bum pa bkang ste /
T02D2663a:116a-30: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis btab la thog mar sgor bzhag ste /
T02D2663a:116a-31: mkhas pas 'gro ba kun la des gtor cig /
T02D2663a:116a-32: ces pa ni gzhung las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2663a:116a-33: ldan pa'i bum pa spos chus bkang la /
T02D2663a:116a-34: rin po che dang sman dang 'bru sna lnga blugs te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ra'i sgor bzhag ste /
T02D2663a:116a-35: slob ma rnams nang du 'ong ba'i tshe bgegs bsal ba'i phyir gtor ro //
T02D2663a:116a-36: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis bum pa
T02D2663a:116a-37: de la gdab pa de yang snying po'i sngags kyis
T02D2663a:116a-38: gdab na brgya rtsa brgyad du gdab /
T02D2663a:116b-0: @116b rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gdab na bdun na nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdab po //
T02D2663a:116b-1: de nas sems dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir spos kyi
T02D2663a:116b-2: chu gtsang ma byin cig pa ni slob ma rnams
T02D2663a:116b-3: sngags spyod pa dang 'gal ba'i kha zas zos pa'i
T02D2663a:116b-4: rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir spos chu gtsang
T02D2663a:116b-6: gtsang ma zhes pa ni sems can gyi yan lag la sogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2663a:116b-7: sngags dang 'gal ba'i kha zas zos pa'i rnam par
T02D2663a:116b-8: rtog pa med na'ang spos kyi chu gcang ma 'thungs
T02D2663a:116b-9: pas bdag gi rgyud gtang mar gyur to snyam pa'i
T02D2663a:116b-11: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i dogs pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir spos chu blud do //
T02D2663a:116b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2663a:116b-13: 'di skad gsol to zhes pa nas nam srod nas
T02D2663a:116b-15: nam mkha' la yang dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2663a:116b-16: zhes pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor ji tsam na bri ba'i dus zhus pa dang bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:116b-17: kun mkhyen zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2663a:116b-18: dus dang tshod ces pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i
T02D2663a:116b-19: dus de nyid kyi tshe na ste de bshad du
T02D2663a:116b-20: gsol zhes pa'o // smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal
T02D2663a:116b-21: gcig / ces pa ni smra ba thams cad kyi
T02D2663a:116b-22: mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D2663a:116b-23: sems dpa' chen po gang dus su byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ni dkyil 'khor mkhan /
T02D2663a:116b-24: sngags grub nan tan zhugs tshe'o //
T02D2663a:116b-25: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi mkhan po dam tshig
T02D2663a:116b-26: gi dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:116b-27: 'dri ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gang
T02D2663a:116b-28: der gshegs par 'gyur zhes zhus pa ste /
T02D2663a:116b-29: sems dpa' chen po zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mi bya'o /
T02D2663a:116b-30: pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya ste /
T02D2663a:116b-31: ci zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dus
T02D2663a:116b-32: thams cad du byin gyis rlob pas zhu mi dgos
T02D2663a:116b-33: so // byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ting nge
T02D2663a:116b-34: 'dzin las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi don
T02D2663a:116b-35: la rtog pa sngon du btang bar gshegs //
T02D2663a:116b-36: dus thams cad du byin gyis mi rlob bo //
T02D2663a:116b-37: de bas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byang chub sems
T02D2663a:116b-38: dpa' rnams gang gi dus su gshegs par 'gyur zhes
T02D2663a:116b-39: zhus pa'o // gnyis su na sems dpa' chen po zhes nams kyang mi 'bod de /
T02D2663a:117a-1: chub sems dpa' rnams la sems dpa' chen po zhes
T02D2663a:117a-2: 'bod par grags pas de bas sems dpa' chen po
T02D2663a:117a-3: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
T02D2663a:117a-4: la bya'o // nam sros nas ni bri ba ste //
T02D2663a:117a-5: nam yang dkyil 'khor bris pas so //
T02D2663a:117a-6: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'dod pa rnams kyi phyir /
T02D2663a:117a-7: dus thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshan mo bri'o zhes bka' stsal te /
T02D2663a:117a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang mtshan mo'i dus der gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663a:117a-9: de bas na 'di ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2663a:117a-10: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ka yang dus thams cad du mtshan mo bri bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:117a-11: de la gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pas bsgrub pa'i
T02D2663a:117a-12: dkyil 'khor ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad mtshan mo
T02D2663a:117a-14: de bas na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyin par bri bar gsungs so //
T02D2663a:117a-15: de ci'i phyir zhe na bsgrub pa ni nam sros
T02D2663a:117a-16: nas nam langs kyi bar mtshan rangs par bsgrub dgos
T02D2663a:117a-17: te / de bas na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshan
T02D2663a:117a-18: mo bri ba'i skabs med de nyin par 'dri bar
T02D2663a:117a-19: te / gsungs so // 'dir ni gnyis ka yang
T02D2663a:117a-20: mtshan mo bri bar gsungs pas dam tshig gi dkyil
T02D2663a:117a-21: 'khor de nyid mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:117a-22: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba ltar nyin par bri bar gsungs kyi /
T02D2663a:117a-23: rgyud 'di las mtshan mo bri bar gsungs /
T02D2663a:117a-24: bsgrub pa nyid kyi mtshan mo bri ba ni skabs
T02D2663a:117a-25: med de de'i nub mo bris na mtshan mo mal
T02D2663a:117a-26: tshe thun 'ga' dkyil 'khor bri bar zad pas bsgrub
T02D2663a:117a-27: pa mtshan rangs par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:117a-28: de bas na snga de nub mo dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2663a:117a-29: la phyi de nub mo bsgrub par shes par bya'o
T02D2663a:117a-30: // dkyil 'khor chen po dag nub gcig gis mi zin pa yang gzhung de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:117a-31: da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slad du bri ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2663a:117a-32: dkyil 'khor bri ba de yang spyir rnam pa drug gis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:117a-34: dkyil 'khor srad bu bre ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa dang /
T02D2663a:117a-35: srad bu bre ba bshad pa dang /
T02D2663a:117a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bshad pa dang /
T02D2663a:117a-37: snam bu'i rim par dbye ba dang /
T02D2663a:117b-0: sgo khyud dang rta babs rnam par dbye ba dang lha @117b rnams kyi gnas nges par bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:117b-1: de nas slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bgyis la /
T02D2663a:117b-2: tshon sna lnga'i srad bu thogs nas bdag gi lus
T02D2663a:117b-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis
T02D2663a:117b-4: brlabs la zhes pa ni srad bu bre ba'i ting
T02D2663a:117b-6: de la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bgyis te
T02D2663a:117b-7: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya
T02D2663a:117b-8: na / thog mar sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing phyag bya bar rigs so //
T02D2663a:117b-9: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du brtags te /
T02D2663a:117b-10: ye shes lnga po de dag dang ldan par bdag
T02D2663a:117b-11: rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis brlab bo
T02D2663a:117b-12: ; / bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663a:117b-13: mdzad kyi skur byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:117b-14: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum la ting nge 'dzin du
T02D2663a:117b-15: gnas pa yang bye brag rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2663a:117b-16: snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la slob dpon rnam
T02D2663a:117b-17: par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis brlabs te srad
T02D2663a:117b-18: bu bre ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi las
T02D2663a:117b-19: rnams bya'o // yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil
T02D2663a:117b-20: 'khor la chos kyi skur byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil
T02D2663a:117b-22: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbang chen la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:117b-23: dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:117b-24: nas dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bya ste /
T02D2663a:117b-25: de dag kyang zhib tu ni bsdu pa'i don las bshad do //
T02D2663a:117b-26: rgyud nyid kyang so so'i skabs su 'byung ngo //
T02D2663a:117b-27: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa rnams ye shes lngar brtags
T02D2663a:117b-28: pa ni 'og nas phye ma'i sna lnga la sangs

T02D2663a:118a-41: zhes pa ni slob dpon lho nub kyi mtshams de

T02D2663a:118b-4: sngags mkhan sngags kyi cho gar gnas //

T02D2663a:118b-7: nub phyogs su ni kha blta ste //
T02D2663a:118b-8: byang phyogs ngos de bre ba dang //
T02D2663a:118b-9: rlung gi grvar ni thug pa'i bar //
T02D2663a:118b-10: zhes pa ni slob dpon byang dang shar gyi mtshams
T02D2663a:118b-11: su 'dug nas byang phyogs kyi ngos su srad bu
T02D2663a:118b-12: bre bar bya'o // de bzhin sngags pas bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:118b-13: kun kyang gru bzhi lham par te //
T02D2663a:118b-14: zhes pa ni de ltar gong du smos pa'i mtshan nyid kyis /
T02D2663a:118b-15: dkyil 'khor de kun gru bzhi bya //
T02D2663a:118b-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu bre bar thog mar nub phyogs /
T02D2663a:118b-20: de nas byang phyogs su bya ba ci'i zhe na /
T02D2663a:118b-21: nub phyogs kyi ngos ni so sor rtog pa'i ye
T02D2663a:118b-22: shes su brtag / lho phyogs ni mnyam pa nyid
T02D2663a:118b-23: kyi ye shes su brtag / shar phyogs ni me
T02D2663a:118b-24: long gi ye shes su brtag / byang phyogs ni

T02D2663a:118b-28: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las me long gi ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur /
