T02D2663a:118b-30: dang gnas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba nan tan gyi
T02D2663a:118b-32: de bas na rim pa de ltar smos so //

T02D2663a:118b-34: de bas na srad bu rgya gram du bres pa'i
T02D2663a:118b-35: ri mo ngos bzhi nas re re byung ba ni
T02D2663a:118b-37: rgya gram gyi gcig tu 'dus pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do //

T02D2663a:118b-40: te / gos kyi rim gro mi byed par snang bar bya ba'i phyir gdab bo //

T02D2663a:118b-44: snam bu gsum po las cha bzhir bgos te /
T02D2663a:118b-45: cha re re yang ngos re re sbyar ba'o //
T02D2663a:119a-1: gnyis la yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:119a-2: snam bu gsum du bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:119a-3: sa de 'khor kyang thams cad du //
T02D2663a:119a-4: zhes pa ni de ltar dkyil 'khor de khor yug tu rim pa gsum du bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:119a-5: re re la yang char bya ba //
T02D2663a:119a-6: dum bu gsum du gcad par bya //
T02D2663a:119a-7: zhes pa ni snam bu gsum po re re la yang cha gsum du bgos pa la /
T02D2663a:119a-8: cha gcig ni bskor ba'i snam bur gzhag / cha
T02D2663a:119a-9: gnyis ni lha rnams kyi gnas su bya ba ste

T02D2663a:119a-12: snam bu gcig bskor phyi ru ste //
T02D2663a:119a-13: lhag ma'i rim pa gnyis po ni //
T02D2663a:119a-14: nges par lha rnams gnas par ro //
T02D2663a:119a-15: zhes pa ste de dag gis snam bu dbye ba'o //
T02D2663a:119a-16: sgo khyung dag ni phyogs bzhi ru //
T02D2663a:119a-17: blo can gyis ni so sor bya //
T02D2663a:119a-18: lha rnams de ru bri ba yang //
T02D2663a:119a-19: dka' bar spyod pas nan tan bya //

T02D2663a:119a-23: shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud nang du chos kyi sku'i

T02D2663a:119a-28: rnams la shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi nang du

T02D2663a:119a-30: kyi nang du gshin rje gzhag / byang phyogs kyi

T02D2663a:119a-33: 'khor bar ma'i snam bu la sgo khyud kyi nang
T02D2663a:119a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku nyid du rig par bya ste /

T02D2663a:119b-0: @119b chub pa'i mtshan nyid dbus na bzhugs pa ni

T02D2663a:119b-13: lho phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi nang na sgrib pa

T02D2663a:119b-30: snying rje chen po de las dkyil 'khor 'di 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:119b-31: de bas na snying po 'di las 'byung ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:119b-32: de yi tshad ni smras pa yang //
T02D2663a:119b-33: chen por yang ni sor bcu drug / ces pa ni dbus kyi padma'i tshad sor bcu drug ste /
T02D2663a:119b-34: chen por yang ni zhes pa ni de las lhag par kyang rung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:119b-35: de'i dgongs pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2663a:119b-36: bcu drug ni sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:119b-37: chen por yang ni zhes pa ni de las lhag
T02D2663a:119b-38: pa kun du bang po'i sa la sogs pa dang

T02D2663a:119b-41: nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D2663a:120a-0: @120a * // 'dab brgyad kyi rdzogs ldan zhes pa ni bsod nams tshogs te /
T02D2663a:120a-1: ye shes brgyad dang ldan pas 'dab ma brgyad du gsungs so //
T02D2663a:120a-2: de las ye shes brgyad ni me long gi ye shes dnag /
T02D2663a:120a-3: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2663a:120a-4: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2663a:120a-5: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes de nyid sgo
T02D2663a:120a-6: lnga'i rnam par shes pa lnga las gyur pas rnams
T02D2663a:120a-8: ye shes de rnams de brgyad dang ldan pas 'dab ma brgyad du gyes so //
T02D2663a:120a-9: ye shes rnams kyang chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin du chud pa ste /
T02D2663a:120a-10: de ltar thams cad dmigs su med par chud pas sbyin par bya ba dang /
T02D2663a:120a-12: sbyin par byed pa gsum char yang dmigs su med par chud de /
T02D2663a:120a-13: de bas na sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams
T02D2663a:120a-14: kyi tshogs te ye shes lta bu dang ldan pas
T02D2663a:120a-15: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin du shes
T02D2663a:120a-16: par bya'o // ge sar dang ldan shin tu bzang //
T02D2663a:120a-17: zhes pa ge sar rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2663a:120a-18: 'das kyi rgyu'i yon tan dang ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D2663a:120a-19: gzungs dang rnam par grol ba dang /
T02D2663a:120a-20: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan mar brtag ste /
T02D2663a:120a-21: bsod nams kyi tshogs de yang yon tan de rnams dang ldan pa zhes pa'o//
T02D2663a:120a-22: 'dab ma'i bar ni kun du yang //
T02D2663a:120a-23: chub par rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:120a-24: zhes pa rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan ma ste /
T02D2663a:120a-25: gong du smos pa'i ye shes brgyad rnams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:120a-26: de yi snying po'i dbus su ni //
T02D2663a:120a-27: rgyal ba'i gtso mchog bri zhes pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2663a:120a-28: 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin padma'i snying
T02D2663a:120a-30: rgyal ba'i gtso mchog ces pa ni bdud rnams las rgyal ba ste /
T02D2663a:120a-31: de rnams kyi nang na yang mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:120a-33: thor tshugs cod pan 'chang ba ste //
T02D2663a:120a-34: mgon po'i 'od kyis rim par bskor //
T02D2663a:120a-35: nad dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2663a:120a-36: shes pa 'bar dang bcas zhes pa ni 'bar ba
T02D2663a:120a-37: ni sreg pa'i rang bzhin te nyon mongs pa dang
T02D2663a:120a-38: shes bya'i sgrib pa sreg pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye
T02D2663a:120a-39: shes dang ldan pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:120a-40: gser gyi kha dog 'dra zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:120a-41: thor tshugs 'chang ba ni 'og min gyi gnas na
T02D2663a:120b-0: @120b bzhugs na 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams
T02D2663a:120b-1: thor tshugs dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2663a:120b-2: de dag dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir thor tshugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:120b-3: cod pan 'chang zhes pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'am
T02D2663a:120b-4: dbang por dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i cod
T02D2663a:120b-5: pan gsol ba'o // mgon po'i 'od kyis rim par bskor//
T02D2663a:120b-6: zhes pa ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od dang ba /
T02D2663a:120b-7: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las 'phro bas bskor ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:120b-8: nad dang bral ba zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa
T02D2663a:120b-9: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gdon dang bral ba zhes
T02D2663a:120b-10: pa'o // ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes pa ni so
T02D2663a:120b-11: so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes mi g-yo ba
T02D2663a:120b-12: rtse gcig tu gnas pa ste /
T02D2663a:120b-13: gzungs kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du gnas pa'o //
T02D2663a:120b-15: shar du sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni //
T02D2663a:120b-16: phyag rgya nan tan bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:120b-17: padma'i steng du gru gsum pa //
T02D2663a:120b-18: mkhas pas kun kyang dkar po ru //
T02D2663a:120b-19: 'od kyis kun bskor dang ba ni //
T02D2663a:120b-20: thams cad du yang dkar po ru //
T02D2663a:120b-21: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663a:120b-22: kyi shar phyogs su mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'das
T02D2663a:120b-23: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya gsum pa'i
T02D2663a:120b-25: shar phyogs su gzhag pa ni rgya gar skad du shar phyogs la p'urba zhes bya /
T02D2663a:120b-27: de bas na sngon 'das pa'o zhes gleng ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:120b-29: padma'i steng du gru gsum bri ba ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2663a:120b-30: mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ste /

T02D2663a:123b-29: sems can gyi don byed pa'i nan tan byed pas
T02D2663a:123b-30: na / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:123b-31: 'phro ba mtha' yas rgya chen po //
T02D2663a:123b-32: zhes pa ni sems can gyi don du mtha' yas par rgyu ste /
T02D2663a:123b-33: de yang rgya che ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D2663a:123b-34: 'od kyis bskor ba ni ye shes kyi 'od 'bro bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2663a:123b-35: rdo rje 'chang ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D2663a:123b-36: de yi g-yas su bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:123b-37: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:123b-38: lha mo phyag na rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2663a:123b-39: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2663a:123b-40: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i yum bya ba nan tan
T02D2663a:124a-0: gyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i shes rab @124a *
T02D2663a:124a-1: // kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:124a-2: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:124a-3: m'a ma k'i ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D2663a:124a-4: m'a ma k'i bas m'a ma k'i zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:124a-5: phyag na rdo rje ji ltar m'a ma k'i zhe na /
T02D2663a:124a-6: gdug pa dang ma rungs pa rnams gdug pa'i bya
T02D2663a:124a-7: ba byed pa la ma byed ces 'gog pa ste
T02D2663a:124a-8: / ma byed pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:124a-9: yum de'i ma byed ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:124a-10: rdo rje 'chang ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D2663a:124a-11: gyi phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'chang ba'o
T02D2663a:124a-12: // rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan zhes pa ni rgyan rnams kyi mtshan ma rdo rjes btab pa ste /
T02D2663a:124a-13: rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:124a-14: de yi 'og zad bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:124a-15: stobs chen rdo rje kha ba can ma //
T02D2663a:124a-16: lha mo zha 'bring bas bskor te //
T02D2663a:124a-17: bzhin ni yid tsam 'dzum pa ste //
T02D2663a:124a-18: zhes pa ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2663a:124a-19: phyin pa de'i bar chad pa med pa'i lam gyi
T02D2663a:124a-20: rang bzhin pas de'i 'og tu bri ste /
T02D2663a:124a-21: rdo rje rtse can ma zhes pa ni chos nyid la 'bigs par byed pa'i ngang tshul can no //
T02D2663a:124a-22: stabs can zhes pa ni de'i yon tan no ;
T02D2663a:124a-23: / lha mo zha 'bring mas bskor ba zhes pa
T02D2663a:124a-24: ni de ma thag pa'i lam gyi yan lag rnams
T02D2663a:124a-25: dang ldan pa'o // yang na rgyal po'i 'khor bas
T02D2663a:124a-26: mngag gzhug ma la sogs pa srid pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663a:124a-27: dang ldan pa'o // // de bzhin yid kyis 'dzum pa ste //
T02D2663a:124a-28: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin du ma zhugs pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:124a-29: g-yon du sngags pas bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:124a-30: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces bya //
T02D2663a:124a-31: rdo rje lu gu rgyud thogs pa //
T02D2663a:124a-32: rang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba ste //
T02D2663a:124a-33: kha dog pri yang ku ba zhin sngo //
T02D2663a:124a-34: rdo rje mtshan mas mtshan byas pa'o //
T02D2663a:124a-35: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje g-yon du rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces bya ba bris te /
T02D2663a:124a-36: lu gu rgyud ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:124a-37: sems can rnams lam der 'dren zhing 'dzud par byed pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:124a-38: yang na rgyal po'i 'khor gyis phul bas gdug pa
T02D2663a:124a-39: dang ma rungs pa rnams bzung zhing 'dogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2663a:124a-40: nyid do // rang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba ste //
T02D2663a:124a-41: zhes pa ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma de
T02D2663a:124a-42: nyid kyi 'khor mdag gzhug ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D2663a:124a-43: kyis bskor ba'o // rdo rje mtshan mas mtshan byas pa'o //
T02D2663a:124a-44: zhes pa ni rgyan rnams la rdo rje mtshan gyis btab pa'o //
T02D2663a:124a-45: phyag na rdo rje 'og logs su //
T02D2663a:124a-48: padmo'i gdan la gnas par bri //
T02D2663a:124b-0: @124b zhes pa'i bar du phyag na rdo rje'i bya
T02D2663a:124b-1: ba nan tan gyi ye shes bar chad med pa'i
T02D2663a:124b-2: lam gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa khro bo zla
T02D2663a:124b-3: ba thig le'i bye brag ste /
T02D2663a:124b-4: ma zang 'og tu bri ba ni bya ba nan
T02D2663a:124b-5: tan gyi ye shes la sbyor ba bar chad med
T02D2663a:124b-6: pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin pas bya ba nan tan
T02D2663a:124b-7: gyi ye shes kyi sar ma phyin pa'i 'og tu
T02D2663a:124b-8: bri'o // khro bo khams gsum grags pa zhes pa
T02D2663a:124b-9: ni yon tan gyis 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'o
T02D2663a:124b-10: bri'o // // bgegs dang dgra chen zhi bar byed //
T02D2663a:124b-11: ces pa ni lha dang gnod sbyin las 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:124b-12: bgegs rnams mi la sogs pa'i dgra sel bar byed
T02D2663a:124b-13: pa'o // zla ba ltar yongs su dag cing sems
T02D2663a:124b-14: can thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa'i rang
T02D2663a:124b-15: pa'o // bzhin no // thig le ni thig le'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'am /
T02D2663a:124b-16: yang na ni ti la ka zhes pa ni rgya
T02D2663a:124b-17: gar skad du gtso bo'i rnam pa la bya ste
T02D2663a:124b-18: / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo lta bur zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:124b-19: spyan gsum pa ni ye shes kyi spyan lhag par mnga' ba'am khro ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:124b-20: mche ba bzhi pa ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan
T02D2663a:124b-21: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rang
T02D2663a:124b-22: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
T02D2663a:124b-23: dang ldan pa'o // 'od ni dbyar gyi sprin 'dra bar //
T02D2663a:124b-24: zhes pa ni kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba ste /
T02D2663a:124b-25: dbyar gyi sprin gyi rlung dang char bar bcas pa'i bag gnas pa ste /
T02D2663a:124b-26: de dang 'dra bas las thams cad byed pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:124b-27: drag po rgod pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
T02D2663a:124b-28: zhes pa ni rgod pa'i sgras thams cad khengs shing gnod par 'gyur ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o //
T02D2663a:124b-29: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan //
T02D2663a:124b-30: zhes pa rgyan rnams la rdo rje mtshan mas btab pa'o //
T02D2663a:124b-31: mtha' yas 'khor gyis bskor ba ni //
T02D2663a:124b-32: khro bo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba zhes pa ni 'khor phal dang khro bo grangs med pas bskor ba'o //
T02D2663a:124b-33: lag pa brgya stong du ma zhes pa ni lam
T02D2663a:124b-34: gyi yan lag brgya stong du mas sems can rnams
T02D2663a:124b-36: yan lag de rnams kyis lam gyi sgrib pa mang po rnams sel ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:124b-37: mtshon cha du ma sna tshogs zhes pa ni lam
T02D2663a:124b-38: gyi yan lag yon tan rnams rdo rje la sogs
T02D2663a:124b-40: khro bo chen po de 'dra bar //
T02D2663a:124b-41: padmo'i gdan la gnas par bri //
T02D2663a:125a-0: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa'i tshul du bri ste 'khor yan lag @125a * //
T02D2663a:125a-1: mang po rnams ni yid kyis bsam par bya ste /
T02D2663a:125a-2: nyung zad ci 'os par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:125a-3: de yi nub tu song nas ni //
T02D2663a:125a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa mang du bri //
T02D2663a:125a-5: lag na rdo rje mtshon cha thogs //
T02D2663a:125a-6: mthu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa //
T02D2663a:125a-8: sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:125a-9: zhes pa ni phyag nar do rje'i 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bri ste /
T02D2663a:125a-10: ming dang cha lugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:125a-11: sngags mgon gyi ni 'og logs su //
T02D2663a:125a-12: nee ri ni phyogs logs su //
T02D2663a:125a-14: khro bo lta bu gzhon nu'i gzugs //
T02D2663a:125a-15: zhes pa'i bar du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663a:125a-16: mdzad nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2663a:125a-17: bar chad med pa'i lam du gyur pa /
T02D2663a:125a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og ma zad du 'phags pa
T02D2663a:125a-19: mi g-yo mgon bri ba'i bye brag gsungs pa ste
T02D2663a:125a-20: / lag na ral gri thogs pa ni shes bya
T02D2663a:125a-21: dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa gcod pa'i shes rab
T02D2663a:125a-23: zhags pa ni lam gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663a:125a-24: lam der sems can thams cad 'dren zhing 'dzud pa'o //
T02D2663a:125a-26: bar chad med pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin pas chos
T02D2663a:125a-27: kyi dbyings rnam pa thams cad du ma chud cing
T02D2663a:125a-28: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2663a:125a-29: mtshan ma'o // 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang du 'dug
T02D2663a:125a-30: / ces pa ni sgrib pa sel ba'i ye shes
T02D2663a:125a-31: mtshan ma'o // dang ldan pa'o // mkhregs pa ni
T02D2663a:125a-32: phyin ci ma log pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i lam
T02D2663a:125a-33: gyi rang bzhin pas brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663a:125a-34: gzhon nu ma'i gzugs ni bar chad med pa'i lam
T02D2663a:125a-35: la dang po zhugs pas lam rgyas pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2663a:125a-36: ste / de bas na bar chad med pa'i lam
T02D2663a:125a-37: rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba
T02D2663a:125a-38: rlung gi phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D2663a:125a-39: bris nas blo can 'gro ba ni //
T02D2663a:125a-40: rlung phyogs su ste nan tan bya //
T02D2663a:125a-43: zhes pa'i bar du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663a:125a-44: mdzad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar chad
T02D2663a:125a-45: med pa'i lam rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum rnam
T02D2663a:125a-46: par rgyal ba bri ba'i bye brag gsungs pa ste
T02D2663a:125b-0: zhes pa ni zad pa'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba med de mun nag tu @125b 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:125b-1: khro bo de'i kha dog kyang mun pa dang 'dra ba nag po bri zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663a:125b-2: de bzhin nang rol bris pa rnams //
T02D2663a:125b-3: rgyas pa ru ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2663a:125b-4: zhes pa ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor du sku mi
T02D2663a:125b-5: zad pa la sogs pa'i rgyan rang bzhin gyi dkyil
T02D2663a:125b-6: 'khor rnams sdud par 'gyur ba ye shes lnga'i mtshan
T02D2663a:125b-7: ma 'khor dang bcas par bshad ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:125b-8: da ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i snam bu'i sku mi
T02D2663a:125b-9: zad pa'i rgyan sdud par gyur pa sprul pa'i sku
T02D2663a:125b-11: dbang po dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i tshul du
T02D2663a:125b-12: bstan pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bshad par
T02D2663a:125b-13: bya ste / gnyis po'i cha ni nges pa ru
T02D2663a:125b-14: shar phyogs kyi dbus su cha gnyis rnam par brtags
T02D2663a:125b-15: pa'i sgo khyud kyi nang rol du /
T02D2663a:125b-16: sngags pas bri ba sh'akya thub //
T02D2663a:125b-17: rgyas pa gser gyi kha dog 'bar //
T02D2663a:125b-18: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
T02D2663a:125b-19: mgon po chos gos gsol bzhin te //
T02D2663a:125b-20: gtso bo chos kyi don byed pa //
T02D2663a:125b-21: padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2663a:125b-22: bzhugs pa chos kyang 'chad pa bzhin //
T02D2663a:125b-23: zhes pa'i bar du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa
T02D2663a:125b-24: dkyil 'khor nyis rim gyi shar gyi ngos cha gnyis
T02D2663a:125b-25: bgos pa'i dbus su bab pa'i sgo khyud kyi nang
T02D2663a:125b-26: du bris te sh'akya thub pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:125b-27: sh'akya'i rigs las byung zhing lus dang ngag yid gsum thub pa'i ngang tshul can no //
T02D2663a:125b-28: shar phyogs su bri ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663a:125b-29: par snang mdzad pas sngar byang chub kyi shing drung
T02D2663a:125b-30: du mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:125b-31: gser gyi kha dog ni rgyas pa'i mtshan ma ste
T02D2663a:125b-32: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas pa'i rang
T02D2663a:125b-34: 'bar ba dang bcas pa ni kun du sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:125b-35: pas sgrib pa sreg pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes
T02D2663a:125b-36: dang ldan pa'o // mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis dang ldan //
T02D2663a:125b-37: zhes pa ni gcug tor bltar mi snang ba la
T02D2663a:125b-38: sogs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gzhung las grags
T02D2663a:125b-39: pa'o // chos gos dur smrig gsol ba ni 'khor ba la ni ma chags ba dang /
T02D2663a:125b-40: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad la chags pa bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:125b-41: chos gos tshon gyis zhes pa ni snying rjes sems can la chags pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:125b-42: dmar po nyid du mi gsal bar dur smrig tu
T02D2663a:126a-0: gyur pa ni 'khor ba la ma chags par @126a
T02D2663a:126a-2: gtso bo bstan pa'i don byed pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:126a-3: 'khor rnams la slob cing ston pa'i don byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:126a-4: padma dkar po'i gdan ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs
T02D2663a:126a-5: su dag pa'i mtshan ma ste snga ma bzhin no
T02D2663a:126a-6: // chos 'chad bzhin du bzhugs pa ni gzhung las grags ba'o //
T02D2663a:126a-7: de yi g-yas phyogs logs su ni //
T02D2663a:126a-8: lha mo sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya //
T02D2663a:126a-9: zhal ras zhi ba'i yid 'dzum par //
T02D2663a:126a-11: mnyam med sku yang shin tu dangs //
T02D2663a:126a-12: de ni sh'akya thub pa'i yum //
T02D2663a:126a-13: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i shes rab yum gyi
T02D2663a:126a-14: gzugs gyur pa sh'akya thub pa'i g-yas rol gyi byang
T02D2663a:126a-16: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa shes rab de las byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:126a-17: sangs rgyas kyi yum zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:126a-18: sangs rgyas kyi spyan zhes pa ni gzigs pa'i rang bzhin pas shes rab la bya'o //
T02D2663a:126a-19: zhal ras zhi pa yid 'dzum pa ni zhi bshes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag pa'o //
T02D2663a:126a-20: yid tsam 'dzum pa ni chos ston pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:126a-21: 'od kyis shin tu bskor zhes pa ni kun du
T02D2663a:126a-22: sangs rgyas pa la shes bya dang nyon mongs pa
T02D2663a:126a-23: sreg pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:126a-24: mnyam pa med pa ni ji bzhin pa med pa'i
T02D2663a:126a-25: ye shes kyi rang bzhin pas tshad 'di tsam mo
T02D2663a:126a-26: zhes bzung zhing gzhal du med pa'o //
T02D2663a:126a-27: de yi g-yas phyogs bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:126a-28: rig pa smin mtshams zhes grags pa //
T02D2663a:126a-29: lha mo padma'i steng bzhugs par //
T02D2663a:126a-31: yid bzhin nor bu lag na thogs //
T02D2663a:126a-32: re ba kun kyang rdzogs par byed //
T02D2663a:126a-33: ces pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi g-yas rol byang
T02D2663a:126a-34: phyogs su smin mtshams zhes bya ba'i rig ma bri
T02D2663a:126a-35: ste / sangs rgyas kyi smin mtshams nas skyes bu
T02D2663a:126a-36: chen po'i mtshan thig le 'dra ba de'i ting nge
T02D2663a:126a-37: 'dzin gyi gzugs su gyur ba'i lha mo ni smin
T02D2663a:126a-38: ste / mtshams zhes bya'o // mgon po'i g-yon logs sngags mkhan gyis //
T02D2663a:126a-39: legs par gtsug tor lnga bri zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:126a-40: kun kyang nan tan cher bri ba //
T02D2663a:126a-41: gnas rnams kyang ni lnga nyid du //
T02D2663a:126a-42: zhes pa'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon rol lho phyogs su gtsug tor lnga bri ste /
T02D2663a:126a-43: gtsug tor zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug nas byung ba ste /
T02D2663a:126a-44: 'bras bu rgyu las brlan te mtshan gsol ba'o //
T02D2663a:126b-0: 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya la sogs @126b pa ni /
T02D2663a:126b-1: zhib tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las smos pas na 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D2663a:126b-2: de rnams kyi ni byang phyogs su //
T02D2663a:126b-3: gtsang bar gnas dag legs par bri //
T02D2663a:126b-4: zhes pa'i bar du gtsug tor lnga'i g-yon rol lho
T02D2663a:126b-5: phyogs su gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la
T02D2663a:126b-6: sku mi zad ba'i rgyan gyis khyab par mdzad pa'i
T02D2663a:126b-7: sgor gyur pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams
T02D2663a:126b-8: bri ste / gzhung las byang phyogs su smos na /
T02D2663a:126b-9: ci'i phyir lho phyogs su bri zhe na /
T02D2663a:126b-10: gtsug tor lnga'i byang phyogs na sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa bzhugs pas bri ba'i skabs med de /
T02D2663a:126b-11: lho phyogs su bri bar mngon no //
T02D2663a:126b-12: gnyis su na skad kyi gzhung gis kyang byang phyogs su zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:126b-13: lho phyogs bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:126b-14: mdzod sbu'i g-yas logs byang phyogs su //
T02D2663a:126b-15: gtsug tor gsum po nyid kyis te //
T02D2663a:126b-16: cher 'byung ba yi gtsug tor dang //
T02D2663a:126b-17: de bzhin gyen du 'byung ba dang //
T02D2663a:126b-18: mtha' yas dbyangs kyi sgra dang ste //
T02D2663a:126b-19: de rnams nan tan legs par bri //
T02D2663a:126b-21: mdzod spu'i g-yas rol byang phyogs su //
T02D2663a:126b-22: gtsug tor gsum rnams bri ba ste //
T02D2663a:126b-23: dkar po ser skya ser gdangs te //
T02D2663a:126b-24: zhes pa ni gtsug tor gsum po de dag nyid kyi kha dog ste /
T02D2663a:126b-25: ser skya ni yungs kar gyi kha dog 'dra'o //
T02D2663a:126b-26: ser gdangs ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra'o //
T02D2663a:126b-27: mthu chen gtsug tor lnga po gsum du bya ba
T02D2663a:126b-28: gzhan gyi ste zhes pa'i gtsug tor gsum po las
T02D2663a:126b-29: gzhan pa gtsug tor lnga po sngar smos pa rnams
T02D2663a:126b-30: kha dog gsum du bya'o zhes pa ste kha dog
T02D2663a:126b-31: rnam pa gsum po zhes pa yang dkar po dmar
T02D2663a:126b-33: gtsug tor lnga la kha dog gsum ni gtsug tor gsum dang sbyar /
T02D2663a:126b-34: gtsug tor gnyis ni kha dog de dag nyid las dkar po dang dmar po gnyis dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:126b-35: de dag smon lam mthu can zhes pa ni de
T02D2663a:126b-36: dag kun kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i smon
T02D2663a:126b-37: lam gyi mthu las byung ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:126b-38: de nas sngags pa me'i phyogs su me ni drang
T02D2663a:126b-39: srong che ba dang bcas pa zhes pa nas ril
T02D2663a:126b-41: sngags nor thogs zhes pa'i bar du shar dang lho'i
T02D2663a:126b-42: mtshams su 'khor me'i drang srong rnams dang bcas par
T02D2663a:126b-43: bri ba'i bye brag de rnams kyang sku mi zad
T02D2663a:126b-44: pa'i rgyan nyid me'i drang srong la sogs pa gdul
T02D2663a:126b-45: ba'i phyir me'i gzugs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2663a:126b-46: de nas lho yi phyogs su ni //
T02D2663a:127a-2: lag na dbyig thogs ma he zhon //
T02D2663a:127a-4: ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang //
T02D2663a:127a-6: zhes pa ni sku mi zad pa'i rgyan de nyid
T02D2663a:127a-7: gshin rje la sogs pa gdul ba'i phyir yi dags
T02D2663a:127a-8: kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i gzugs su gyur pa ste
T02D2663a:127a-9: / de'ang lho'i phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi nang du pri ste /
T02D2663a:127a-10: ma he zhon pa ni de'i theg pa ste /
T02D2663a:127a-11: 'jig rten gyi theg pa pas ma he ltar dkar po ma yin pa'o //
T02D2663a:127a-12: dbyig pa thogs pa ni shes rab kyi mtshan ma
T02D2663a:127a-13: ste dbyig pa zlum po bcad pa'i rang bzhin ma
T02D2663a:127a-14: yin pa ni 'khor ba rgyud las legs nyes kyi
T02D2663a:127a-15: 'bras bu ston pa la sogs pa 'chad pas 'khor
T02D2663a:127a-16: ba'i rgyud gcod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2663a:127a-17: nee ri'i phyogs su ni ri bri'o //
T02D2663a:127a-18: 'jigs pa lag na ral gri can //
T02D2663a:127a-19: zhes pa ni lho nub kyi mtshams su 'bar ba
T02D2663a:127a-20: rnams gdul ba'i phyir sku mi zad pa'i rgyan de
T02D2663a:127a-21: nyid 'bar ba'i rgyal po ni ri'i gzugs su gyur
T02D2663a:127a-22: pa'o // de nas blo can bri ba ni /
T02D2663a:127a-23: nub byang phyogs su bri ba lha'i rgyal po ste /
T02D2663a:127a-24: ri rab rtse gnas lhas bskor pa //
T02D2663a:127a-25: lag na rdo rje cod pan can //
T02D2663a:127a-26: rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'o //
T02D2663a:127a-27: zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i lha rnams gdul ba'i phyir
T02D2663a:127a-28: sku mi zad pa'i rgyan de nyid lha rnams kyi
T02D2663a:127a-29: rgyal po dbang po'i gzugs su gyur pa ste /
T02D2663a:127a-30: de yang byang phyogs kyi ngos sgo khyud kyi nang du bri'o //
T02D2663a:127a-31: de yang ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas shing
T02D2663a:127a-32: 'khor lha rnams kyis skor bar bri ste cod pan
T02D2663a:127a-33: gyi rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pas so //
T02D2663a:127a-34: rdo rje ni de'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:127a-36: de yi shar du ba ru na //
T02D2663a:127a-37: lag na zhags pa thogs pa bri //
T02D2663a:127a-38: zhes pa ni chu'i dbang po shar phyogs su bri ste /
T02D2663a:127a-39: zhags pa ni de nyid kyi lam gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:127a-40: shar phyogs su bri ba ni p'urba zhes pa sngon gyi tshig ste /
T02D2663a:127a-41: bskal pa 'byung ba'i 'og tu chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis thog mar gzhi btsugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:127a-42: nyi ma'i shing rta steng 'dug pa ;
T02D2663a:127a-43: / zhes pa ni chu'i rgyal po'i shar phyogs su
T02D2663a:127a-44: nyi ma bri ste shing rta ni nyi ma'i bzhon
T02D2663a:127a-45: pa'o // shar phyogs su bri ba ni sngon gyi tshig ste /
T02D2663a:127a-46: bskal pa 'byung ba'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa rnams
T02D2663a:127a-47: kyi nang na nyi ma dang zla ba dang por
T02D2663a:127a-49: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba yang //
T02D2663a:127b-0: de yi g-yas logs @127b bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:127b-1: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i chung ma gnyis so //
T02D2663a:127b-2: de yi g-yas phyogs tshangs pa ste //
T02D2663a:127b-3: gdong bzhi pa la ral pa can //
T02D2663a:127b-4: aom zhes 'byin cing nan tan byed //
T02D2663a:127b-5: ngang pa padma'i steng gnas pa //
T02D2663a:127b-6: zhes pa ni dbang po'i g-yas logs nub phyogs su tshangs pa bri ste /
T02D2663a:127b-7: gdong bzhi pa ni smrang bzhi so so nas 'byung ba'o //
T02D2663a:127b-8: ngang pa padma'i steng gnas pa //
T02D2663a:127b-9: zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i bzhon pa ngang pa ste /
T02D2663a:127b-10: ngang pa'i steng na padma bzhag pa la 'dug par bri'o //
T02D2663a:127b-11: aom gyi sgra 'byin pa'i tshul dang phyag rgya ni
T02D2663a:127b-12: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa dang sbyar ro
T02D2663a:127b-13: // de yi nub tu bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:127b-14: sa yi lha mo dbyangs can dang //
T02D2663a:127b-15: gtogs 'dod phung po de bzhin rlung //
T02D2663a:127b-16: dbang po che dang zla ba ste //
T02D2663a:127b-17: nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa ni //
T02D2663a:127b-18: nan tan chen por byas la bri //
T02D2663a:127b-19: zhes pa ni nub phyogs kyi ngos su gtogs 'dod
T02D2663a:127b-20: la sogs pa'i lha de dag lho phyogs nas brtsams
T02D2663a:127b-21: te rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri'o //
T02D2663a:127b-22: nub phyogs su bri ba ni /
T02D2663a:127b-23: sgo nub tu gtod pas sgo khar bri ba ste /
T02D2663a:127b-24: dbang po dang gtogs la dod la sogs pa'i lha
T02D2663a:127b-25: de rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du 'jug
T02D2663a:127b-26: pa'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:127b-27: de rnams kyang sku mi zad pa'i rgyan de nyid de /
T02D2663a:127b-28: lha de dag gdul ba'i phyir de dag nyid kyi gzugs su gyur pa ste /
T02D2663a:127b-29: sku mi zad pa'i rgyan de la sogs pa de
T02D2663a:127b-30: dag gi gzugs su gyur pa yang cha lugs de
T02D2663a:127b-32: de dag ngag gcig cing gdul ba'i phyir mthu dang
T02D2663a:127b-33: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa de dag las lhag par
T02D2663a:127b-34: shes par bya'o // de bzhin du gshin rje la sogs pa gzhan yang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:127b-35: de dag bri ba sngags pa yis //
T02D2663a:127b-36: mi 'khrugs pa yi yid kyis te //
T02D2663a:127b-37: thub pa rgyal po'i 'og tu bri //
T02D2663a:127b-38: khro bo 'di dag bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:127b-39: gzhan gyi mi tshugs khro chen dang //
T02D2663a:127b-40: gzhan gyis mi tshugs lha mo dang //
T02D2663a:127b-41: sa bdag lag na bum pa thogs //
T02D2663a:127b-42: gus par de dag 'khor bzhin du'o //
T02D2663a:127b-43: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2663a:127b-44: 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bar chad med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663a:127b-45: no // lha mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni
T02D2663a:127b-46: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mthu brtan par gyur
T02D2663a:127b-47: no // pa'o // sa'i lha mo lag na bum
T02D2663a:127b-48: pa thogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dpang du
T02D2663a:128a-1: kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga ma zad 'og tu bri'o //
T02D2663a:128a-2: klu chen dga' bo nye dga' bo //
T02D2663a:128a-3: nan tan tu ni bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:128a-4: sgo ba gnyis kyi mdun du ste //
T02D2663a:128a-5: sh'akya seng ge sbyong ba yi //
T02D2663a:128a-6: zhes pa ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis sgo pha rol
T02D2663a:128a-7: tshu rol nas gcig la gcig phyogs par bri ste
T02D2663a:128a-8: chab sgo bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:128a-9: gzhan yang sh'ak thug phyag rgya dang //
T02D2663a:128a-10: sngags rnams dkyil 'khor bar bshad pa //
T02D2663a:128a-11: rgyud rnams kun las byung ba yang //
T02D2663a:128a-12: dbang po yis ni bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:128a-13: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i phyag
T02D2663a:128a-14: rgya lhung bzed dang gseg shang la sogs pa rgyud
T02D2663a:128a-15: las 'byung ba rnams ji ltar rigs par bya'o zhes
T02D2663a:128a-16: pa'o // da ni 'phags pa 'jam dbyangs la sogs
T02D2663a:128a-17: pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan
T02D2663a:128a-18: pa'i tshul du bzhugs pas bri bar bshad de /
T02D2663a:128a-19: de la chos nyan pa ni lugs kyi chos dang thob pa'i chos te /
T02D2663a:128a-20: lugs kyi chos ni zhal nas gsungs pa rnams so //
T02D2663a:128a-21: thob pa'i chos ni sku mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi
T02D2663a:128a-22: dkyil 'khor nang logs pa gnyis po nang du sku
T02D2663a:128a-23: bzhi po 'khor dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2663a:128a-24: de bas na de dag chud par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2663a:128a-25: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T02D2663a:128a-26: zhing mdun du byas pa'i tshul du bri bar bstan
T02D2663a:128a-27: te / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi pha
T02D2663a:128a-28: rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa she dag par
T02D2663a:128a-29: te / shes par bya'o // sngags pa de nas byung nas su //
T02D2663a:128a-30: cha gsum gtan la bab pa der //
T02D2663a:128a-31: mchog sbyin rdo rje bri ste zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:128a-32: kun nas 'khor bar sngags pa yis //
T02D2663a:128a-33: mtshan ma bzang po'i 'od kyis so //
T02D2663a:128a-35: shar phyogs kyi ngos kyi sgo khyud kyi nang du 'phags pa 'jam dbyangs bri bar bya ste /
T02D2663a:128a-36: de yang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:128a-37: chos thams cad kyi spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:128a-38: blos brtags shing dpyad nas chud par byed pa ste
T02D2663a:128a-39: / de bas na de ltar chud nas sgrib pa

T02D2663a:128a-41: phyi nas lho phyogs su bri ste /

T02D2663a:128a-43: bar ldan pa'i rang bzhin sa'i snying po byang phyogs
T02D2663a:128a-44: su bri ste / de ltar bzod pa dang dga'
T02D2663a:128a-45: bar ldan pa thob nas chos thams cad stong pa
T02D2663a:128b-0: nyid nam mkha' ltar chud pa'i rang bzhin nub @128b
T02D2663a:128b-2: rnam par grol ba'i rim pa de lta bas na /
T02D2663a:128b-3: dang po nyid du shar phyogs su shes rab kyi rang bzhin 'phags pa 'jam dpal bri'o //
T02D2663a:128b-4: mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal phyag na rdo rjes mchog byin te /
T02D2663a:128b-5: phyag na rdo rjes sngags kyi rgyud 'chad pa'i dbang
T02D2663a:128b-6: bskur te de ltar rdo rje mchog byin zhes bya'o
T02D2663a:128b-7: // zur phud lnga dang ldan pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:128b-8: gzhon nu bris pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa ni gzhon nu'i
T02D2663a:128b-9: sa 'dzin pa ste chos kyi rgyal po'i gzugs su
T02D2663a:128b-10: bzhugs pa'o // lag na autpala thogs pa ni rdo rje can te /
T02D2663a:128b-11: lag pa g-yon pa zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i
T02D2663a:128b-12: mtshan ma'i rdo rje'i autpala'i steng du gzhag pa lag
T02D2663a:128b-13: pa g-yon na thogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:128b-14: rdo rje ni mchog byin pa'o //
T02D2663a:128b-15: autpala ni shes rab kyi ral gri'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:128b-17: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi chos ston pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:128b-18: mtshan bzang ldan pa'i 'od kyis te //
T02D2663a:128b-19: zhes pa ni 'od 'phro ser po dang dkar po la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2663a:128b-20: nag po la sogs pa'i 'od med pa'o //
T02D2663a:128b-22: gzhon nu dra ba'i 'od can te //
T02D2663a:128b-23: lag na rin chen dra ba thogs //
T02D2663a:128b-24: padma dkar po'i stan la ste //
T02D2663a:128b-25: rgyal ba'i sras la lta bar bri //
T02D2663a:128b-26: zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'khor dra

T02D2663a:128b-28: su bri ste / dra ba'i 'od ces pa ni

T02D2663a:128b-30: pa dang ldan pa ni dra ba'i 'od ces bya
T02D2663a:128b-31: su bri ste / / lag na rin chen dra ba thogs //
T02D2663a:128b-32: zhes pa ni phyag dra ba 'dra ba la rin po ches spras pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:128b-33: padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni bla ma bye brag yod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:128b-34: rgyal ba'i sras la lta bar bri //
T02D2663a:128b-35: zhes pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid la lta bar bri ba'o //
T02D2663a:128b-36: mchog sbyin rdo rje g-yon rol du //
T02D2663a:128b-37: mngag gzhug ma ni lnga bri zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:128b-38: 'gugs pa zhes su bsgrags pa ste //
T02D2663a:128b-39: zhes pa'i bar du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'khor
T02D2663a:128b-40: mngag gzhug ma rnams ming gis smos pa lnga g-yon
T02D2663a:128b-42: blo can rnams kyis mngag pa rnams kyi ni //

T02D2663a:129a-0: zhes pa ni mngag gzhug ma de lnga'i g-yog ci bgyi zhes pa lnga mngag gzhug rnams @129a * //
T02D2663a:129a-1: kyi ma zad du bri bar bya'o //

T02D2663a:129a-12: du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bri

T02D2663a:129a-33: dpa' byang phyogs kyi ngos kyi sgo khyud kyi nang
T02D2663a:129a-35: bzod pa rab tu dga' ldan pa //

T02D2663a:129a-38: la bzang po dang pha rol gyi gnod pa byas
T02D2663a:129a-39: pa bzod pa'o // dga' bar ldan pa ni rang

T02D2663a:129b-14: / de dag las don gyi rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D2663a:129b-15: ming dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams
T02D2663a:129b-16: rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o //

T02D2663a:129b-19: dpa' bo gos kyang dkar po gyon //
T02D2663a:129b-20: lag na ral gri shin tu 'bar //
T02D2663a:129b-21: legs par 'dug pa bri ba ni //
T02D2663a:129b-22: rgyal sras padmo'i steng du ste //
T02D2663a:129b-23: zhes pa ni nub phyogs kyi ngos kyi sgo khyud
T02D2663a:129b-24: kyi nang du nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems
T02D2663a:129b-26: nam mkha'i snying po zhes pa ni chos thams cad
T02D2663a:129b-27: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur
T02D2663a:129b-28: gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' de las byung bas
T02D2663a:129b-29: na nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya'o //

T02D2663a:129b-31: dang do tsha ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan ma ste
T02D2663a:129b-33: ral gri ni de'i rnam par grol ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663a:129b-34: de yi 'khor du bsgrags pa ni //
T02D2663a:129b-35: zhes pa nas brtan pa'i blo zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:129b-36: nam mkha'i snying bo'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' don
T02D2663a:129b-37: gyi rjes su mthun pa'i ming dang ldan pa 'di
T02D2663a:129b-38: rnams go rims bzhin du g-yas g-yon du bri bar
T02D2663a:129b-39: bya'o // soms shig go rims bzhin du'o //
T02D2663a:129b-40: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad
T02D2663a:129b-41: pa'i rgyan de dag chos nyan pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:129b-42: dpa' chen po 'di rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing
T02D2663a:129b-44: rtag par lhan cig tu soms shig ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:129b-45: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sku mdog dang
T02D2663a:129b-46: phyag rgya la sogs pa 'dir gsal bar ma smos

T02D2663a:130a-0: // de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag pos @130a * //
T02D2663a:130a-1: 'khor de thams cad la bltas nas zhes pa nas /

T02D2663a:130a-6: nas de dag gi tshul dang yon tan la sogs

T02D2663a:130a-9: dkyil 'khor mthong ba mthu che ba bstan pa dang /
T02D2663a:130a-10: sngags slob pa yang mthu che ba bstan pa dang /
T02D2663a:130a-11: sngags nyan cing sems pa'i sgo nas dad pa mthu
T02D2663a:130a-12: che ba bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa
T02D2663a:130a-13: ste / de la sems dang ba rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2663a:130a-17: de la pags par song ba spur ldang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:130a-18: rus par song ba ni mchi ma 'byung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:130a-19: rkang du song ba ni tshig tu smra pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:130a-20: de bas na phyag na rdo rje sems shin tu
T02D2663a:130a-21: dad rkang du song ba dang ldan pas tshig tu
T02D2663a:130a-22: smras so // de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang
T02D2663a:130a-23: ba'i bdag pos 'khor de thams cad la bltas nas
T02D2663a:130a-24: smras so // zhes pa ni / 'khor de rnams
T02D2663a:130a-25: kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang
T02D2663a:130a-26: po la sogs pa yongs su dag pa sha stag

T02D2663a:130a-28: gyur tam ma gyur pa brtag pa la ni mi
T02D2663a:130a-29: smras so // zhes pa ni / bya'i / dad
T02D2663a:130a-30: pa'i shugs nyid kyis 'khor de rnams la bltas pa'o
T02D2663a:130a-31: smras so // zhes pa ni / bya'i / //
T02D2663a:130a-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ring zhig
T02D2663a:130a-33: tu ming mi 'dzums par bltas nas zhes pa yang
T02D2663a:130a-34: dad pa'i shugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la snying tshim
T02D2663a:130a-35: tshim du ring du bltas pa'o //
T02D2663a:130a-36: gleng gzhir gleng ba'i tshig 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D2663a:130a-37: zhes pa ni gzhan gyis ma dris par bdag nyid
T02D2663a:130a-39: dang ba'i shugs kyis tshig tu 'dor te smras pa'o //
T02D2663a:130a-40: kun mkhyen gal te 'jig rten du //
T02D2663a:130a-42: au du mb'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2663a:130a-43: brgya lam brgya lam gdod 'byung ba'o //
T02D2663a:130a-44: de bas shin tu 'byung dka' ba //
T02D2663a:130a-45: sngags spyad pa yi tshul 'di ste //
T02D2663a:130a-46: zhes pa ni sngags spyad pa shin tu dkon pa bstan pa ste /

T02D2663a:130b-1: yang au du mb'a ra'i me tog dang 'dra ba

T02D2663a:130b-3: brgya lam brgya lam na sngags kyi tshul 'chad pa
T02D2663a:130b-4: ni sngags spyod pa'i snod du gyur pa'i gdul ba
T02D2663a:130b-5: gzigs nas / gdod sngags kyi tshul ston pa na /
T02D2663a:130b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung na /
T02D2663a:130b-7: yang sngags spyod pa'i tshul ni brgya lam brgya lam
T02D2663a:130b-8: na 'byung ba yin pas na dkon no zhes te
T02D2663a:130b-9: / tshig de skad du smras pa yang phyag na
T02D2663a:130b-10: rdo rje nyid de ltar chud nas sems dad pa'i
T02D2663a:130b-12: sngags kyi tshul de ltar dkon zhing mthu che bar
T02D2663a:130b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2663a:130b-14: ro // thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten du skye
T02D2663a:130b-15: zhing 'byung ba'i dus nges pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:130b-16: sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi shing
T02D2663a:130b-17: drung du mngon par sangs rgyas te /
T02D2663a:130b-19: bskal pa dang lo grangs la sogs pa 'di srid cig lon /
T02D2663a:130b-20: 'phags pa byams pa 'jig rten du gdod 'byung ba yang /
T02D2663a:130b-21: dus 'di srid cig na 'byung ngo zhes nges par bshad na /
T02D2663a:130b-22: ci'i phyir brgya lam brgya lam na zhes ma nges pas smos she na /
T02D2663a:130b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dus
T02D2663a:130b-24: nges kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung
T02D2663a:130b-25: ba'i tshe / sems can rnams skal ba dang mi
T02D2663a:130b-26: ldan pas brgya lam brgya lam na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663a:130b-27: pa mngon par 'byung ste dus nges pa med do
T02D2663a:130b-28: ba'i tshe / // de bas na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663a:130b-29: pa 'jig rten du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'ba'
T02D2663a:130b-30: zhig la 'jig rten du 'byung zhes mi bya'i sems
T02D2663a:130b-31: can rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur cing mthong ba
T02D2663a:130b-33: brgya lam brgya lam zhes smos so //
T02D2663a:130b-34: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D2663a:130b-35: sdig pa ji snyed byas yod pa //
T02D2663a:130b-38: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba shin tu mthu che bar bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:130b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa sku mi zad pa'i rgyan la
T02D2663a:130b-40: sogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dkyil 'khor 'di mthong
T02D2663a:130b-41: bas / bskal pa du mar mi dge ba //
T02D2663a:130b-42: bcu la spyad pa'i sdig bsags pa //
T02D2663a:131a-0: zhes pa ste de 'byang bar 'gyur ba yang dkyil @131a * //
T02D2663a:131a-1: 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:131a-2: sbyor ba dang rtsa ba dang phyi ma dang gsum du ldan na 'byang bar 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:131a-3: de la sbyor ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2663a:131a-4: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2663a:131a-5: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2663a:131a-6: rtsa ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nyid kyi tshe byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2663a:131a-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gzugs dang /
T02D2663a:131a-9: phyag rgya la sogs pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan
T02D2663a:131a-10: dang lda ldi la sogs pa mthong nas sems dang
T02D2663a:131a-11: ba skyes pa'o // phyi ma ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos dang /
T02D2663a:131a-12: byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig mnos te /
T02D2663a:131a-13: rnam pa de dag gsum dang ldan par dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:131a-14: mthong na bskal ba du mar bsags pa'i sdig pa

T02D2663a:131a-17: ji smos grags pa mtha' yas pa'i //
T02D2663a:131a-18: sngags spyad cho ga gnas pa ste //
T02D2663a:131a-19: bla med gnas su 'gro ba ni //
T02D2663a:131a-20: mgon po sngags 'di zlos ba ste zhes pa ni sngags zlos pa mthu che ba bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:131a-21: dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang bskal ba du mar bsags pa'i sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur na /
T02D2663a:131a-22: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags yon tan
T02D2663a:131a-23: mtha' yas par grags pa ji skad du gsungs pa'i
T02D2663a:131a-24: cho ga dang ldan bar bslab pa goms bar byas
T02D2663a:131a-25: na bla na med pa'i gnas thob pa lta smos
T02D2663a:131a-27: de dag log bar 'gro chad pa //
T02D2663a:131a-28: sdug bsngal kun kyang 'byang ba ste //
T02D2663a:131a-29: gang gis spyad pa'i mchog 'di la //
T02D2663a:131a-31: zhes pa ni sngags spyad pa'i tshul la nyan cing
T02D2663a:131a-32: sems pa'i sgo nas dang pa mthu che bar bstan
T02D2663a:131a-33: pa ste / sngags spyad pa'i tshul dam pa 'di

T02D2663a:131a-35: gzhan ma yin no snyam nas blo gzhan du mi

T02D2663a:131a-37: du mi skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:131a-38: sngags spyad pa dang spyad pa'i tshul //
T02D2663a:131b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig @131b rnams ni sngar
T02D2663a:131b-1: lan mi nyung bar bshad zin pas na 'dir ma

T02D2663a:131b-5: la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams sngags spyod pa
T02D2663a:131b-6: la spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir smras so //

T02D2663a:131b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag mgrin gcig tu mthun
T02D2663a:131b-9: par tshig 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas

T02D2663a:131b-11: sngags rgyud rjes bzhin dang ba'o //

T02D2663a:131b-14: kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2663a:131b-15: pa 'khor de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa de
T02D2663a:131b-16: rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje'i dgongs pa 'di ltar
T02D2663a:131b-17: rig ste / dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i skabs su bab pa la /
T02D2663a:131b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu bre ba dang /
T02D2663a:131b-19: lha rnams so sor dgod pa la sogs pa ni
T02D2663a:131b-20: bshad zin gyi tshon byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge
T02D2663a:131b-21: 'dzin dang / sa tshon so so la sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663a:131b-23: ji ltar tshon zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2663a:131b-25: tshon gang sngon du gtang ba dang /
T02D2663a:131b-26: rta babs dang sgo khyud kyi tshad la sogs ba
T02D2663a:131b-27: ma bshad bas de dag dri ba'i phyir phyag na
T02D2663a:131b-28: rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra'o snyam
T02D2663a:131b-29: par rig nas tshig 'di skad smras pa ste /

T02D2663a:131b-31: rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag mgrin gcig tu mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni /

T02D2663a:131b-34: sngags kyi spyod pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:131b-35: dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa de rnams dgongs pa mthun
T02D2663a:131b-36: pas tshig dang don mthun par smras pa'o //
T02D2663a:131b-37: dge'o dge'o zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje don
T02D2663a:131b-38: de lta bur sems shing bcom ldan 'das la 'dri

T02D2663a:132a-0: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i yon @132a * //

T02D2663a:132a-5: dge'o dge'o zhes pa dang spyar ro //
T02D2663a:132a-6: phyag na rdo rje'i yid la bsams pa de tshig
T02D2663a:132a-7: tu ma smras na byang chub sems dpa' de dag
T02D2663a:132a-8: gis ji ltar rig ce na /

T02D2663a:132a-10: pha rol gyi sems rig pa dang 'dra bar phyag na rdo rjes ci bsams pa rnams shes so //
T02D2663a:132a-11: gnyis su na de lta bur dri ba'i skabs yin
T02D2663a:132a-12: pas phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa gzhan
T02D2663a:132a-13: glengs kyang bri bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di yin
T02D2663a:132a-14: par shes so // de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i dgongs pa shes pas na /
T02D2663a:132a-15: bdag can kun gyi dbang du gyur //
T02D2663a:132a-16: zhes pa ste dbang du gyur zhes pa'i don ni
T02D2663a:132a-17: khyod kyis ci bsams pa de nged kyis shes te

T02D2663a:132a-21: sngags spyad pa'i 'bras bu thob ba dag go zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:132a-22: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyang //

T02D2663a:132a-24: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' de rnams 'ba'
T02D2663a:132a-25: zhig ma yin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
T02D2663a:132a-26: byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis kyang
T02D2663a:132a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:132a-29: sngags rnams mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang ting nge
T02D2663a:132a-30: 'dzin ji ltar rtogs pa yang zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:132a-31: gong du zhu bar bsams pa'i dngos po rnams zhus

T02D2663a:132a-33: bshad pa'i nang du ma byung ba rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:132a-34: de skad ces gsol ba dang /

T02D2663a:132a-36: de bas rnam pa kun la yang //
T02D2663a:132a-37: stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya //

T02D2663a:132a-39: rnams kyi lan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa

T02D2663a:132b-5: sems can khams ni mgu rnyed pa //

T02D2663a:132b-11: dad pa skyes te mgu zhing zhen par 'gyur bas

T02D2663a:132b-14: ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu thob pa gzhan gyis thob pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:132b-15: rang gi sems yongs su shes pa las thob pa de bas na /
T02D2663a:132b-16: gsungs pa de ni sems kun zhes pas ni //
T02D2663a:132b-17: rnyed kyi gzhan las ma yin no //

T02D2663a:132b-20: bdag po rang gi sems ni sngon po yang ma
T02D2663a:132b-21: yin zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad du btsal
T02D2663a:132b-22: kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:132b-23: byang chub kyi sems bshad ba'i skabs su bshad zin
T02D2663a:132b-24: to // gnyis po yongs su spangs pa ni //
T02D2663a:132b-25: sangs rgyas rdzogs rnams de la dad //
T02D2663a:132b-26: stong pa chen por gsungs pa ni //
T02D2663a:132b-27: kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o ni kun du
T02D2663a:132b-28: sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de gnyis yongs su
T02D2663a:132b-30: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa dang stong pa'i rang bzhin du 'du shes gnyis spangs pa ste /
T02D2663a:132b-31: sa bcu gcig pa kun du bzang po'i sa la
T02D2663a:132b-32: gnas pa'i tshe chos thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663a:132b-33: no snyam nas stong par 'du shes pa de spangs
T02D2663a:132b-34: te / stong pa'i rang bzhin du yang yod pa
T02D2663a:132b-35: ma yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes tsam la gnas
T02D2663a:132b-36: te / pa ste / de bas na stong par
T02D2663a:132b-37: 'du shes pa yang spangs pas stong pa chen po
T02D2663a:132b-38: te / pa ste / zhes bya'o // kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'i //
T02D2663a:132b-39: zhes pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'i de ma
T02D2663a:132b-40: thag tu 'du shes tsam bo yang spangs pa'i mtshan
T02D2663a:132b-41: nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob bar 'gyur
T02D2663a:132b-42: te / kun du sangs rgyas pa de thams cad
T02D2663a:132b-43: mkhyen pa'i ye shes la spyor ba byed pas na
T02D2663a:132b-44: te / / kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa //
T02D2663a:133a-1: kun dul yang stong ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:133a-2: rtag tu dran par bya'o zhes pa ni de ltar
T02D2663a:133a-3: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin des thams cad
T02D2663a:133a-4: mkhyen pa rdzogs par byed pas na yan lag bzhis
T02D2663a:133a-6: bdag gi lhar sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663a:133a-7: dbang chen dang chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:133a-8: la sogs pa thams cad la 'di lta bu'i stod
T02D2663a:133a-9: pa nyid rtag tu goms par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:133a-10: da ni byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2663a:133a-11: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so so'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:133a-12: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhugs te /
T02D2663a:133a-13: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas byang chub sems
T02D2663a:133a-14: dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de rnams bstan
T02D2663a:133a-16: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad dang mol nas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:133a-17: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2663a:133a-18: ngas ni thams cad bshad pa yin zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663a:133a-19: du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun du
T02D2663a:133a-20: sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid dba' bo chen bo'i ting
T02D2663a:133a-21: nge 'dzin la gnas nas bdud bzhi bcom pa'i rang
T02D2663a:133a-22: bzhin 'chad de / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mol
T02D2663a:133a-23: nas zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa
T02D2663a:133a-24: mthun pas bya ba gcig tu bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:133a-25: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang /
T02D2663a:133a-26: sems can gyi don byed par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2663a:133a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa stobs mgyogs
T02D2663a:133a-28: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes
T02D2663a:133a-29: pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ste /
T02D2663a:133a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig tu zhes pa
T02D2663a:133a-31: ni sems can gyi don du spyod pa sna tshogs
T02D2663a:133a-32: 'byung yang / sangs rgyas thams cad rgyud gcig pa
T02D2663a:133a-33: las byung ba ni chos kyi ro gcig pa las
T02D2663a:133a-34: 'byung yang / byung ste / dper na me mar
T02D2663a:133a-35: mang po yang 'od 'dres par gyur na gcig ste
T02D2663a:133a-37: stobs zhes pa ni thogs ba med pa'i mthu'o //
T02D2663a:133a-38: mgyogs zhes pa ni mthu de sems can gyi don la myur pa'o //
T02D2663a:133a-39: snying por byang chub 'dug nas su //
T02D2663a:133a-40: bdud bzhi yang ni shin tu bcom //
T02D2663a:133a-42: sems can rnams la snying pa rtse'i phyir //
T02D2663a:133a-43: das ni thams cad bshad pa yin //
T02D2663a:133b-0: zhes pa'i bar kun du @133b sangs rgyas pa'i ting
T02D2663a:133b-1: nge 'dzin gong du bshad pa de nyid dpa' bo
T02D2663a:133b-2: chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas stong pa
T02D2663a:133b-3: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin des bdud bzhi bcom pa
T02D2663a:133b-5: bdud bzhi yang ni shin tu bcom //
T02D2663a:133b-6: zhes pa ni phung bo'i bdud dang /
T02D2663a:133b-9: lha'i bu'i bdud rnams bcom pa ste /
T02D2663a:133b-10: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:133b-11: de la kun rdzob tu bdud bzhi bcom pa ni
T02D2663a:133b-12: byang chub chen por lha'i bu'i bdud dang nyon mongs
T02D2663a:133b-14: phung po'i bdud dang 'chi ba'i bdud gnyis de'i zhar la bcom pa ste /
T02D2663a:133b-15: theg pa chung du'i lugs la grags pa'o //
T02D2663a:133b-16: skabs 'dir chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes par chud nas /
T02D2663a:133b-17: bdud rnam pa bzhi char yang dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis bcom ste /
T02D2663a:133b-18: ma skyes pa las sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:133b-19: de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:133b-20: dpa' bo chen po zhes kyang bya //
T02D2663a:133b-21: zhes pa'i bar du de ltar bdud rnam pa bzhi
T02D2663a:133b-22: bcom nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2663a:133b-23: lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la khyod ni dpa' bo
T02D2663a:133b-24: chen po 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o zhes dga' bzhin
T02D2663a:133b-26: nga ni dpa' bo chen po yin //
T02D2663a:133b-27: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663a:133b-28: ma skyes pa las ngas sangs rgyas //
T02D2663a:133b-29: zhes pa ni de ltar bdud rnam bzhi bcom pa
T02D2663a:133b-30: de dmigs pa dang bcas pas bcom pa ma yin
T02D2663a:133b-31: / chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung bar ngas
T02D2663a:133b-32: chud nas dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis zhes pa
T02D2663a:133b-33: / dang 'brel to // chos kyi dbyings kyi rol phyir yid //
T02D2663a:133b-34: ces pa ni tshon 'di rnams la chos kyi dbyings
T02D2663a:133b-35: dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin yi
T02D2663a:133b-36: ge rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02D2663a:133b-37: tshon 'dis chos kyi dbyings mtshon par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:133b-38: ro gcig pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ro zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:133b-39: de ltar yi ge rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa yang /
T02D2663a:133b-40: yi ge 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor skabs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:133b-41: tshon ni nang logs 'dug nas bri //
T02D2663a:133b-42: phyi rol 'dug nas tshon mi bri //
T02D2663a:133b-43: zhes ba ni ji lta bur na tshon zhes zhus pa'i lan te /
T02D2663a:134a-0: @134a * // sngags pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas nang du bsnur zhing tshon rnams bri zhe pa'o //
T02D2663a:134a-1: dkar po ni thog mar gtang /
T02D2663a:134a-2: de yi 'og tu dmar po ste //
T02D2663a:134a-3: de nas su ni ser po gtang //
T02D2663a:134a-4: de yi 'og tu sngon po gtang //
T02D2663a:134a-5: kun gyi nang rol nag po ste //
T02D2663a:134a-6: tshon 'gyed tshul smras de bzhin no //
T02D2663a:134a-8: de la gang gi thog mar gtang //
T02D2663a:134a-10: ci'i phyir de la tshon zhes bya //
T02D2663a:134a-12: dang por dris pa'i lan gnyis ka cig car bka' stsal pa ste /
T02D2663a:134a-13: tshon rnams de ltar dgye pa'i dgongs pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2663a:134a-14: dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:134a-15: de ltar chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa'i 'og tu
T02D2663a:134a-16: thabs kyi sgo nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i
T02D2663a:134a-17: snying rjes sems can la zhen pa'i rang bzhin dmar
T02D2663a:134a-18: po gtang ngo // de'i 'og tu sems can gyi
T02D2663a:134a-19: don de nyid rgyas par 'gyur te rgyas pa'i mtshan
T02D2663a:134a-20: nyid tshon ser po gtang ngo //
T02D2663a:134a-21: de ltar rgyas pa'i 'og tu thams cad byed nus par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:134a-22: de bas na de'i 'og tu tshon ljang gu kha dog thams cad pa gtang ngo //
T02D2663a:134a-23: de ltar las thams cad nus na gdu ga pa
T02D2663a:134a-24: dang ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba mngon par spyod
T02D2663a:134a-25: pa'i mtshan nyid kha dog nag po gtang ste /
T02D2663a:134a-26: thams cad ni nang rol du gtang ba ni gsang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:134a-27: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur byin gyis brlab
T02D2663a:134a-28: pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'i yi ge 'khor lo
T02D2663a:134a-29: bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:134a-30: rta babs tshad ni zhes pa nas //
T02D2663a:134a-31: dpa' bas rim gyis che bar ro //
T02D2663a:134a-33: rta babs rnams kyi tshad dang ni ;
T02D2663a:134a-34: / sgo khyud rnams kyang de bzhin te //
T02D2663a:134a-35: sgo rnams kyang ni rig par bya //
T02D2663a:134a-36: mgon pos de dag 'dra ba yi //
T02D2663a:134a-37: tshad gsungs zhes zhus pa'i lan te //
T02D2663a:134a-38: rta babs kyi ni tshad kyang ni //
T02D2663a:134a-39: dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i tshad du bya //
T02D2663a:134a-40: zhes pa ni rta babs kyi zheng gi tshad snying
T02D2663a:134a-41: po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngos dang mnyam par bya zhes
T02D2663a:134a-42: pa'o // sgo khyud padmor mnyam pa sor bcu drug
T02D2663a:134a-43: tu bcas pa zhes pa ni sgo khyud kyang rta
T02D2663a:134a-44: babs kyi tshad byed de de dang mnyam par bya'o
T02D2663a:134a-45: pa'o // // thog mar sgo rnams rig par bya ba dkyil 'khor mnyam par te /
T02D2663a:134a-46: de las skyed par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:134b-0: dpa' bas che bar ro zhes pa ni @134b nang
T02D2663a:134b-1: gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo snying po padmo sor bcu
T02D2663a:134b-2: drug pa dang mnyam par bya /
T02D2663a:134b-3: de'i phyi ma de la sor bzhis skyed /
T02D2663a:134b-4: de'i phyi rim yang sor bzhis skyed de /
T02D2663a:134b-5: de ltar rim gyis rim gyis che bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:134b-6: sgo rnams kyi ni bar bar du //
T02D2663a:134b-7: sgo srung rnams ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2663a:134b-8: zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i pha rol tshu rol
T02D2663a:134b-9: gyi ngos su 'og nas smos pa'i sgo srung rnams
T02D2663a:134b-10: gzhag ste / sh'akya thub pa'i sgo srung ni sngar
T02D2663a:134b-11: tshang bar gsungs zin pas 'og nas 'byung ba mi
T02D2663a:134b-12: gzhag ste / snyag go // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo srung yang /
T02D2663a:134b-13: thub dka' ba dang mngon du ba //
T02D2663a:134b-14: zhes pa gnyis tshang bar gsungs pas 'og nas 'byung
T02D2663a:134b-15: ba'i rnam pa las ming gis smos med pa 'di
T02D2663a:134b-17: sems mgu ba ni ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2663a:134b-18: mdor bshad pa ni de yin no zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:134b-19: ting nge 'dzin ji ltar rtogs pa yang zhes zhus
T02D2663a:134b-20: pa'i lan te / de la ting nge 'dzin zhes
T02D2663a:134b-21: bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de
T02D2663a:134b-22: pa'i lan te / / de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa la rtse gcig pa ni /
T02D2663a:134b-23: chu dang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la sems rtse gcig par dmigs pa'o //
T02D2663a:134b-24: don dam pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs
T02D2663a:134b-25: pa stong pa'i rang bzhin la sems rtse gcig pa
T02D2663a:134b-26: ste / gnyis gang yang rung ba la ting nge
T02D2663a:134b-27: 'dzin rtse gcig tu gyur pa sems gud du mi
T02D2663a:134b-28: 'gyur bar zhen cing tshim par byed pa ni /
T02D2663a:134b-29: sems mgu ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:134b-30: de ni ting nge 'dzin spyi'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663a:134b-31: khyad par du ni sems dpa' che //
T02D2663a:134b-32: nyon cig pa yi yid kyis te //
T02D2663a:134b-34: de bas rnam pa kun la yang //
T02D2663a:134b-35: stong nyid rtag par dran par bya'o //
T02D2663a:134b-36: zhes pa'i bar du ni don dam pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par du bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:134b-37: de yang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2663a:134b-38: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2663a:134b-39: de las sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni sangs
T02D2663a:134b-40: rgyas kun gyi stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:134b-41: zhes rgyal bas gsungs zhes ba ste /
T02D2663a:134b-42: de la stong pa nyid ces pa ni /
T02D2663a:134b-43: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:134b-44: chos rnams thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung ba'i
T02D2663a:134b-45: tshul bshig gam rdul phra mol sogs pa'i tshul bshig
T02D2663a:134b-46: na yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2663a:135a-1: kyi ji bzhin par snang ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2663a:135a-2: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid med par chud pa ni stong pa nyid de /
T02D2663a:135a-3: de ltar chos rnams so so'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du chud de /
T02D2663a:135a-4: stong ba'i rang bzhin de las sems gzhan du mi
T02D2663a:135a-5: 'gyur zhing de nyid la rtse gcig par gyur pa
T02D2663a:135a-6: ni sa bcu rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2663a:135a-7: kyi ting nge 'dzin de thob ste /
T02D2663a:135a-8: de'i tshe sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:135a-9: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha yongs su
T02D2663a:135a-10: sbangs pa'i stong pa nyid sa rab tu dga' pa
T02D2663a:135a-11: de dag gi tshe na ma thob pa ma yin
T02D2663a:135a-12: mod kyi / sa rab tu dga' ba nas sa
T02D2663a:135a-13: brgyad pa'i bar du log pa'i gnyen po yongs su
T02D2663a:135a-14: ma spangs pas lhun gyis grub pa nyid du mi
T02D2663a:135a-15: 'jug pa'i phyir de dag la mi bya /
T02D2663a:135a-16: sa brgyad pa yan chad log pa'i gnyen po rnams spangs te lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas na /
T02D2663a:135a-17: sa brgyad sa dgu sa bcu la spyor ro //
T02D2663a:135a-19: ma skyes pa la sangs sangs rgyas //
T02D2663a:135a-20: zhes pa ni dngos su na chos thams cad thog
T02D2663a:135a-21: mnas ma skyes par chud pas phung po yang dmigs
T02D2663a:135a-22: su med pa'i phyir phung po'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2663a:135a-23: dag gi spyod yul dang bral zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:135a-24: rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pas dngos su lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2663a:135a-25: nyes pa kun nas rnam par grol //
T02D2663a:135a-26: zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol
T02D2663a:135a-27: bas dngos sa na nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa'o
T02D2663a:135a-28: // rgyu dang rkyen du bral ba ste //
T02D2663a:135a-29: zhes pa ni rgyu rkyen med pas na ma skyes pas 'chi ba med de /
T02D2663a:135a-30: dngos su ma 'chi ba'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2663a:135a-31: ye shes nam mkha' stong pa 'dra //
T02D2663a:135a-32: zhes pa ni de ltar rnam pa bzhi char las
T02D2663a:135a-33: grol bas na ji bzhin pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:135a-34: rang bzhin gyis 'od dangs pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:135a-35: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ma skyes zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:135a-36: ji ltar 'byung ba nga yis byung //
T02D2663a:135a-37: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de
T02D2663a:135a-38: lta bur phyin ci ma log pa nyid du ngas
T02D2663a:135a-39: thob ces pa'o // shin tu dri ma med pa
T02D2663a:135a-40: zhes pa ni ye shes de shes bya dang nyon
T02D2663a:135a-41: mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su spangs pa zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:135a-42: thob ces pa'o // // de kho na zhes pa
T02D2663a:135a-43: ni phyin ci ma log pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2663a:135a-44: mtshan nyid pas rigs pa dang gzhung gis sun dbyung
T02D2663a:135b-0: du mi nus pas na stod @135b pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:135b-1: ye shes de kho na zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:135b-2: ming ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid ces pa ni kun
T02D2663a:135b-3: du sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba de stong pa'i
T02D2663a:135b-4: rang bzhin du 'du shes pa yang spangs nas stong
T02D2663a:135b-5: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du yang yod pa yin
T02D2663a:135b-6: par shes pa'i 'du shes de tsam la gnas pa
T02D2663a:135b-7: zhes pa'o // de bsad [?] ni yang dag nyid ;
T02D2663a:135b-8: / byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu yis ni //
T02D2663a:135b-9: yi ge 'bru ru smras pa ni //
T02D2663a:135b-10: 'jig rten du ni snang byed pa //
T02D2663a:135b-11: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2663a:135b-12: ngas ni thams cad bshad pa yin //
T02D2663a:135b-13: zhes pa ni de ltar ngas thams cad thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar chud kyang /
T02D2663a:135b-14: sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dag
T02D2663a:135b-15: pa nyid kyis chos de'i tshig tu brjod pa'i phyir
T02D2663a:135b-16: yi ge'i 'bru rnams su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663a:135b-17: yi ge'i 'bru rnams kyang dpa' bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:135b-18: 'di rnams kyi rim pa yang bsdus pa'i don gyi nang du bshad pas shin tu ma bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:135b-19: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ngo mtshar
T02D2663a:135b-20: du gyur nas mig gdangs te spyo bos phyag 'tshal
T02D2663a:135b-21: nas tshig 'di skad gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:135b-22: gong du sangs rgyas dang kun du sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D2663a:135b-23: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid 'phro ba med pa'i
T02D2663a:135b-24: chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis chud la 'phro ba dang
T02D2663a:135b-25: bcas pa'i chos rnams yig 'bru la sogs pa'i sgo
T02D2663a:135b-26: nas bstod cing bshad pa de ngo mtshar che bar
T02D2663a:135b-29: sangs rgyas kun kyang ngo mtshar che //
T02D2663a:135b-31: sngags kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang ni //
T02D2663a:135b-32: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa ste //
T02D2663a:135b-35: sangs rgyas kun kyang ngo mtshar che //
T02D2663a:135b-36: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang kun sangs rgyas yang
T02D2663a:135b-37: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun kyang 'phro ba
T02D2663a:135b-38: med pa'i chos chud nas 'phro ba dang bcas pa
T02D2663a:135b-39: chos 'chad pas na ngo mtshar che zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:135b-40: thabs dang shes rab bsam mi khyab //
T02D2663a:135b-41: ces pa ni shes rab ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du chud pa'o //
T02D2663a:135b-42: thabs ni stong pa nyid kyi chos te yi ge'i 'bru la sogs pa bstan nas /
T02D2663a:135b-43: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la sogs pa 'grub pa dang /
T02D2663a:135b-44: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa'i sgo
T02D2663a:135b-45: nas sems can rnams 'jud par byed pa de ni
T02D2663a:135b-46: thabs dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D2663a:136a-2: chos dang sangs rgyas rang byung ba'o //
T02D2663a:136a-3: de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'phro ba med pa'i
T02D2663a:136a-4: chos chud nas zhes pa ste sangs rgyas zhes pa
T02D2663a:136a-6: de ltar 'phro ba med ba'i don chud nas 'jig
T02D2663a:136a-7: rten pa kun re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya
T02D2663a:136a-8: ba'i phyir chos de 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar che'o
T02D2663a:136a-10: rang byung ba zhes pa ni sa brgyad pa yan
T02D2663a:136a-11: chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyis mi
T02D2663a:136a-12: bkri ba'i phyir rang byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:136a-13: sngags kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang sngags kyi tshul la
T02D2663a:136a-14: gnas zhes pa ni de ltar 'phro ba med pa'i
T02D2663a:136a-15: chos chud nas 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i chos 'chad
T02D2663a:136a-16: bas na / sngags kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang kun
T02D2663a:136a-17: rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis ka la
T02D2663a:136a-18: bas na / gnas pa ste / don dam pa'i
T02D2663a:136a-19: bden pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no
T02D2663a:136a-20: bas na / gnas pa ste / // kun rdzob
T02D2663a:136a-21: kyi bden pa ni grub pa mchog la sogs pa
T02D2663a:136a-22: bas na / gnas pa ste / // dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed ba'o //
T02D2663a:136a-23: sems can kun gyis shes na yang //
T02D2663a:136a-25: zhes pa ni sngags kyi tshul de lta bus grub pa la sogs par ma gyur kyang /
T02D2663a:136a-26: sems can rnams kyis mnyan pa dang bsams ba tsam
T02D2663a:136a-27: gyi sgo nas ba tsam gyis kyang 'jig rten pa
T02D2663a:136a-28: rnams kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:136a-29: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po skye ba gcig gis
T02D2663a:136a-30: thogs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa
T02D2663a:136a-31: nas / dgos pa'i sa la gnas pa ni //
T02D2663a:136a-32: de dag sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
T02D2663a:136a-33: zhes pa'i bar du sa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2663a:136a-34: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi sal gnas pa
T02D2663a:136a-35: de chos rnams ma byung ma skyes pa stong pa
T02D2663a:136a-36: nyid kyi rang bzhin du chud nas /
T02D2663a:136a-37: sems can gyi don du thabs kyi 'khor los bya
T02D2663a:136a-38: ba yod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:136a-39: bshad pa ste / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
T02D2663a:136a-40: zhes pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2663a:136a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la chos kyi rgyal tshab
T02D2663a:136a-42: kyi sar skye ba gcig pus thogs ba zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:136a-43: bshad pa ste / // gnyis su mas bcu'i byang
T02D2663a:136a-44: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa bcu nyid du ris
T02D2663a:136a-45: mthun par gyur pas bcu pa rnams rigs gcig pa
T02D2663a:136a-46: bshad pa ste / // zhes pa'o // de dag don dang bral ba ni //
T02D2663a:136a-47: 'jig rten gyi ni mtshan shes nas //
T02D2663a:136a-48: don gyi sa la gnas pa ni //
T02D2663a:136b-0: de dag sangs rgyas @136b la gnas so //
T02D2663a:136b-1: zhes pa ni 'jig rten rnams gang gi 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
T02D2663a:136b-2: rgyu gang las kyang ma byung bas thog ma nas
T02D2663a:136b-3: ma skyes par chud kyang bya ba'i sa la gnas
T02D2663a:136b-4: te / sems can rnams kyi don du sbyar ba dang /
T02D2663a:136b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan ba la sogs pa mdzad pas na /
T02D2663a:136b-6: sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:136b-7: dpa' de rnams bya ba'i sa la gnas pa ste
T02D2663a:136b-8: / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa
T02D2663a:136b-9: sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ting
T02D2663a:136b-11: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:136b-12: 'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes te //
T02D2663a:136b-14: zhes pa'i bar dus brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:136b-16: chos rnams kun ni ma rnyed de //
T02D2663a:136b-17: zhes pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis shin tu dngos po med do //
T02D2663a:136b-18: dmigs su med par chud ces pa ni tshes rnams
T02D2663a:136b-19: dngos po med par de sngon yod pa las zhig
T02D2663a:136b-21: dngos po med pa'am 'on te thog ma nas ma
T02D2663a:136b-22: byung ma sems skyes pas dngos po med ce na
T02D2663a:136b-24: byung dang skye ba yongs su bral //
T02D2663a:136b-25: zhes pa ste thog ma nas ma skyes pas slar 'byung ba yang mi 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:136b-26: thog ma nas ma byung ma skyes pas dngos po med par shes so //
T02D2663a:136b-27: 'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes te //
T02D2663a:136b-28: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par chud pas /
T02D2663a:136b-29: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kun rdzob tu snang bar
T02D2663a:136b-30: 'gyur pa yang dngos po med pa las snang ba
T02D2663a:136b-31: ste ji ltar sgyu ma dngos po med pa las
T02D2663a:136b-32: snang ba ltar shes so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:136b-33: 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang po zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:136b-34: de ltar chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes
T02D2663a:136b-35: pas byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten pa'i nang
T02D2663a:136b-36: na gtso bo dam par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:136b-37: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyan thos pa rnams
T02D2663a:136b-38: zhes pas dngos po shin tu med pa'i ye shes
T02D2663a:136b-39: mi spyod de / nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:136b-40: gyi tshul lo zhes pa'i bar du 'phags pa nyan
T02D2663a:136b-41: thos pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa ste
T02D2663a:136b-42: mi spyod de / / 'phags pa nyan thos pa
T02D2663a:136b-43: rnams ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgyu
T02D2663a:137a-1: nyid skye ba dang 'jig par lta ste dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2663a:137a-2: de ltar skye ba dang 'jig pa yod pas rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis bshig pa dang /
T02D2663a:137a-3: skye ba yod par mthong bas chad pa'i mtha' bshig ste /
T02D2663a:137a-4: 'jig pa yod par mthong bas rtag pa'i mtha' bshig go //
T02D2663a:137a-5: de ltar skye ba dang 'jig pa yod par mthong
T02D2663a:137a-6: bas chos rnams shin tu dngos po med par mthong
T02D2663a:137a-7: ba'i ye shes mi skye ste /
T02D2663a:137a-8: shin tu dngos po med cing ye shes skye ba'i rgyu ma rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:137a-9: gsang ba'i bdag po rang sangs rgyas rnams ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:137a-10: de ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:137a-11: gyi tshul lo zhes khyad par 'phags pa rang sangs
T02D2663a:137a-12: rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bshad pa
T02D2663a:137a-13: ste / rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D2663a:137a-14: zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu sun 'byin pa'i tshul du rnam par bshig ces pa ste /
T02D2663a:137a-15: chos rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi ngo bo
T02D2663a:137a-16: skad cig ma'i cha mi rtag pa gnas pa ni
T02D2663a:137a-17: khab kyi rtse la yungs kar gyi 'bras bu mi
T02D2663a:137a-19: brtag mi bzod pas rgyu dang 'bras bu dngos po med par chud do //
T02D2663a:137a-20: brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa'i
T02D2663a:137a-21: ye shes 'byung ngo zhes pa ni de ltar chos
T02D2663a:137a-22: rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis brjod du
T02D2663a:137a-23: med par mthong ba'i ye shes skyes nas /
T02D2663a:137a-24: tshig tu brjod pa yang 'gog par byed de /
T02D2663a:137a-25: de bas na gsungs pa chos thams cad brjod du
T02D2663a:137a-26: med pa'o zhes shin tu ngag dgag pa'i ting nge
T02D2663a:137a-28: mdor na 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po bshig nas /
T02D2663a:137a-29: rang bzhin med par mthong bas chos la bdag med
T02D2663a:137a-30: par chud kyang ngag dgag pa tsam la gnas pas
T02D2663a:137a-31: byang chub sems dpa' ltar ji bzhin pa med pa'i
T02D2663a:137a-32: ye shes kyi snang ba la mi dmigs so //
T02D2663a:137a-33: nyan thos ltar chud pa gang zag la bdag med pa ltar chud pa tsam yang ma yin no //
T02D2663a:137a-34: gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po 'jig rten pa rnams
T02D2663a:137a-35: ni rgyu las 'bras bu dang las byung ba yang
T02D2663a:137a-36: rung / 'jig rten kyang rung dbang gzhan la las pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:137a-37: stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te de ni 'jig
T02D2663a:137b-0: rten gyi ting @137b nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo zhes
T02D2663a:137b-1: pa ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:137b-2: gyi tshul te / 'jig rten pa rnams ni las
T02D2663a:137b-3: dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgyu las skyes kyang
T02D2663a:137b-4: gyi tshul te / / nged kyi bdag ces bya
T02D2663a:137b-5: ba dbang po dang tshangs pa la sogs pas bskyed
T02D2663a:137b-6: gyi tshul te / / par chud / chos thams
T02D2663a:137b-7: cad dngos po med de stong pa nyid du mthong
T02D2663a:137b-8: pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin
T02D2663a:137b-9: gyi tshul te / / par chud / gyi /
T02D2663a:137b-10: dbang po la sogs pas stong par byas so snyam
T02D2663a:137b-11: nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas
T02D2663a:137b-12: gyi tshul te / / par chud / gyi /
T02D2663a:137b-13: par byed do // gsang ba'i bdag po ting nge
T02D2663a:137b-14: 'dzin gyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes pa nas
T02D2663a:137b-15: gyi tshul te / / par chud / gyi /
T02D2663a:137b-16: par byed do // / 'jig rten gyi lha yang
T02D2663a:137b-17: rung ste su sngags spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:137b-18: gang la gnas te tshul gyi cho ga 'chang na
T02D2663a:137b-19: sems can rnams la phan par byed pa zhes pa'i
T02D2663a:137b-20: bar du gong du bshad pa rnams kyi sdud pa'i
T02D2663a:137b-21: tshig ste / de dag so so'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:137b-22: stong pa nyid kyi tshul du chud nas stong pa
T02D2663a:137b-24: stong pa'i chos de nyid tshig dang yig 'brul la sogs pas ston cing 'chad pa ni /
T02D2663a:137b-25: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2663a:137b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663a:137b-28: gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
T02D2663a:137b-29: to // sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:137b-30: rang sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin te //
T02D2663a:137b-31: de yi khyad par bshad pa ni //
T02D2663a:137b-32: ting 'dzin bye brag rig bya ba //
T02D2663a:137b-33: rnam par las dang tshe sbyong ba'o //
T02D2663a:137b-34: zhes pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dang kun
T02D2663a:137b-35: du sangs rgyas pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2663a:137b-36: sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams
T02D2663a:137b-37: kyi so so'i sngags kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ste
T02D2663a:137b-38: / sngags kyi mtshan nyid de yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
T02D2663a:137b-42: de la sngags kyi lha ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad zin te /
T02D2663a:137b-43: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2663a:137b-44: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2663a:137b-45: chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:137b-46: la sogs pa rnams nyid snying rje chen po'i dkyil
T02D2663a:137b-47: 'khor du rigs gsum bkod pa rnams ni de bzhin
T02D2663a:137b-48: gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor bar ma na sh'akya thub pa
T02D2663a:137b-49: 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs pa ni kun du sangs
T02D2663a:138a-1: 'khor tha ma na 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs
T02D2663a:138a-2: pa sa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:138a-3: dpa' gtso bo bzhugs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas rnams
T02D2663a:138a-4: so // de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rin chen la sogs pa ni /
T02D2663a:138a-5: byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni dngos su ma smos kyang /
T02D2663a:138a-6: sprul pa'i skus 'dul ba'i nang du bdog pas na
T02D2663a:138a-7: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i nang du 'dus par rig par
T02D2663a:138a-8: bya'o // 'jig rten pa rnams kyang dkyil 'khor bar
T02D2663a:138a-9: ma de nyid kyi nang na dngos pos 'khor ba'o
T02D2663a:138a-10: bya'o // // sngags kyi don ni kun du sangs
T02D2663a:138a-11: rgyas ba nas 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi bar
T02D2663a:138a-12: gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gong du bshad pa ste
T02D2663a:138a-13: bya'o // // / de yang kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:138a-14: don dam ni rnam par grol ba'i stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:138a-15: kun rdzob ni don gyi sa la gnas zhes pa
T02D2663a:138a-16: la sogs pa sems can gyi don du chos 'chad
T02D2663a:138a-17: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan stobs
T02D2663a:138a-18: dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi
T02D2663a:138a-19: pa dang / chos rnams so // sngags kyi rang
T02D2663a:138a-20: bzhin yang rnam pa med pa bzhin shes par bya
T02D2663a:138a-21: pa dang / chos rnams so // ste / tshig
T02D2663a:138a-22: dang 'bru dang dbyangs dang yul gyi skad rnams so
T02D2663a:138a-23: pa dang / chos rnams so // ste / //
T02D2663a:138a-24: de la tshig ni yi ge'i 'bru mang po 'byung
T02D2663a:138a-25: pa dang / chos rnams so // ste / // / 'dus pa las tshig tu langs par smra'o //
T02D2663a:138a-26: 'bru ni yi ge ka la sogs pa sngags kyi yi ge 'bru re ba'o //
T02D2663a:138a-27: dbyangs ni yi ge aa dang ai la sogs pa gug skyed kyi ris su gtogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:138a-28: yul skad ni so so'i yul na skad gang gis
T02D2663a:138a-29: spyod spyad pa de nyid dang mthun par gsungs pa'o
T02D2663a:138a-30: // sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig pa ni /
T02D2663a:138a-31: sngar sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa de dang /
T02D2663a:138a-32: ngas bshad kyis nyon cig pa ste /
T02D2663a:138a-33: sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ces mi smos par sngags
T02D2663a:138a-34: rnams kyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid ces smos pa ni
T02D2663a:138a-35: sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid sngags kyi lha dang sngags
T02D2663a:138a-36: kyi don gong du bshad pas na /
T02D2663a:138a-37: da 'dir sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid gsang
T02D2663a:138a-38: bar smra ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshig rnams nyon cig
T02D2663a:138a-39: ces pa'o // kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sngags rnams
T02D2663a:138a-40: ni chig las kyang ming dang mtshan mar rtogs shes
T02D2663a:138a-41: pa ni dzin dzik ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D2663a:138b-0: smos pas @138b 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ming gi
T02D2663a:138b-1: ces pa'o // mtshan ma ste / sangs rgyas kyi sngags shes par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:138b-2: tshig de rnams ni dbang gi yin pas //
T02D2663a:138b-3: sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa'o //
T02D2663a:138b-4: zhes pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sngags kyi
T02D2663a:138b-5: tshig smos pa yang dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:138b-7: rgyas ba'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:138b-8: kha cig skul ba'i tshig dang ni //
