T02D2663a:138b-9: rang ming thog mar bcas pa'o //
T02D2663a:138b-10: zhes pa ni sngags kyi tshig las sngags kyi lha'i mthu dang yon tan rnams smos pa dang /
T02D2663a:138b-11: zhi bar gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa'i las rnams skul ba smos pa dang /
T02D2663a:138b-12: dzin dzik ces pa la sogs pa lha'i mtshan smos
T02D2663a:138b-13: pas lha gang gi sngags yin pa rig par 'gyur
T02D2663a:138b-14: ba'o // h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa dang
T02D2663a:138b-15: ldan pa'i tshig rnams ni gong du gtsug tor brgyad
T02D2663a:138b-16: smos pa la sogs pa'i sngags su shes par bya
T02D2663a:138b-17: ba'o // ste / gtsug tor gyi sngags rnams gzhung gzhan las h'um dang phat med pa yang 'byung /
T02D2663a:138b-18: gtsug tor gyi ma yin pa'i lha rnams kyi sngags
T02D2663a:138b-19: h'um dang phat du bcas pa yang 'byung bas na
T02D2663a:138b-20: / h'um dang phat du bcas pa'i gtsug tor gyi
T02D2663a:138b-21: sngags 'di rnams ni rgyud 'di nyid du smos par
T02D2663a:138b-22: / shes par bya'o // zung choms zhes pa rnams dang /
T02D2663a:138b-23: snun cig sod cig khos shig pa dang khro bo
T02D2663a:138b-24: dang ni ci bgyi zhes pa ni tshig de lta
T02D2663a:138b-25: bu drag shul can dang ldan pa ni /
T02D2663a:138b-26: sngags ni khro bo rnams dang ci bgyi zhes ba rnams kyi sngags su shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:138b-27: na ma:sv'a h'a la sogs pa dang ldan zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:138b-28: mgon po byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2663a:138b-29: zhes pa'i bar du ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i
T02D2663a:138b-30: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang
T02D2663a:138b-31: / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngags te /
T02D2663a:138b-32: mgon phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan zhing tshig mjug sv'a h'a dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2663a:138b-33: byang chub sems dpa' so so'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi tshig rnams smos pa dang /
T02D2663a:138b-34: zung zhig choms shig pa la sogs pa'i tshig drag
T02D2663a:138b-35: shul can rnams med pa zhi ba'i tshig rnam par
T02D2663a:138b-36: dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D2663a:138b-37: ni / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:138b-38: nyan thos rnams kyi sngags ni tshig re re la 'jug pa ste zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:139a-1: sngags rnams ni spyi bo dang gtsug phud la sogs
T02D2663a:139a-2: pa yan lag gi sngags rnams med pas na gcig
T02D2663a:139a-3: pu'o // byang chub sems dpa' ltar gzugs sna tshogs su mi 'gyur gyi /
T02D2663a:139a-4: dge slong gi tshul gcig pu 'dzin pa'am /
T02D2663a:139a-5: gang zag la bdag med pa gcig pu chud pa ni gcig pu 'dug pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:139a-6: rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin te /
T02D2663a:139a-7: de'i khyad par bshad pa ni ting nge 'dzin bye
T02D2663a:139a-8: brag rig par bya ba rnam par sbyor bar bya'o
T02D2663a:139a-9: zhes pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sngags rnams kyang
T02D2663a:139a-10: mtshan nyid gzhan ni nyan thos kyi dang mthun te
T02D2663a:139a-11: / khyad par du ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bshig
T02D2663a:139a-12: nas chos rnams stong par chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:139a-13: dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:139a-14: de la 'dir kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs
T02D2663a:139a-15: pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663a:139a-16: sngags kyi mtshan nyid ci'i phyir dngos su ma smos
T02D2663a:139a-17: she na / kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sngags de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste /
T02D2663a:139a-19: kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa de rnams
T02D2663a:139a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa las byung ba
T02D2663a:139a-21: yin na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang tha mi dad /
T02D2663a:139a-22: 'on te ye shes kyi sems can yin yang /
T02D2663a:139a-23: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'bras bu yin pas
T02D2663a:139a-24: tha mi dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags so
T02D2663a:139a-25: // don dam par byang chub sems dpa' yang de
T02D2663a:139a-26: bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge 'bru re re
T02D2663a:139a-27: pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong pa
T02D2663a:139a-28: nyid kyi rang bzhin du ston par gcig pas na
T02D2663a:139a-30: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags rnams ni snying
T02D2663a:139a-31: po yi ge aa rnam pa bzhi rnams 'og nas
T02D2663a:139a-32: bshad pa'o // 'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po sngags
T02D2663a:139a-33: rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
T02D2663a:139a-34: bshad pa'o // ma byas / byed du ma bcug
T02D2663a:139a-35: / rjes su smos pa ma yin no zhes pa
T02D2663a:139a-36: bshad pa'o // ma byas / nas / sngags kyi
T02D2663a:139a-37: cho ga kun rab tu 'chad do zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663a:139a-38: du sngags rnams kyi rang bzhin bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:139a-39: tshig las ming dang mtshan mar rtog pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:139a-40: kyi sngags bskul pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D2663a:139a-41: tshig gis don gang bskul ba de grub par byed
T02D2663a:139a-42: pa'i mthu'i rang bzhin rnams mthu 'dis don 'di 'grub
T02D2663a:139a-43: par bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas sngags kyi rang
T02D2663a:139a-44: bzhin te byas pa yin nam /
T02D2663a:139b-0: @139b de bzhin du gzhan la byed du bcug gam /
T02D2663a:139b-1: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang na yang
T02D2663a:139b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mtshan ma dang bral
T02D2663a:139b-3: bas / byed du bcug pa'am rjes su yi rang ba ma yin te /
T02D2663a:139b-5: sngags kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad par
T02D2663a:139b-6: gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can
T02D2663a:139b-7: thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na /
T02D2663a:139b-8: bsgrub par brtsam pa thams cad kyi nges par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:139b-9: de ltar sgrub pa thams cad kyis 'grub pa ma
T02D2663a:139b-10: yin pas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa ma yin
T02D2663a:139b-12: sngags kyi mthu'i don dang mthu gnyis rtag tu gcig la gcig 'brel pa yin na /
T02D2663a:139b-13: tshig brjod pa tsam gyis don de nyid 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:139b-14: dper na me zhes tshig tu brjod na me'i rang
T02D2663a:139b-15: bzhin sreg par byed pa yin yang tshig tu brjod
T02D2663a:139b-16: pas kha 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
T02D2663a:139b-17: de bas na sngags kyi mthu de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa yang ma yin ;
T02D2663a:139b-19: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:139b-21: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu'o //
T02D2663a:139b-22: de 'di lta ste yang dag par gshegs pa byung ba yang rung /
T02D2663a:139b-25: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu yongs su 'jug pa yin te /
T02D2663a:139b-26: 'di lta ste sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:139b-27: du zhes pa ni tshig las don ming dang mtshan
T02D2663a:139b-28: mar rtog pa'i sngags de bskul ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:139b-29: tshig dang don du ldan na yang bskul pa'i don
T02D2663a:139b-30: de nyid sus kyang byas pa ma yin te /
T02D2663a:139b-31: rgyu gzhan la mi ltos par chos de ltar yi nas 'dug pa ni /
T02D2663a:139b-32: dper na bu ram gyi ro mngar ba dang lan tshva'i ro bro ba'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:139b-33: rgyu gang gis kyang 'dus ma byas par mngar ba'i rang bzhin ye nas 'dug pa bzhin no //
T02D2663a:139b-34: de ste de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa ma yin nam /
T02D2663a:139b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba na sngags kyi rang bzhin de yang yod /
T02D2663a:139b-36: ma byung na ni med par 'gyur te de lta
T02D2663a:139b-37: ma yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang
T02D2663a:139b-39: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ni yongs kyis 'dug pa ma yin te //
T02D2663a:139b-41: sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi chos nyid kyi don zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:140a-1: bdag po nam nga yang dag par gshegs pa'i sangs
T02D2663a:140a-2: rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa 'jig
T02D2663a:140a-3: du 'byung ba ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:140a-4: dbyangs rnams du mar byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi
T02D2663a:140a-5: tshul 'chad do zhes pa'i bar du sngags kyi chos
T02D2663a:140a-6: nyid ye nas de ltar 'dug pa la tshig dang
T02D2663a:140a-7: yig 'bru dang dbyangs rnams su ji ltar rig par
T02D2663a:140a-9: de bzhin gshegs par mdzad par bstan ba ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:140a-10: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyin ci log pa nyid du mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02D2663a:140a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa ni so sor rtog
T02D2663a:140a-12: pa'i ye shes kyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
T02D2663a:140a-13: tshul du thams cad mkhyen pa'o thams cad gzigs pa'o
T02D2663a:140a-14: zhes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang
T02D2663a:140a-15: / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes yun du gzigs pa'o //
T02D2663a:140a-16: de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten du
T02D2663a:140a-17: byung ba na tshul rnam pa du ma dad zhes
T02D2663a:140a-18: pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2663a:140a-19: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'jig rten la
T02D2663a:140a-20: sogs pa'i tshul rnam pa mang po'o //
T02D2663a:140a-21: rjes su mthun par sngags kyi chos nyid ye nas
T02D2663a:140a-22: 'dug pa de yi ge 'bru rnams su ston pa
T02D2663a:140a-23: ni tshig dang 'bru dang dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2663a:140a-24: su bstan pa'o // gnyis su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2663a:140a-26: rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i tshul sna tshogs dang
T02D2663a:140a-27: zhes pa'i sngags kyi tshig de rnams kyang la la
T02D2663a:140a-29: la la ni ldem po ngag tu ston zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:140a-30: bsam pa rnam pa du ma'i sems can la la zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:140a-31: sems can la la zhi ba 'dod /
T02D2663a:140a-34: la la 'bring 'dod pa la sogs pa'i sems can
T02D2663a:140a-35: rnams ji ltar 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun par
T02D2663a:140a-37: dzin dzika ces pa la sogs tshig rnam pa du ma dang /
T02D2663a:140a-38: ka la sogs pa'i 'bru rnam pa du ma dang /
T02D2663a:140a-39: dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i skad du smra
T02D2663a:140a-40: ba rnam pa du ma'i mtshan mar bkod de ston
T02D2663a:140a-41: zhes pa'o // dbyangs rnam pa du mar byin gyis
T02D2663a:140a-42: brlabs nas zhes pa ni aa ai la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:140a-43: gug skyed kyi tshul rnam pa du ma'am /
T02D2663a:140b-0: bandhar ba la sogs pa'i @140b dbyangs sna tshogs su ston zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:140b-1: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags rnams kyi
T02D2663a:140b-2: tshig 'bru dang yi ger byin gyis rlob ce na
T02D2663a:140b-3: zhes pa nas / ji ltar rigs par sngags kyi
T02D2663a:140b-4: cho ga kun rab tu 'chang ngo zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663a:140b-5: du sngags kyi chos nyid yi ge 'bru la sogs
T02D2663a:140b-6: par byin gyis brlabs te ston pa yang de bzhin
T02D2663a:140b-7: gshegs pa'i yon tan stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
T02D2663a:140b-8: sogs pa de dag sngags kyi 'brur byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:140b-9: pa ste ston par yang bshad de /
T02D2663a:140b-10: tshig dang 'bru rnams su byin gyis rlob pa yang
T02D2663a:140b-11: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su rig par
T02D2663a:140b-12: bya ste / de la kun rdzob kyi ston pa
T02D2663a:140b-13: ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D2663a:140b-14: tshig dang 'bru la sogs par byin gyis brlabs te
T02D2663a:140b-15: bya ste / ston pa'o // don dam par ston
T02D2663a:140b-16: pa ni chos thams cad thog ma nas ma skyes
T02D2663a:140b-17: ma byung ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yi
T02D2663a:140b-18: ge la sogs pa'i 'brur ston pa ste /
T02D2663a:140b-20: bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sngags pa'i bden pa'i tshig dang /
T02D2663a:140b-21: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams dang zhes pa
T02D2663a:140b-22: la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du
T02D2663a:140b-23: ma zhes pa ni mang po'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D2663a:140b-24: 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:140b-25: de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa du mar bden pa'i tshig bsags pa ste /
T02D2663a:140b-26: sngags kyi yi ge 'brur byin gyis brlabs pas na /
T02D2663a:140b-27: su bsgrub par 'dod pa des kyang bden pa'i tshig rjes su bsrung bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:140b-28: brdzun du smra bas sngags rnams mi 'grub bo zhes rgyud gzhan las kyang 'byung ngo //
T02D2663a:140b-30: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2663a:140b-33: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D2663a:140b-35: chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa dang gzhung gzhan las grags pa nyid do //
T02D2663a:140b-36: gsang ba'i bdag po mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663a:140b-37: thams cad kyi ye shes thams cad kyang de bzhin
T02D2663a:140b-38: gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2663a:140b-39: kyi stobs dang / rang gi smon lam gyi ye
T02D2663a:140b-40: shes kyi stobs dang chos kyi dbyings lhun gyis grub
T02D2663a:140b-41: pa'i stobs kyis lhun gyis grub nas sems can ji
T02D2663a:140b-42: lta bu'i rigs par sngags kyi cho ga kun rab
T02D2663a:141a-1: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mthu rnams byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02D2663a:141a-2: yi ge'i 'bru rnams su ston pa ste /
T02D2663a:141a-3: rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:141a-4: bsod nams kyi stobs ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims
T02D2663a:141a-5: dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
T02D2663a:141a-6: pa'o // ye shes kyi stobs ni shes rab dang
T02D2663a:141a-7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
T02D2663a:141a-8: pa'o // pa ste / stobs zhes pa ni de dag gi mthu thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2663a:141a-9: rang gi smon lam dang ye shes kyi stobs dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:141a-10: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sngags rnams kyi
T02D2663a:141a-11: rang bzhin ji lta ba nyid du rtogs pa'o zhes
T02D2663a:141a-12: pa'o / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes
T02D2663a:141a-13: pa ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas nas zhes pa
T02D2663a:141a-14: pa'o / ste / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i
T02D2663a:141a-15: mthu des sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin
T02D2663a:141a-16: du sngags kyi chos nyid ye ge'i 'bru la sogs
T02D2663a:141a-18: ji ltar rigs par zhes pa ni ji ltar snod du 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la'o //
T02D2663a:141a-19: sngags kyi yi ge dag gang zhe na /
T02D2663a:141a-20: thog ma bar nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:141a-21: aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:141a-22: gsang ba'i bdag po nga dang nya dang na dang
T02D2663a:141a-23: na ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dbang po
T02D2663a:141a-24: ste / nus pa thams cad dang ldan pa myur
T02D2663a:141a-25: du bya ba'i don rab tu bsgrub pa'o zhes pa'i
T02D2663a:141a-26: bar du sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid tshig dang /
T02D2663a:141a-27: ming dang mtshan mar rtogs pa'o zhes bshad pa de
T02D2663a:141a-28: dag nyid yi ge'i 'bru dang tshig rnams su bcom
T02D2663a:141a-29: ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de rnams ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:141a-31: tshig dang yi ge 'bru re las ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:141a-32: gyi sgor gyur pa de yang don gnyis ston te
T02D2663a:141a-33: / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'o //
T02D2663a:141a-34: de la kun rdzob kyi ston pa la ni /
T02D2663a:141a-35: yi ge 'bru dang tshig rnams las /
T02D2663a:141a-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ston pa'o //
T02D2663a:141a-37: don dam par ston pa ni yi ge de nyid
T02D2663a:141a-38: kyi sgo nas chos thams cad kyi thog ma nas
T02D2663a:141a-39: ma skyes pa stong pa nyid ston ba ste /
T02D2663a:141a-40: de bas na yi ge 'bru dang tshig gi sgo
T02D2663a:141a-41: nas kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i don bstan pa'i
T02D2663a:141a-42: phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:141a-43: phyag rgya la sogs pa'i sgo nas ming dang mtshan
T02D2663a:141b-0: yi ge 'bru dang tshig dang 'bru rnams @141b byin gyis brlabs te bstan to //
T02D2663a:141b-1: de bas na da 'dir yi ge aa la sogs
T02D2663a:141b-2: pa'i yi ge'i 'bru rnams kyi sgo nas chos thams
T02D2663a:141b-3: cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bstan te
T02D2663a:141b-4: / 'chang de de yang yi ge ka la sogs
T02D2663a:141b-5: pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams dang ldan pas
T02D2663a:141b-6: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor gyur
T02D2663a:141b-7: / pa ste / de rnams kyang kha cig ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ston /
T02D2663a:141b-8: kha cig ni phyogs gcig stong pa nyid du ston /
T02D2663a:141b-9: kha cig ni stong par 'jug pa'i sgo nas stong
T02D2663a:141b-10: pa nyid du ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor
T02D2663a:141b-11: gyur pa ste ji ltar rigs par blta'o //
T02D2663a:141b-12: de la yi ge aa la sogs pa gang yang
T02D2663a:141b-13: rung ba cig gis thams cad stong pa nyid du
T02D2663a:141b-14: ston pa las lhag par yi ge gzhan rnams stong
T02D2663a:141b-15: pa nyid du ston pa med de /
T02D2663a:141b-16: gang yi ge aa la sogs pa bstan pa de
T02D2663a:141b-17: nyid kyi yi ge gzhan rnams kyis ston pas stong
T02D2663a:141b-18: pa nyid du ston par do na gcig ste /
T02D2663a:141b-19: yi ge aa'i sgo nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du chud na /
T02D2663a:141b-20: yi ge gzhan ci dgos she na /
T02D2663a:141b-21: stong par ston pa ni yi ge gcig gis kyang chog mod kyi /
T02D2663a:141b-22: yi ge 'bru dang tshig rnams las sngags su bstan
T02D2663a:141b-23: te sngags de'i sgo nas ma skyes pas stong pa
T02D2663a:141b-24: nyid dgongs pa'i phyir yi ge thams cad smos so
T02D2663a:141b-25: // de bas na sngags thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2663a:141b-26: ni byang chub kyi sems so zhes rgyud gzhan las
T02D2663a:141b-27: // gsungs so // thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:141b-28: aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:141b-29: chos thams cad thog ma nas ma skyes pas stong
T02D2663a:141b-30: pa nyid du chud pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663a:141b-31: ste / de bas na stong pa nyid du chud
T02D2663a:141b-32: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor gyur par yi ge
T02D2663a:141b-33: aa de byin gyis brlabs te gzhag pa ste /
T02D2663a:141b-34: de bas na chos thams cad thog ma nas ma
T02D2663a:141b-35: skyes pa ma byung bar yi ge aa'i sgo nas
T02D2663a:141b-36: bstan te / dgos pa dang bral ba'i phyir ka
T02D2663a:141b-37: ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo'o zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:141b-39: dgos pa la k'arya zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:141b-40: yi ge ka de chos thams cad stong pa'i ting
T02D2663a:141b-41: nge 'dzin gyi sgor gyur pa bas yi ge ka'i
T02D2663a:141b-42: sgo nas chos thams cad dgos pa med par shes
T02D2663a:141b-43: par bya ste / dgos pa zhes pa ni 'bras bu ste /
T02D2663a:141b-44: 'bras bu de yang rgyus ma bskyed na 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:141b-45: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu yang med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142a-0: de ste dgos pa bral ba zhes byung @142a * //
T02D2663a:142a-2: 'bras bu rgyus ma bskyed pa med kyi /
T02D2663a:142a-3: rgyu de 'bras bu skyed pa'i rang bzhin du yod dam zhe na /
T02D2663a:142a-4: rgyu nyid 'bras bu las gyur pa ste /
T02D2663a:142a-5: de bas na chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes pa'i don du rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:142a-6: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142a-7: kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142a-10: kham kha sa ma zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142a-11: yi ge kha de ni chos thams cad stong par
T02D2663a:142a-12: ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo ste thams cad
T02D2663a:142a-13: nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin
T02D2663a:142a-14: pa'o // rgyud thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ;
T02D2663a:142a-15: ga ni chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142a-16: ga ti zhes pa rgyud la'ang bya /
T02D2663a:142a-18: byang chub pa la yang bya ste /
T02D2663a:142a-19: yi ge ga ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:142a-20: du ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor gyur pa
T02D2663a:142a-21: yin pas rgyud du drang na ni mi dang lha
T02D2663a:142a-22: la sogs pa'i rgyud drug dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142a-23: 'gro par drang na ni shar dang nub la sogs par 'gro bar bya ba dang /
T02D2663a:142a-24: 'gro ba'i bya ba dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142a-25: chud par drang na ni chos thams cad thog ma
T02D2663a:142a-26: nas ma skyes par chud par bya ba'i dngos po
T02D2663a:142a-27: dang / chud par byed pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142a-28: gcig tu 'phangs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142a-29: gha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni gcig tu 'phungs pa la /
T02D2663a:142a-32: yi ge gha ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:142a-33: ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de rdul phra
T02D2663a:142a-34: mo rnams gcig tu 'phungs pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D2663a:142a-36: 'chi 'pho thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142a-37: tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142a-39: 'chi 'pho la tsyu ti zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142a-40: yi ge tsa ni chos thams cad stong par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bas /
T02D2663a:142a-41: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir 'chi 'pho yang 'chi 'pho dmigs su med pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:142a-42: grib ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142a-43: tsha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni grib ma la tsha ya zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142a-44: tsha de chos thams cad stong pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo ste /
T02D2663a:142a-45: de la grib ma de lus las gzhan pa ma
T02D2663a:142a-46: yin na ni lus med kyang grib ma 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:142a-47: rigs te / lus las mi gzhan na grib ma
T02D2663a:142b-0: logs @142b shig tu 'byung ba yang mi rigs pa
T02D2663a:142b-1: las de lta bu 'byung ba ni yang dag pa
T02D2663a:142b-2: ma yin te 'khrul pa la sgyu ma lta bu'o
T02D2663a:142b-3: rigs te / // 'khrul pa'am sgyu ma ni dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2663a:142b-4: chos thams cad kyang grib ma de dang 'dra bas stong pa nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-5: skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-6: dza ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni skye ba la dz'a ti zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142b-7: skye bar bya ba'am skye bzhin pa'i dngos po med pas skye ba dmigs su med pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:142b-8: dri ma ni dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-9: dzha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:142b-10: dri ma la dzha ma ra zhes bya ba ste
T02D2663a:142b-11: / dri mar gyur pa'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-12: nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-13: da rgyal la ta ka ra zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142b-14: chos thams cad stong pa nyid pas nga rgyal gyi dngos po dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-16: tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa
T02D2663a:142b-17: ni skye ba la bi tha ba na zhes bya
T02D2663a:142b-18: ba ste / chos thams cad stong pa nyid pas skye ba'i dngos po dmigs su med ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-19: 'tshe ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-20: ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-21: 'tshe ba la ta ma ra zhes bya ba ste
T02D2663a:142b-22: 'tshe bar bya ba'i dngos po rnams med pas 'tshe
T02D2663a:142b-23: bar bya ba'i dngos po yang dmigs su med pa'o
T02D2663a:142b-24: zhes pa'o // mu ge dang yongs su bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-25: tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-26: mu ge la thang+ga zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142b-27: chos rnams stong pa nyid pas mu ge'i dngos po dmigs su med ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-28: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-29: ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-30: de bzhin nyid la ta th'a ta zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142b-31: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid ces pa ni gzhung gcig ste /
T02D2663a:142b-32: de bzhin nyid du dmigs su med ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:142b-33: gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:142b-34: tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-35: gnas la stha na zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:142b-36: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi gnas sam /
T02D2663a:142b-37: chos rnams skad cig pa'i mtshan nyid pas mi gnas pa'i phyir gnas dmigs su med ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:142b-38: 'dul ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:142b-39: 'dul ba la da na ma zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-2: dul bar bya ba dmigs su med ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:143a-3: khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-4: dha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:143a-5: khams la dh'a tu zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-8: gzugs med pa'i khams la sogs pa dmigs su med ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:143a-9: don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-10: pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:143a-11: don dam pa la pa ra m'a rtha zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-12: yi ge pa ni de ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin du'ang dmigs su med par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:143a-13: dbu ba dang 'dra ste snying po dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-14: pha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni dbu ba la phe na zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-15: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams dbu ba dang
T02D2663a:143a-16: 'dra bar snying po med par bshig pa de yang
T02D2663a:143a-17: snying po med par yi ge pha'i sgo nas bstan
T02D2663a:143a-18: to // 'byung ba thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-19: bha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni 'byung ba la bha ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-21: gzugs yod pa'i dang gzugs med pa'i khams su 'byung
T02D2663a:143a-22: bas na 'byung ba zhes bya ste phung po lnga
T02D2663a:143a-23: nyid la bya'o // phud po lnga po de dag
T02D2663a:143a-24: dmigs su med par yi ge bha'i sgo nas ston
T02D2663a:143a-25: nyid la bya'o // to // 'chi ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-26: ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa
T02D2663a:143a-27: ni 'chi ba la ma ra na zhes bya ba
T02D2663a:143a-28: ni / chos thams cad ma skyes pas 'chi ba
T02D2663a:143a-29: yang dmigs su med par yi ge ma'i sgo nas
T02D2663a:143a-30: ni / bstan to // theg pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-31: ya ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni theg pa la y'a na zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-33: chos kyang gzings 'dra bar bor bas na /
T02D2663a:143a-34: chos rnams stong par chud nas theg pa gang la
T02D2663a:143a-35: zhugs te chud pa'i theg pa de nyid kyang dmigs
T02D2663a:143a-36: su med par yi ge ya'i sgo nas bstan pa'o
T02D2663a:143a-37: // rdul thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143a-38: ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo ste zhes pa ni rdul la ra dza zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-39: rdul zhes rdul phra mo rnams la yang bya ba ste nyon mongs pa rnams la yang bya ste /
T02D2663a:143a-40: de gnyis gang yang rung ba dmigs su med par yi ge ra'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:143b-0: mtshan nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir la ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo @143b zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:143b-1: mtshan nyid la laksha na zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143b-2: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid la
T02D2663a:143b-3: sogs pa dmigs su med par yi ge la'i sgo
T02D2663a:143b-4: nas bstan pa'o // ngag gi lam dang yongs su
T02D2663a:143b-5: bral ba'i phyir wa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo
T02D2663a:143b-7: ngag gi lam la lb'a ka zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143b-8: rnam par ma brtags ma dpyad par tshig tu mi
T02D2663a:143b-9: smra'i rnam par dpyad nas tshig tu smra ba ste
T02D2663a:143b-10: / brtag par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i
T02D2663a:143b-11: tshig tu smra ba yang dmigs su med par yi
T02D2663a:143b-12: ge wa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:143b-13: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i phyir sha ni chos thams
T02D2663a:143b-14: cad kyi sgo mo'o zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis
T02D2663a:143b-15: zhib la pra kra ta sh'anti zhes bya ba ste
T02D2663a:143b-16: / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin
T02D2663a:143b-17: gyis zhi bar yi ge sha'i sgo nas bstan pa'o
T02D2663a:143b-18: / // rang bzhin gyis blun pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:143b-19: sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo mo'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:143b-20: blu na po la dzha sha zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143b-21: mig dang rna ba la sogs pa'i bdag po rnams
T02D2663a:143b-22: kyis chos rnams zin pa ni yang dag pa ma
T02D2663a:143b-23: yin par zin par bya ste /
T02D2663a:143b-24: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams blun pas mi
T02D2663a:143b-25: brtsan pa'i phyir de dag gis zin pa'i chos yod
T02D2663a:143b-26: pa ma yin pa sha'i sgo nas ston pa'o //
T02D2663a:143b-27: yi ge pa'i gor btang ba ni /
T02D2663a:143b-28: ta dang sha gnyis gnas gcig nas byung ba dang /
T02D2663a:143b-29: pa'i las ta byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:143b-30: bden pa kun dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa ni
T02D2663a:143b-31: chos thams cad kyi sgo mo'o zhes ba ni bden
T02D2663a:143b-32: pa la satya zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:143b-33: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med par yi ge sa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:143b-34: rgyu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ha ni chos thams
T02D2663a:143b-35: cad kyi sgo mo zhes pa ni rgyu la he
T02D2663a:143b-37: chos thams cad kyi rgyu dmigs su med par yi ge ha'i sgo nas bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:143b-38: mdor na yi ge de rnams stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:143b-39: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sgo ston par rig par
T02D2663a:143b-40: bya'o // gsang ba'i bdag po nga dang nya dang
T02D2663a:143b-41: na dang na ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
T02D2663a:143b-42: dbang po ste zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:143b-43: yi ge de rnams klad kor gyi 'khor btags pas
T02D2663a:143b-44: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma bas ni ka la
T02D2663a:143b-46: nya ni tsa la sogs pa'i 'khor kun du gtogs so //
T02D2663a:143b-47: na ni ta la sogs pa'i 'khor kun du gtogs so //
T02D2663a:143b-48: de bzhin du yi ge de rnams ya ra la sogs pa'i stong par gtogs te /
T02D2663a:144a-1: thams cad kyi mtshan nyid pas mthu dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2663a:144a-2: kun rdzob tu bsgrub pa'i dgos pa rnams kyang myur du 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:144a-4: mthu thams cad dang ldan pa myur du bya ba'i don rab tu bsgrub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:144a-5: gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:144a-6: yid la sngags mkhan gyis bsams na /
T02D2663a:144a-8: zhes pa'i bar du sngags kyi tshul yi ge 'bru ka la sogs pa /
T02D2663a:144a-9: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2663a:144a-10: sgor gyur pa rnams bshad pa rnams kyi rjes su
T02D2663a:144a-11: bsngags pa dang rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:144a-12: de yang 'jug pa'i yon tan dang gnas pa'i yon
T02D2663a:144a-13: tan dang ldang ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya
T02D2663a:144a-14: ste / de la re ba thams cad yongs su
T02D2663a:144a-15: rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2663a:144a-16: kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par smin pa'i
T02D2663a:144a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu'i yon tan dang /
T02D2663a:144a-19: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa las gyur ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:144a-20: rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa /
T02D2663a:144a-21: sngags kyi de kho na'i don gdon mi za ba'o zhes pa ni 'jug pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:144a-22: rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan bas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:144a-23: yi ge aa dang ka la sogs pa de bzhin
T02D2663a:144a-24: nyid la dmigs par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2663a:144a-25: sgor gyur pa dam pa rnams dang ldan pa zhes
T02D2663a:144a-26: pa'o // sngags kyi de kho na'i don gdon mi
T02D2663a:144a-27: za ba zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pas
T02D2663a:144a-28: rigs pa dang gzhung gis sun mi phyin pa'o //
T02D2663a:144a-29: dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ste dri ma med pa /
T02D2663a:144a-30: bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas //
T02D2663a:144a-31: zhes pa ni gnas pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:144a-32: dus gsum las shin tu shes pa ni /
T02D2663a:144a-33: 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus te /
T02D2663a:144a-34: de yang phung po lnga la bya ste /
T02D2663a:144a-35: phung po lnga las shin tu 'das //
T02D2663a:144a-37: nam mkha' dang 'dra ste dri ma med ces pa
T02D2663a:144a-38: ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dri
T02D2663a:144a-39: ma rnams dang bral ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:144a-40: bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas //
T02D2663a:144a-41: zhes ba ni sems pa med pa las sems kyi
T02D2663a:144a-42: sa la gnas pa ste so so rang gi rig
T02D2663a:144a-44: las dang bya ba las byung ba //
T02D2663a:144a-45: spyod pa rnams kyang rjes su thob//
T02D2663a:144b-1: zhes pa ni langs pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:144b-2: las dang bya ba las byung ba //
T02D2663a:144b-3: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid las langs nas sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:144b-4: kun rdzob tu bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi la sogs
T02D2663a:144b-5: pa lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang ston zhes
T02D2663a:144b-6: pa'o // spyod pa rnams kyang rjes su thob //
T02D2663a:144b-8: zhes pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T02D2663a:144b-9: sngags kyi spyod pa rnams spyad na mngon par 'byung ba dang /
T02D2663a:144b-10: ma lus pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byin pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:144b-11: 'di ni don dam de kho na //
T02D2663a:144b-12: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2663a:144b-13: zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa rnams sdud pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2663a:144b-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2663a:144b-15: zhes pa ni sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:144b-16: kyi byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa shes pa dang
T02D2663a:144b-17: / sngags kyi yi ge las lha'i gzugs su sbyar zhing /
T02D2663a:144b-18: yan lag bzhi ba'i bzlas pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2663a:144b-19: gar shes na grub pa thob par 'gyur zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:144b-20: // sgrar smras yang dag de kho na //
T02D2663a:144b-21: sngags rnams kyi ni sngags mtshan nyid //
T02D2663a:144b-22: yid la bsam pa'i sa bsams na //
T02D2663a:144b-24: zhes pa ni sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra'i sgo nas
T02D2663a:144b-25: bstan pa'i don de bzlas pa la sogs pa la
T02D2663a:144b-26: mi rtog par bsgoms pas mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D2663a:144b-27: 'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas thob ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:144b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663a:144b-29: gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol te zhes
T02D2663a:144b-30: pa nas thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan dang
T02D2663a:144b-31: ldan par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du bshad pa'i
T02D2663a:144b-32: don rnams phyag na rdo rjes mjal bar bstan pa
T02D2663a:144b-33: dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang /
T02D2663a:144b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad bshad pa'i lhag ma rnams bshad par gsol ba'o //
T02D2663a:144b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sngags
T02D2663a:144b-36: kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul gyis chos kyi gzhung bshad
T02D2663a:144b-37: pa / bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:144b-38: yi ge ka la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:144b-39: ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don bsam du med
T02D2663a:144b-40: pa de dag gis 'jal te ngo mtshar che'o zhes
T02D2663a:144b-41: pa'o // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags te zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:145a-1: gang zag la bdag med par chud pa tsam dang /
T02D2663a:145a-2: rang sangs rgyas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bshig nas
T02D2663a:145a-3: ngag 'gags pa tsam pas de bzhin nyid la dmigs
T02D2663a:145a-4: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul ma yin zhes
T02D2663a:145a-5: pa'o // sems can de dag thun mong ma lags ba'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur pa ni /
T02D2663a:145a-6: gang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad par 'gyur pa'o
T02D2663a:145a-7: zhes pa rnams ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams
T02D2663a:145a-9: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad
T02D2663a:145a-10: kyi cho ga rnams bshad par gsol zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:145a-11: / dkyil 'khor bris zin na mchod pa la sogs pa bya bar rigs te /
T02D2663a:145a-12: de bas na mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2663a:145a-14: thal mo sbyar ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D2663a:145a-15: byams pa dang snying rjes mchod pa dang /
T02D2663a:145a-16: 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dri dang me tog la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:145a-17: mchod pa rnam pa de bzhi dang /
T02D2663a:145a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhugs su gsol ba rnams bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:145a-20: de rnams las kyang la la ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nas 'byung /
T02D2663a:145a-21: la la ni yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nas 'byung /
T02D2663a:145a-22: la la ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:145a-23: de 'di nas mi 'byung ba 'og ma gnyis kyi
T02D2663a:145a-24: skabs nas 'byung ba yang skabs 'dir sbyar bar bya
T02D2663a:145a-25: / 'di nas 'byung ba la 'og ma gnyis kyi
T02D2663a:145a-26: nad nas mi 'byung ba yang de bzhin du sbyar
T02D2663a:145a-27: / bar bya ste / de dag gi rim pa
T02D2663a:145a-28: yang lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab
T02D2663a:145a-29: pa la spyan drang mi dgos pa'i rim pa la
T02D2663a:145a-30: sogs pa bsdus pa'i don gyi nang du zhib tu
T02D2663a:145a-32: de nas sngags pas bya ba /
T02D2663a:145a-33: lha rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2663a:145a-35: sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la'ang //
T02D2663a:145a-36: re re bar ni bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2663a:145a-37: zhes pa'i bar dri la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:145a-38: phyi'i mchod pa de rnams kyang /
T02D2663a:145a-39: sngags pa dmigs pa bas tshul bzhin ma byas na /
T02D2663a:145a-40: 'phags pa'i lha rnams 'khrug bar mi 'gyur yang de'i 'khor phal rnams 'khrug par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:145a-41: 'phral du ga nod pa mi byed kyang ji ltar bsams pa'i don grub par mi byed de /
T02D2663a:145b-0: @145b phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes rgyud gzhan
T02D2663a:145b-1: las 'byung bas mchod pa de rnams nan tan du
T02D2663a:145b-2: bya'o // slob dpon zab cing rgya che ba la
T02D2663a:145b-3: mos pas kyang gtsor ni yid kyis mchod pa bya
T02D2663a:145b-4: bya'o // ste / slob ma dmigs ba can rnams
T02D2663a:145b-5: kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mchod pa
T02D2663a:145b-6: 'di rnams kyang ma chags bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2663a:145b-7: mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang yid kyis mchod pa
T02D2663a:145b-8: de dag ni yi ge 'khor lo bskor bar dkyil
T02D2663a:145b-9: 'khor dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu blta'o //
T02D2663a:145b-10: me tog dkar dang dmar ser dag / ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:145b-11: yid du 'ong ba bltar sdug pa //
T02D2663a:145b-12: bkra shis kun te nan tan du ;
T02D2663a:145b-13: / mkhas pas su ni mchod par bya //
T02D2663a:145b-14: zhes pa'i bar du me tog gi mchod pa rnam pa bshad de /
T02D2663a:145b-15: dkar dang dmar dang ser zhes pa ni me tog gi rigs spyir smos pa'o //
T02D2663a:145b-16: padmo dang autpala zhes pa la sogs pa ni spyir
T02D2663a:145b-17: smos pa de dag nyid las so so'i ming smos
T02D2663a:145b-18: pa'o // yid du 'ong ba zhes pa ni dri zhim pa'o //
T02D2663a:145b-19: bltar sdug pa zhes pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs mdzes pa'o //
T02D2663a:145b-20: bkra shis pa ni lha rnams mchod pa dang mi 'gal ba zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:145b-21: 'dir ni mdo tsam du smos kyi /
T02D2663a:145b-22: 'dir ming gis ma smos pa las gzhan du yang
T02D2663a:145b-23: yid du 'ong ba dang bkra shis pa las mchod
T02D2663a:145b-25: tsandan dang aa ka ru zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:145b-26: spos bzang rnams kyang dbul bar bya //
T02D2663a:145b-27: zhes pa'i bar du dri'i mchod pa rnams te /
T02D2663a:145b-28: shin tu dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong //
T02D2663a:145b-29: zhes pa ni 'dir ming gis smos pa las gzhan
T02D2663a:145b-30: yang dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba la sogs
T02D2663a:145b-31: pa dri'i rigs rnams gang yang rung ba dbul lo
T02D2663a:145b-32: zhes pa ste / de las kyang la la ni gcig tu sbyar /
T02D2663a:145b-33: la la bsdus te sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:145b-34: dri'i mchod pa dbul bar yang me tog gi mchod pa rnams sngon rol du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:145b-35: aa ka ru dang thang shing zhes pa nas gzhan
T02D2663a:145b-36: yang bdug pa sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyis bsgrags
T02D2663a:145b-37: pa bkra shis la tshul bzhin du sngags pas gsol
T02D2663a:145b-38: cig / lha'i yid du 'ong zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:145b-39: bdug pa'i mchod pa rnams bshad de /
T02D2663a:145b-40: de rnams kyang la la ni gcig tu sbyar /
T02D2663a:145b-41: la la ni bsdus te sbyar te shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:146a-0: gzhan yang bdug pa sna tshogs pa 'jig rten @146a * //
T02D2663a:146a-1: gyi khams su bsgrags pa bkra shis pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:146a-2: 'dir ming gis ma smos pa gzhan du 'jig rten
T02D2663a:146a-3: du grags pa'i bdug pa sna tshogs lha rnams la
T02D2663a:146a-4: mchod pa dang mi 'gal bar yang rung ba dbul
T02D2663a:146a-6: sems dpa' chen po de nas yang gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga nyon cig ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:146a-7: zho dang 'o ma rgyas par ro //
T02D2663a:146a-8: zhes pa'i bar du bshos kyi mchod pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:146a-11: bca' ba dang btung ba'i dngos por shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:146a-12: de'i zas ni'o thug dang 'bras la sogs ba'o //
T02D2663a:146a-13: bza' ba ni khur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:146a-14: bca' ba ni shing thog la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:146a-15: btung ba ni zho dang 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:146a-16: rgyas pa'o zhes pa ni de rnams bzang zhing mang du 'bul ba'o //
T02D2663a:146a-17: mar me bzang po rnams khyad ni //
T02D2663a:146a-19: shin tu dri zhim pas kyang gsol //
T02D2663a:146a-20: zhes pa'i bar du mar me'i mchod ba bshad pa ste ;
T02D2663a:146a-21: gtsang ma zhes pa ni nya tshil la sogs pa btsog pa med pa dang /
T02D2663a:146a-22: ras kyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:146a-23: phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams //
T02D2663a:146a-24: kha dog sna tshogs bzang yang bre //
T02D2663a:146a-25: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i sgo khar gdugs
T02D2663a:146a-26: dkar po gcig bzhag / ngos bzhi grva bzhir phyogs
T02D2663a:146a-27: so sor kha dog dang mthun pa'i ba dan rnams
T02D2663a:146a-29: rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni //
T02D2663a:146a-30: dril dang bcas te rab tu dbul //
T02D2663a:146a-31: zhes pa ni phyi'i sgo khar shing la sogs pa
T02D2663a:146a-32: las byas pa'i rta babs bzang po dril bu dag
T02D2663a:146a-34: de nas bum ba rnams blang ba //
T02D2663a:146a-36: gos rnams kyis ni mgrin pa bcings //
T02D2663a:146a-37: mkhas pa yis ni rnam par bkod //
T02D2663a:146a-38: ces pa'i bar te bum pa rnams dbul te nag
T02D2663a:146a-39: po la sogs pa'i skyon med par gzhung las byung
T02D2663a:146a-40: ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dbul te /
T02D2663a:146a-41: de rnams gsang ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du /
T02D2663a:146a-42: lha rnams so so la bsngo bar mi bya bar
T02D2663a:146a-43: spyir dgod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyis
T02D2663a:146a-44: btab ste / slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba la blugs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:146a-45: gtso bo lha rnams kun la ni //
T02D2663a:146a-46: gos zung re ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2663a:146b-0: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rim pa @146b gsum char
T02D2663a:146b-1: gyi sgo khyud rnams kyi nang na bzhugs pa'i gtso
T02D2663a:146b-2: bo rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663a:146b-3: mdzad dbus na bzhugs pa la ras zung re re
T02D2663a:146b-5: thams cad la zung re mi 'byor na spyir zung gcig dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:146b-6: sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la//
T02D2663a:146b-7: ya re bar ni bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2663a:146b-8: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha phal rnams la ya re dbul zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:146b-9: thams cad la re re ma 'byor na yang spyir ya gcig dbul bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:146b-10: da rnams kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa dkri ba ma gtogs par gzhan du rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:146b-11: slob ma dkyil 'khor drung dgug ste //
T02D2663a:146b-12: sngags pa yis ni chus thob cig / ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:146b-13: de bzhin slob ma kun tshud cig / ces pa'i
T02D2663a:146b-14: bar du slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i
T02D2663a:146b-15: cho ga ste / de yang slob dpon sngar mchod
T02D2663a:146b-16: pa na las kyi rdo rje sems dpar bsgyur ba
T02D2663a:146b-17: las slob ma 'dzud pa'i tshe 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:146b-18: slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin du bsgyur te /
T02D2663a:146b-19: thog ma nyid du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ra'i sgor
T02D2663a:146b-20: khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bum pa'i
T02D2663a:146b-21: chus slob ma rnams bgegs bsal ba'i phyir gtor te
T02D2663a:146b-22: / slob ma rnams gdong g-yogs pa'i ras la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2663a:146b-23: dam tshig gsum gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas pas slob ma'i gdong g-yogs //
T02D2663a:146b-24: de nas slob ma'i lag par dri dang me tog byin la byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
T02D2663a:146b-25: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis dbyings su byin gyis brlab /
T02D2663a:146b-26: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang sngags dang /
T02D2663a:146b-27: rdo rje go cha'i sngags kyis slob ma de rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2663a:146b-28: spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram kha
T02D2663a:146b-29: dog dkar po klad kor dang bcas pa 'bar ba
T02D2663a:146b-30: can bsam / de nas dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings te ;
T02D2663a:146b-31: de'i sngags zlos su bcug la me tog 'dor du
T02D2663a:146b-32: bcug / de nas me tog gar babs pa'i lha
T02D2663a:146b-33: slob ma de la byi na te /
T02D2663a:146b-34: de nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor du gzhug ste /
T02D2663a:146b-35: de rnams ni dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i cho ga rim pa mdor smras pa'o //
T02D2663a:146b-36: yan lag so sor bshad pa ni//
T02D2663a:147a-0: @147a * // byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug / ces pa'i
T02D2663a:147a-1: smon lam gyis byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhug
T02D2663a:147a-2: ces pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa dran par bya //
T02D2663a:147a-3: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:147a-4: rnams bdag la dgongs zhes smra bar bya ba ste
T02D2663a:147a-5: / smon lam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
T02D2663a:147a-6: yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag
T02D2663a:147a-7: la dgongs shig / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas
T02D2663a:147a-9: nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar
T02D2663a:147a-10: du phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung
T02D2663a:147a-11: ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa rang gi
T02D2663a:147a-12: sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:147a-13: kyi rang bzhin ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:147a-14: rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis
T02D2663a:147a-15: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar bdag gis
T02D2663a:147a-16: kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:147a-18: thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba ni //
T02D2663a:147a-19: skye ba rgyal ba'i rigs dge la'o //
T02D2663a:147a-20: zhes pa ni de ltar smon lam gyis byang chub
T02D2663a:147a-21: kyi sems bskyed pas sa bon btab pa'i sgo nas
T02D2663a:147a-22: rgyal ba'i rigs dge ba la skye bar 'gyur te
T02D2663a:147a-23: / rgyal ba'i rigs zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa ste /
T02D2663a:147a-24: de la shes rab ni yum shes rab kyi pha
T02D2663a:147a-25: rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:147a-27: thabs ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te /
T02D2663a:147a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang de las byung bas na de ni rgyal ba'i rigs zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:147a-29: de dag phyag rgya bcings pa ni chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:147a-30: 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de /
T02D2663a:147a-31: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi sngags dang phyag
T02D2663a:147a-32: rgya des slob ma de stong pa nyid du byin
T02D2663a:147a-33: gyis brlab bo // chos kyi 'khor lo las de bzhin du /
T02D2663a:147a-34: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab //
T02D2663a:147a-36: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du chud
T02D2663a:147a-37: nas slar kun rdzob kyi sgo nas sems can rnams
T02D2663a:147a-38: la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:147a-39: chos kyi 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur ro //
T02D2663a:147a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni gang gi sems rdo rje dang 'dra bar brtan pa /
T02D2663a:147b-0: cis kyang zil gyis mi non pa @147b ste ;
T02D2663a:147b-1: de yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pa /
T02D2663a:147b-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa /
T02D2663a:147b-3: dbu rgyan dang ldan pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sku'o //
T02D2663a:147b-4: de'i snying gar yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye
T02D2663a:147b-5: shes lnga'i rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2663a:147b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2663a:147b-8: bcing ba de nas sngags pa rang gis nan tan gyis /
T02D2663a:147b-9: gos la lan gsum gdab pa yang //
T02D2663a:147b-10: sngags kyis de tshe cho ga bzhin //
T02D2663a:147b-11: zhes pa ni gdong dgab pa'i ras la sngags pa
T02D2663a:147b-12: nyid kyis dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya dang sngags
T02D2663a:147b-13: kyis gdab ste / de yang skabs 'dir smos /
T02D2663a:147b-14: mod kyi las 'di rnams kyi dang por shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:147b-15: de dag rnams kyi gdong khob cig ces pa ni /
T02D2663a:147b-16: dam tshig gis btab pa'i ras des slob ma de rnams kyi gdong dgab par bya ste /
T02D2663a:147b-17: gdong dgab pa de yang de dag sngar rang bzhin gyis mig tu 'dug pa las /
T02D2663a:147b-18: dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:147b-19: pas bkab nas ye shes kyi mig tu bsgyur bar
T02D2663a:147b-20: 'gyur te / ye shes kyi mig de phye nas
T02D2663a:147b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2663a:147b-22: rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:147b-23: snying rjer song ba'i yid kyis te //
T02D2663a:147b-24: zhes pa ni snying rje dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:147b-25: de khe dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:147b-26: lan gsum dam tshig zlos su gzhug / ces pa
T02D2663a:147b-27: ni me tog 'dor du gzhug ces pa dang sbyar
T02D2663a:147b-28: te / dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2663a:147b-29: sngags kyang lan gsum bzlas te me tog 'dor du
T02D2663a:147b-30: te / gzhug go // dam tshig gsum zhes pa
T02D2663a:147b-31: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa dang
T02D2663a:147b-32: te / gzhug go // / gsung mi zad pa dang /
T02D2663a:147b-33: thugs mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2663a:147b-34: de'i byin gyi rlabs su gyur pa ni dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663a:147b-35: phyag rgya bcings shing de'i sngags lan gsum bzlas na /
T02D2663a:147b-36: sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rdo rje rgyan de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:147b-37: de bas na sngags pa rtag tu zlos pa la
T02D2663a:147b-38: sogs pa byed pa'i tshe yang dam tshig gsum gyi
T02D2663a:147b-41: dam tshig nyams pa la sogs pa slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:147b-42: spyi bor yi ge gzhag pa ni //
T02D2663a:147b-43: klad kyi 'khor dang bcas pa ste //
T02D2663a:148a-3: kha dog dkar ba zla ba shar ba bzhin du'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:148a-4: slob ma'i spyi bor yi ge ra chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsam ste /
T02D2663a:148a-5: ra ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:148a-6: klad kor bzhag pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:148a-7: 'bar ba'i phreng dang bcas pa ni rgyu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:148a-8: zla ba shar ba dang 'dra ba ni zla ba 'char ba'i tshe /
T02D2663a:148a-9: rang bzhin dkar ba la cung zad dmar po bstan
T02D2663a:148a-10: pa ste dkar ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o
T02D2663a:148a-11: // rtsa dmar ba ni sems can gyi don la chags pa'o //
T02D2663a:148a-12: de nas me tog 'thor chug cig / mgon po kun gyi spyan sngar te //
T02D2663a:148a-13: me tog de ni gang lhung ba //
T02D2663a:148a-14: sngags mkhan gyis ni de byin cig / ces pa
T02D2663a:148a-15: ni sngon dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs shing lha ma
T02D2663a:148a-16: mnos pa'am / dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing lha ma mnos pa'am /
T02D2663a:148a-17: lha mnos te btang ba rnams gdod lha mnos par
T02D2663a:148a-18: bya na me tog gdod de ltar dor bar bya
T02D2663a:148a-19: / de ltar lha mnos zin te /
T02D2663a:148a-21: gdong g-yogs bkrol la me tog de bdag gi lha'am
T02D2663a:148a-22: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la dbul bar
T02D2663a:148a-23: bya ste / de dag kyang zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:148a-24: me tog bor nas lha gang la bab pa de'i
T02D2663a:148a-25: cha brtag pa yang zhib tu gsang ba'i rgyud kyi
T02D2663a:148a-26: nang du blta'o // dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo ru ste //
T02D2663a:148a-27: sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha //
T02D2663a:148a-28: sgo gnyis kyi ni bar der yang //
T02D2663a:148a-29: slob ma der gzud dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2663a:148a-30: der 'dug pa ni cho ga kun //
T02D2663a:148a-31: rim bzhin de rnams chud par bya'o //
T02D2663a:148a-32: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i sgo khyud kyi dbus su slob ma der gzung ste /
T02D2663a:148a-33: der gnas nas gong du smos pa'i las thams cad bya ste /
T02D2663a:148a-34: sgo khar slob ma la chu gdab pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs so //
T02D2663a:148a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ma zhugs par sgo kha nas las de rnams bya ba yang /
T02D2663a:148a-36: lha rnams la me tog 'dor na yang sgo kha na bor na nang du 'bab par 'gyur gyi //
T02D2663a:148a-37: nang du zhugs te bor na lha kha cig rgyab tu lus par 'gyur la /
T02D2663a:148a-38: bdag nang du zhugs te bor na me tog phyi rol du bab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:148b-0: gnyis su @148b na gong du skyob pa rnams kyi spyan sngar zhes kyang 'byung bas /
T02D2663a:148b-1: bdag nang du zhugs na kha cig gi spyan sngar kyang mi 'gyur la /
T02D2663a:148b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams
T02D2663a:148b-3: kha cig la rgyab kyis blta bar mi rigs pa'i
T02D2663a:148b-4: phyir ro // gsum du na 'di ni chos kyi
T02D2663a:148b-5: rgyal po'i 'khor bas thog ma nang du zhugs na
T02D2663a:148b-7: rgyal po'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:148b-8: de bzhin slob ma kun chung nas thams cad rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663a:148b-9: de dag rnams la zhir byas nas //
T02D2663a:148b-10: zhes pa nas sngags pa 'og ma'i bar du dkyil
T02D2663a:148b-11: 'khor du chud pa'i slob ma de rnams zhi bar
T02D2663a:148b-12: bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2663a:148b-13: slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas sdig pa rnams byang zhing rgyud dag pa des /
T02D2663a:148b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2663a:148b-15: rgyan la sogs pa la sbyin sreg gi sgo nas
T02D2663a:148b-16: yon phul na / bsod nams 'phel te sdig pa byang bas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:148b-17: de'i rim pa yang thog ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon rol /
T02D2663a:148b-18: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i sgo'i phyi rim gsum po'i nang rol du zhugs te thab khru gang ba bya /
T02D2663a:148b-19: de ste dkyil 'khor chud de nang du mi shod
T02D2663a:148b-20: na dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim gyi sgo khar bya
T02D2663a:148b-21: / khang thog la sogs par brkor mi rung na /
T02D2663a:148b-22: tshon dmar pos zhugs thab de bri bar bya ste /
T02D2663a:148b-23: de nas zhugs thab de'i mtha' mar ku sha lho
T02D2663a:148b-24: phyogs nas brtsams te bskor ba'i thab tu dgram pa
T02D2663a:148b-25: ni / rtsva gcig gi rtsa bas gcig gi mgo non par byas te bskor ro //
T02D2663a:148b-26: de bas na khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bsngags pa'i spos chus der btab bo //
T02D2663a:148b-27: de nas zhugs thab der 'jig rten pa'i tri ta
T02D2663a:148b-28: zhes bya ba las thams cad byed pa mgrin pa
T02D2663a:148b-31: me tog gcig zhugs thab der bor la me de byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2663a:148b-32: de nas me de kha bkru ba dang /
T02D2663a:148b-33: gang ba'i sbyin sreg gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du byin nas /
T02D2663a:148b-34: de nyid du 'bar bzhin du bzhag la /
T02D2663a:148b-35: de nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhi ba'i me
T02D2663a:148b-36: zhugs thab der me tog gcig bor nas byin gyis
T02D2663a:148b-37: brlabs te kha bkru ba dang /
T02D2663a:148b-38: gang ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa snga ma bzhin
T02D2663a:148b-39: du byas nas slob ma re re'i phyir yang sbyin
T02D2663a:149a-0: sreg lan nyi shu rtsa re @149a * //
T02D2663a:149a-2: slob ma'i lag ba g-yas ba'i mthe bong nas slob dpon gyis lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste bya'o //
T02D2663a:149a-4: yan lag gi don bshad pa ni /
T02D2663a:149a-5: rtog pa kun dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663a:149a-6: zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams dkyil 'khor du gzhug par sbyor na /
T02D2663a:149a-7: skyabs gsum la sogs par song ba dang /
T02D2663a:149a-8: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2663a:149a-9: zhugs nas kyang phyis sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663a:149a-11: phyi ma gsum dag ste rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663a:149a-12: sbyin sreg tshul nas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2663a:149a-13: zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga gzhung las
T02D2663a:149a-14: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bya ba ste 'og
T02D2663a:149a-16: snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni sngon rol du gnyis po yang rgyab tu ste /
T02D2663a:149a-17: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i dbus su ni //
T02D2663a:149a-18: ma yengs pa yi sems kyis su //
T02D2663a:149a-19: khru gang tsam du bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:149a-20: me yi zhugs thab bsgrags pa yin ;
T02D2663a:149a-21: / zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:149a-22: 'dir tshad 'ga' zhig khru gang du gsungs kyi zlum
T02D2663a:149a-23: po'am gru bzhir bya ba ma smos kyang zhi ba
T02D2663a:149a-24: dang rgyas pa'i zhugs thab ji ltar grags pa ltar
T02D2663a:149a-25: bya ste / 'di'i skabs su zhi ba'i las pas zlum por 'os so //
T02D2663a:149a-26: yang na zhi ba dang rgyas pa gnyis su mthun na gru bzhi yang nyes pa med do //
T02D2663a:149a-27: kha ran sor bzhi'i tshad du zhes pa ni zhugs
T02D2663a:149a-28: thab gru bzhi na kha ran yang gru bzhir bya
T02D2663a:149a-29: / zhugs thab zlum po na kha ran yang zlum por bya'o //
T02D2663a:149a-30: dbus su yang ni rdo rje bri //
T02D2663a:149a-31: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i phyag rgyar gyur ba rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri'o //
T02D2663a:149a-32: sngags pa yi ni g-yas logs su //
T02D2663a:149a-33: spyin sreg gi ni yo byad bzhag / g-yon logs su ni slob ma dgod //
T02D2663a:149a-34: ces pa ni bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas rnams sngags pa'i g-yas su gzhag go //
T02D2663a:149a-35: g-yon du slob ma dgod pa ni slob ma'i g-yas su slob dpon 'bab ste /
T02D2663a:149a-36: slob dpon de slob ma la phan 'dogs pas rjes su mthun pa bstan to //
T02D2663a:149a-37: kun kyang cog bur 'dug par bya //
T02D2663a:149a-38: zhes pa ni tshul gyi las rnams ma zin na bag phab ste 'dug pa'am gus pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:149a-39: bdag ni 'jag ma'i rtsva bting ba'i steng du ste /
T02D2663a:149a-40: der 'dug shig pa ni slob dpon nyid rtsva ku
T02D2663a:149b-0: sha bting ba'i stang du 'dug pa la @149b bya'o
T02D2663a:149b-1: // yang ni tshon rtsis bri zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:149b-2: so so'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:149b-3: nyi shu rtsa gcig blugs shing sreg / ces pa'i
T02D2663a:149b-4: bar du ni go rim bzhin du gong du bshad
T02D2663a:149b-5: zin to // yid thub byams par bsams la ni //
T02D2663a:149b-6: zhes pa ni zhi ba'i las la tshul gyis byams par bya'o //
T02D2663a:149b-7: sbyin sreg byas nas sngags pa yis //
T02D2663a:149b-8: slob ma rnams la yon slongs shig / ces pa nas mchod ston khyed kyis ci nus par /
T02D2663a:149b-9: dge 'dun gsol ba sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la'o
T02D2663a:149b-10: zhes pa'i bar slob ma rtog pa sbyangs pa de
T02D2663a:149b-11: dag bsod nams kyi zhing dam pa la sbyin pa
T02D2663a:149b-12: byed du slob dpon gyis gzhug ste /
T02D2663a:149b-13: phan dam pa 'dogs pa'i slob dpon de la slob
T02D2663a:149b-14: ma rnams kyis gus par yon phul na bsod nams
T02D2663a:149b-16: gser dang dngul dang rin po che la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes bskul ma btab bo //
T02D2663a:149b-17: de ltar slob dpon la yon phul nas kyang 'phags
T02D2663a:149b-18: pa'i dge 'dun ni sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa ste
T02D2663a:149b-19: / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yon phul ba dang /
T02D2663a:149b-20: mchod ston gsol bar bya ba bstan pa ni /
T02D2663a:149b-21: 'di ni bsod nams zhing yin te //
T02D2663a:149b-22: mgon po rnams kyis gsungs pa ste //
T02D2663a:149b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D2663a:149b-25: phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di
T02D2663a:149b-27: sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02D2663a:149b-28: de ni rgyas par bshad par bya //
T02D2663a:149b-29: yang dag yid gcig gis la nyon //
T02D2663a:149b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:149b-32: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun gyis //
T02D2663a:149b-33: khyod la rtag tu srung bar byed //
T02D2663a:149b-34: ces pa'i bar du slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i skabs 'chad de //
T02D2663a:149b-35: de la mngon par dbang bskur zhes pa ni bcom
T02D2663a:149b-36: ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa
T02D2663a:149b-37: nyid mi zad pa'i rgyan rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:149b-38: gyi byin gyis brlabs su 'gyur ba'i spyan sngar mngon
T02D2663a:149b-39: sum du rin po che la sogs pa'i bum par
T02D2663a:149b-41: mngon par blugs zhes pa ni tshig gi don to //
T02D2663a:149b-42: de yang rnam pa gsum du brtag par bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i ming ji ltab dang /
T02D2663a:149b-43: su la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2663a:149b-45: da la dbang bskur ba'i ming ji lta ba zhes
T02D2663a:149b-46: pa ni spyir dbang bskur ba'i rnam pa mang ste
T02D2663a:150a-1: sngags par bya ba'i phyir rig pa sbyin pa'o //
T02D2663a:150a-2: las kyi dbang bskur ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D2663a:150a-3: pa dang mngon par spyod pa'i las bya ba dang
T02D2663a:150a-4: gdon bsal ba la sogs pa bya bar dbang bskur
T02D2663a:150a-5: ba ste / de la skabs 'dir ni slob dpon
T02D2663a:150a-6: du dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ste de ni
T02D2663a:150a-7: ba ste / ming ngo // su la dbang bskur bar bya zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:150a-8: slob ma phal thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:150a-9: khyad par can gyi slob ma dam tshig lnga'i skabs nas gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:150a-10: sngags dang phyag rgya yang bstan zhing /
T02D2663a:150a-11: las dang bya ba la yang rab tu sbyar bar
T02D2663a:150a-12: bya zhes pa ste sngags kyi rgyud rnams thos shing
T02D2663a:150a-13: / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bri nus pa yongs
T02D2663a:150a-14: su rdzogs pa'i slob ma rnams la dbang bskur te
T02D2663a:150a-15: / / su la dbang bskur zhes pa ni de rnams la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2663a:150a-16: ci'i phyir dbang bskur zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:150a-17: chos kyi mig mi 'tshub par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2663a:150a-18: 'jig rten na yang 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag lung
T02D2663a:150a-19: bstan pa dang rtog pa dang sman la sogs pa
T02D2663a:150a-20: rnams kyang slob mas rdzogs par lobs nas /
T02D2663a:150a-21: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 'jig rten
T02D2663a:150a-22: pa rnams la ji ltar srid par byas nas bshad
T02D2663a:150a-23: pa la sogs pa bya bar slob ma la lung
T02D2663a:150a-25: de dag kyang so so'i gtsug lag rdzogs par mi
T02D2663a:150a-26: shes shing dbang ma bskur bar bshad pa la sogs
T02D2663a:150a-27: pa byas na / gtsug lag de dag ji lta
T02D2663a:150a-28: ba bzhin du bshad mi nus pas de dag gis
T02D2663a:150a-29: mig mi 'tshub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:150a-30: de bzhin du 'dir yang slob ma rnams rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs par shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:150a-31: de dag nyid slob dpon gyis mngon sum du bskor nas rgyud bshad pa dang /
T02D2663a:150a-32: dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa ji lta ba
T02D2663a:150a-33: bzhin du shes par slob dpon nyid kyis yid ches
T02D2663a:150a-34: te / sems can gyi don byed nus par gyur
T02D2663a:150a-35: pa rnams la dbang bskur na chos kyi mig mi
T02D2663a:150a-37: gnyis su na de ltar mngon par 'dus pa'i slob ma des slob dpon du gyur na /
T02D2663a:150a-38: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang khungs de lta bu las
T02D2663a:150a-39: byung ba'i slob dpon de la yid ches shing btsun
T02D2663a:150a-40: par byed do // rim pa 'di lta bur dbang
T02D2663a:150a-41: ma bskur ba rgyud la sogs pa mi shes par
T02D2663a:150a-42: thug thub tu sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa 'chad
T02D2663a:150b-1: na ji lta ba nyid du mi shes pas don
T02D2663a:150b-3: sngags kyi lha la sogs pas kyang byin gyis mi rlob pas ci bsams pa'i don mi 'grub ste /
T02D2663a:150b-4: gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams yid mi ches shing mi phyogs pas chos kyi mig 'tshubs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:150b-5: ci'i phyir dbang bskur zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:150b-6: de la dbang bskur ba yang /
T02D2663a:150b-7: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi rgyal po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bka' khrims ston pa /
T02D2663a:150b-8: mngon par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa
T02D2663a:150b-9: de ji ltar rgyal thabs su bsgyur bar bya ba
T02D2663a:150b-12: ma lus pa'i bde ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed
T02D2663a:150b-13: pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i phyir te
T02D2663a:150b-14: / de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2663a:150b-15: thog mar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar khru dos bcad de /
T02D2663a:150b-16: de dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gcig pa sgo gcig pa bris la /
T02D2663a:150b-17: de'i nang padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
T02D2663a:150b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi bri /
T02D2663a:150b-19: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa yang byang chub sems dpa' bzhi dang /
T02D2663a:150b-20: ci bgyi zhes pa bzhi ste brgyad bri /
T02D2663a:150b-21: padmo'i dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram bris la der slob ma bzhag ste /
T02D2663a:150b-22: dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2663a:150b-23: gleng gzhi rgya chen po snyan pa rnams kyis bsgrags shing /
T02D2663a:150b-24: kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:150b-25: dpa'i rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che
T02D2663a:150b-26: bzhi'i bum pa dkyil 'khor chen po lan re bskor
T02D2663a:150b-27: nas slob ma de'i spyi bo nas blugs so //
T02D2663a:150b-28: de'i 'og tu 'dir dngos kyis ma smos kyang //
T02D2663a:150b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02D2663a:150b-32: go cha rnams kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663a:150b-33: sngags kyis kyang slob med ma de la padmo'i steng
T02D2663a:150b-34: na 'dug pa nyid na rim pa bzhin du byin
T02D2663a:150b-35: gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas gnas de nas bslangs te /
T02D2663a:150b-36: dkyil 'khor de'i nye 'khor du khri bzang po gcig gzhag ste /
T02D2663a:150b-37: gos gsher ba brjes nas gsar pa phrugs gcig gon
T02D2663a:150b-38: nas khri steng du gzhag ste dri dang me tog
T02D2663a:150b-40: slob dpon nyid mig phye ba'i thur ma thogs nas mdun du 'dug ste /
T02D2663a:151a-0: @151a * // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bu khyod mi shes
T02D2663a:151a-1: pa'i rab rib rnams bsal to zhes pa la sogs
T02D2663a:151a-3: de nas me long blangs la chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste /
T02D2663a:151a-4: rang bzhin med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi tshul du sgoms shig ces pa'i tshig brjod do //
T02D2663a:151a-5: de nas de ltar bdag gi don yongs su rdzogs
T02D2663a:151a-6: nas pha rol gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya
T02D2663a:151a-7: ba'i phyir rkang pa'i 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo
T02D2663a:151a-8: bzhag ste / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces bsgrags so //
T02D2663a:151a-9: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de yang
T02D2663a:151a-10: sangs rgyas gsung mchog 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2663a:151a-11: du khyab par grags pa bskor bar bya ste /

T02D2663a:155b-3: thams cad du khyab par byas nas zhes pa ni
