T02D2663a:187b-24: ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:187b-25: rdo rje rgyan de dag ci la yang thogs pa
T02D2663a:187b-26: med pa'o // gnas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bya /
T02D2663a:187b-27: stobs zhes pa ni de ltar thogs pa med pa nyid stobs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2663a:187b-28: byin gyis brlabs zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:187b-29: rdo rje thogs pa med pa'i stobs su gyur pa
T02D2663a:187b-30: de nyid phyag rgya'i ngo bor byin gyis brlabs pa'o
T02D2663a:187b-31: // bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
T02D2663a:187b-32: de 'di ltar kun gyis mi tshugs pa'i stobs /
T02D2663a:187b-33: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs dam tshig la
T02D2663a:187b-34: 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i stobs kyi rig pa 'byung
T02D2663a:187b-35: ngo zhes pa mi tshugs pa'i stobs zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:187b-37: mi mnyam pa'i stobs zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:187b-38: mi tshugs pa'i stobs de nyid gang dang yang mi mnyam pa'o //
T02D2663a:188a-1: la 'jug pa'i stobs zhes pa ni dam tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:188a-2: dam tshig la 'jug pa ni sku mi zad pa
T02D2663a:188a-3: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor lta ba
T02D2663a:188a-4: 'og ma'i 'gro ba rnams kyi spyod yul du mi
T02D2663a:188a-5: 'gyur bas / de'i byin gyis brlabs su gyur pa /
T02D2663a:188a-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di bcings shing
T02D2663a:188a-7: brjod pa na rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor de mthong
T02D2663a:188a-8: ba dang 'dra ba na 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188a-9: gnyis su dam tshig srung ba rnams nyams pa na /
T02D2663a:188a-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di byas na /
T02D2663a:188a-12: de byas pa tsam gyis dam tshig las nyams pa de 'tsho ba ste /
T02D2663a:188a-13: slar dam tshig tu zhugs par 'gyur bas na dam tshig tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188a-14: gsum du na dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663a:188a-16: dam tshig tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
T02D2663a:188a-17: gsang ba'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni
T02D2663a:188a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ston pa'o zhes
T02D2663a:188a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra bas na /
T02D2663a:188a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ston pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188a-22: gnyis sun gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bris pa yang /
T02D2663a:188a-23: rig pa 'di brjod nas bstan pa'am /
T02D2663a:188a-24: rig pa 'di brjod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de mthong bar 'gyur bas /
T02D2663a:188a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ston pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188a-26: chos lam gsum gyi mtshams las mi 'da'o zhes pa
T02D2663a:188a-27: chos lam gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang
T02D2663a:188a-28: gsung dang rdo rje'i yid mi zad pa'i rgyan nam
T02D2663a:188a-29: / sku gsum ste de'i lam ni dam tshig bsrung ba bya ba rnams la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:188a-30: lam de de las mi 'da' ba'o //
T02D2663a:188a-31: pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa yongs su rdzogs
T02D2663a:188a-32: pa ste zhes pa ni dam tshig der zhugs nas
T02D2663a:188a-33: / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D2663a:188a-34: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T02D2663a:188a-35: rim gyis rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D2663a:188a-36: de'i mthus sa las rim gyis 'phar bar 'gyur bas na /
T02D2663a:188a-37: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:188a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni /
T02D2663a:188b-0: phyag rgya 'di la @188b gnas zhes pa ni dam tshig gi dan /
T02D2663a:188b-1: dam tshig tu bsrung ba las mi 'da' 'am /
T02D2663a:188b-2: sku mi zad pa la sogs pa chud par byed pa'am /
T02D2663a:188b-3: sku de dag yongs su thob par byed pa de
T02D2663a:188b-4: dag phyag rgya 'di'i sgo nas mchod cing chud par
T02D2663a:188b-5: byed pas na phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas
T02D2663a:188b-7: rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2663a:188b-8: chos dbyings rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02D2663a:188b-9: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid phyag rgya 'dis mtshon gyi chud par 'gyur bas na /
T02D2663a:188b-10: chos kyi dbyings sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188b-11: phyag rgya 'di ni dpal mchog ste //
T02D2663a:188b-12: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes kyang bsgrags //
T02D2663a:188b-13: de yi 'khor lo bskor pa ni //
T02D2663a:188b-14: 'jig rten mgon po sgrol rnams so //
T02D2663a:188b-15: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2663a:188b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663a:188b-17: dpal mchog ces pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la bya ste /
T02D2663a:188b-18: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de lugs kyi chos dang /
T02D2663a:188b-19: thob pa'i chos rnams 'khor lo bskor ba ste /
T02D2663a:188b-20: phyag rgya des rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas /
T02D2663a:188b-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams
T02D2663a:188b-22: kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes
T02D2663a:188b-23: pa'o // ral gri'i phyag rgya ste phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2663a:188b-24: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi ste ;
T02D2663a:188b-25: / des ni lta ba rnams gcod pa //
T02D2663a:188b-26: lhan cig pa dang bdag tu blta //
T02D2663a:188b-27: zhes pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya chos dang gang
T02D2663a:188b-28: zag la bdag med par chud pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2663a:188b-30: ye shes de ni lhan cig tu skyes pa'i bdag tu lta ba rnams gcod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:188b-31: phyag rgya 'di ni dpal mchog ste //
T02D2663a:188b-32: chos kyi dung zhes bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2663a:188b-33: des ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten na //
T02D2663a:188b-34: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams dang //
T02D2663a:188b-35: rdul med pa yi chos 'chad pa //
T02D2663a:188b-37: zhes pa ni dung gi phyag rgya de sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi mtshan mar gyur pa ste /
T02D2663a:188b-38: sangs rgyas kyi gsung de rdul dang bral ba'i chos
T02D2663a:188b-39: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba thob par byed
T02D2663a:188b-40: pa / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'chad do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:188b-42: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi ni /
T02D2663a:189a-2: mgon po gang du 'tshang rgya ba //
T02D2663a:189a-3: de ni skyes dang byang chub pa //
T02D2663a:189a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:189a-5: phyag rgya padmo de sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan te /
T02D2663a:189a-6: mgon po sangs rgyas rnams gang du byang chub na yang gdan 'di la bzhugs te /
T02D2663a:189a-7: byang chub sangs rgyas sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang padmo 'di las skyes zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:189a-8: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya gram ma rig pa'i grong khyer rnams 'byed pa ste /
T02D2663a:189a-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes te //
T02D2663a:189a-10: lha min lha yis btsugs pa'o //
T02D2663a:189a-11: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi de ma thag pa'i lam gyi ye shes te /
T02D2663a:189a-12: rdo rje'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2663a:189a-13: ma rig pa'i grong khyer rnams 'joms pa ni /
T02D2663a:189a-14: ye shes des ma rig pa dang sems las byung
T02D2663a:189a-15: ba'i 'khor rnams dang bcas par 'dzoms zhes pa gtsug
T02D2663a:189a-16: tor phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2663a:189a-17: gtsug tor zhes su bsgrags pa yin /
T02D2663a:189a-18: des ni bcings ma thag tu yang //
T02D2663a:189a-19: phyag rgya gtso bor gyur par 'ang //
T02D2663a:189a-20: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gtsug tor te /
T02D2663a:189a-21: phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2663a:189a-22: de ni bcings ma thag tu sangs rgyas gtso bor
T02D2663a:189a-23: 'gyur zhes pa ni phyag rgya la mang du bsdus
T02D2663a:189a-24: pas lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ba la /
T02D2663a:189a-25: gcig pus lha'i gzugs su gyur te /
T02D2663a:189a-26: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di gcig pu bcings pas
T02D2663a:189a-27: kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:189a-28: // spu mdzod ces su bsgrags pa ste //
T02D2663a:189a-29: rgyal mchog phyag rgya rtag pa ru //
T02D2663a:189a-30: 'di ltar bcing ba byas na ni //
T02D2663a:189a-31: de dag rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2663a:189a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu'i mtshan smin mtshams nas spu mdzod ces bya ba nas /
T02D2663a:189a-33: spu'i nyag ma gcig 'byung ba brkyang na ni /
T02D2663a:189a-34: khams gsum thams cad du yang khyab par 'gyur ba ;
T02D2663a:189a-35: dkyil nas de nyid du zad par phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2663a:189a-37: sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhas pa'o //
T02D2663a:189a-38: lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ni tshigs su bcad pa rang log tu gsungs par zad do //
T02D2663a:189b-0: sems can kun la @189b mi 'jigs pa //
T02D2663a:189b-1: de yis dbugs ni 'byin pa yin //
T02D2663a:189b-2: gang gi rgya chen de bcings pa //
T02D2663a:189b-3: mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgrags pa'o //
T02D2663a:189b-4: zhes pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663a:189b-5: bdag gam sems can rnams bgegs la sogs pa skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na /
T02D2663a:189b-6: phyag rgya bcings te bstan la de las thar bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:189b-7: 'di ni mchog sbyin phyag rgya ste //
T02D2663a:189b-8: 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags //
T02D2663a:189b-9: 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //
T02D2663a:189b-10: mchog sbyin rgyal ba dam par 'gyur //
T02D2663a:189b-11: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663a:189b-12: nam grub pa la sogs pa'i mchog nod na /
T02D2663a:189b-13: mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis bcings nas mnod do //
T02D2663a:189b-14: rgyal chen phyag rgya chen po 'di //
T02D2663a:189b-15: sangs rgyas mgon po kun gyi ste //
T02D2663a:189b-16: bdud rnams kun la bsdigs pa yin //
T02D2663a:189b-17: re ba kun gyi sbyin pa'o //
T02D2663a:189b-18: de ni bcings ma thag tu yang //
T02D2663a:189b-19: so sor gyes par gdon mi za //
T02D2663a:189b-20: bdud sde mang po 'jigs pa dang //
T02D2663a:189b-21: bgegs dang rnam bgegs gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2663a:189b-22: zhes pa ni bgegs rnam par skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663a:189b-23: phyag rgya de bcings pa sbyin /
T02D2663a:189b-24: bgegs la sogs pa thams cad rnam par skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:189b-25: de ltar bgegs rnams so sor 'byer na bgegs med pas /
T02D2663a:189b-26: ji ltar bsams pa'i don grub par 'gyur bas na /
T02D2663a:189b-27: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:189b-28: 'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyis //
T02D2663a:189b-29: snying rje las byung spyan yin te //
T02D2663a:189b-30: mig gi steng du de zhog cig / de phyir sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur //
T02D2663a:189b-31: zhes pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes
T02D2663a:189b-32: rab kyi spyan snying rje chen po'i dbang gis sems
T02D2663a:189b-33: can thams cad la gzigs pa snying rje las byung
T02D2663a:189b-35: spyan de phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas na /
T02D2663a:189b-37: mig tu bzhag na bdag sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur ba'i tshe /
T02D2663a:189b-38: sangs rgyas kyi spyan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:189b-39: zhags pa 'di ni mchog ces gsungs //
T02D2663a:189b-40: gnod pa thams cad med par byed //
T02D2663a:190a-2: rtag tu gnod pa rnam bcings yin //
T02D2663a:190a-3: zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi
T02D2663a:190a-4: rang bzhin gyis ye shes sems can thams cad 'don
T02D2663a:190a-5: par byed ces zhags pa'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:190a-6: te / zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcings pas /
T02D2663a:190a-7: bgegs la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams bcings pa'i las byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:190a-8: 'di ni kyo ba btang zhes gsungs //
T02D2663a:190a-9: sangs rgyas mgon po kun gyis te //
T02D2663a:190a-10: thams cad ma lus 'gugs pa yin //
T02D2663a:190a-11: sa bcur gnas pa rnams dang ni //
T02D2663a:190a-12: mthu chen byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2663a:190a-13: gzhan yang gnod par sems pa'o //
T02D2663a:190a-14: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i spyod pa rnams rgyu'i tshe na /
T02D2663a:190a-15: bsdu ba rnam bzhis sems can rnams 'dud cing 'dren pa dang /
T02D2663a:190a-16: 'bras bu'i tshe na sku mi zad pa la sogs
T02D2663a:190a-17: pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyis sems can sdud cing 'dren
T02D2663a:190a-18: par spyod pa de nyid lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar byin
T02D2663a:190a-20: lcags kyus kyang thams cad 'dren par byed pa ni /
T02D2663a:190a-21: bgegs la sogs pa gnod par byed pa rnams dang /
T02D2663a:190a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa yang ste /
T02D2663a:190a-23: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa yang 'gugs na /
T02D2663a:190a-24: gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:190a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya /
T02D2663a:190a-26: phyag rgya snga ma las zhes pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya la bsnyel te /
T02D2663a:190a-27: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya srin lag gnyis bsgreng bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:190a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D2663a:190a-29: mngon par byang chub pa lnga sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190a-30: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni spyod pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663a:190a-32: stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ni kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190a-33: chos thams cad snyoms par chud pa'i phyag rgyas ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190a-34: de la sngags kyang kun du sangs rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:190a-35: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar //
T02D2663a:190a-36: kun du rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2663a:190a-37: zhes pa ni byang chub dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2663a:190a-39: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sbyar ro
T02D2663a:190a-40: // de la sngags dang phyag rgya rnams /
T02D2663a:190b-0: bstan pa @190b yang spyir bstan pa dang so sor bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:190b-1: de la so sor bstan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:190b-2: dngos su bstan pa dang gzhan du bsnyel ba'o //
T02D2663a:190b-3: de la dngos su bstan pa ni gong du ming smos pa rnams so //
T02D2663a:190b-4: gzhan du bsnyel ba ni de la sogs pa'o zhes pa ste rgyun du bsnyel ba'o //
T02D2663a:190b-5: spyir bstan pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po lus ji
T02D2663a:190b-6: tsam du bskyod pa kun kyang phyag rgyar rig par
T02D2663a:190b-7: bya'o // lce ji tsam bskyod pa de yang sngags rnams su shes par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:190b-8: de yang ji lta bur gnas na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:190b-9: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /
T02D2663a:190b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas nas dkyil 'khor bri zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:190b-11: nam sngags pa byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /
T02D2663a:190b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur na /
T02D2663a:190b-13: ji tsam du lus la sogs pa de tsam du phyag rgyar 'gyur /
T02D2663a:190b-14: ji tsam du lce bskyod pa de tsam du sngags brjod par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang sbyar te /
T02D2663a:190b-15: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid ces pa ni /
T02D2663a:190b-16: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:190b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas //
T02D2663a:190b-18: zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:190b-19: kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas pa ni lha'i gzugs su sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:190b-20: don dam par ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du lhar sbyar ba ste /
T02D2663a:190b-21: de ltar yang byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing /
T02D2663a:190b-22: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid lha'i gzugs
T02D2663a:190b-23: su sbyar ba ma yin par sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2663a:190b-24: bya ba'am / dkyil 'khor bris na sangs rgyas dang
T02D2663a:190b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams srung bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2663a:190b-27: da ni sngags kyi le'u zhes bshad pa la sogs
T02D2663a:190b-28: pa sngags kyi tshig dang yi ge'i 'bru las ting
T02D2663a:190b-29: nge 'dzin gyi sgor gyur pa la sogs pa yi
T02D2663a:190b-30: ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
T02D2663a:190b-31: / a'a li la sogs bcu drug dang ldan par 'gyur ba bstan te /
T02D2663a:190b-32: de la yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams ni /
T02D2663a:190b-33: yi ge aa dang mi ldan par mi smra ste /
T02D2663a:190b-34: de thams cad kyang aa dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-0: de yang gsang ba'i bdag po thams cad du rgyas pa'i sgo mo @191a * //
T02D2663a:191a-1: chos kyi gzhung nyon cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:191a-2: aa dang ldan pa'i yi ga rnams sngags su sbyar ba dang /
T02D2663a:191a-3: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad du khyab bar 'jug pa'i sgo mo zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:191a-5: gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' aa la gnas te /
T02D2663a:191a-6: kun la nan tan bya'o zhes so //
T02D2663a:191a-7: dang po aa dang sa ba gsum smos pa ni rigs gsum smos pa'o //
T02D2663a:191a-8: de la dang por yi ge aa la tha ma
T02D2663a:191a-9: la par smos nas ka la sogs pa sum cu
T02D2663a:191a-10: rtsa gnyis po rnams smos pa ni ka la sogs
T02D2663a:191a-11: pa ste / rnam pa thams cad kyang tha mal pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:191a-12: de dag thams cad byang chub kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:191a-13: yi ge aa 'dren pa thog mar smos nas ka
T02D2663a:191a-14: la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'dren par smos pa
T02D2663a:191a-15: rnams ni / de dag thams cad spyod pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-16: yi ge aa thog mar smos na /
T02D2663a:191a-17: ka la zhes pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa
T02D2663a:191a-18: gnyis rnams smos pa thams cad kyang aa dang ldan
T02D2663a:191a-19: pas / kun sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-20: yi ge aa tshig gnyis dang ldan pa thog mar smos nas /
T02D2663a:191a-21: yi ge tshig gnyis dang ldan pa la sogs pa
T02D2663a:191a-22: thams cad yi ge aa tshig gnyis dang ldan pas
T02D2663a:191a-23: // thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-24: ka la sogs pa yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2663a:191a-25: po de rnams ai la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D2663a:191a-26: na yang ting nge 'dzin de dag nyid kyi sgo
T02D2663a:191a-27: nas ston pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-28: de la ri r'i dang li l'i gnyis ma smos pa ni /
T02D2663a:191a-29: gong du yi ge ra dang ai la sogs pa ri r'i zhes pa de'i khongs su 'dus /
T02D2663a:191a-30: la dang aa mi smos pa li zhes de'i khongs su 'dus par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:191a-31: gsang ba'i bdag po yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi gzhung ngo zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:191a-32: gsang ba'i bdag po pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing pra sa ra na /
T02D2663a:191a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du khyab pa'i sgo
T02D2663a:191a-34: mo chos kyi gzhung 'di mi 'chad pa ma mthong
T02D2663a:191a-35: ngo zhes pa'i bar du smos pa'i yi ge rnams
T02D2663a:191a-36: kyi rjes su bsngags ba bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:191a-37: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:191b-0: byin gyis brlabs pa phun sum @191b tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:191b-1: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:191b-2: las phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:191b-3: de la rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T02D2663a:191b-4: yi ge'i rang bzhin rnams so sor ston pa ste /
T02D2663a:191b-5: yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi gzhung ngo zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663a:191b-6: las phun sum tshogs pa ni sngags kyi tshul la
T02D2663a:191b-7: rnam par gnas pa'i cho ga'o zhes gsungs pa'i tshig
T02D2663a:191b-8: gis so // byin gyis brlabs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T02D2663a:191b-9: nam yi ge rnams sngags kyi sgra brjod dam /
T02D2663a:191b-10: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'am lha'i gzugs su sbyor na /
T02D2663a:191b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis brlab ste /
T02D2663a:191b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663a:191b-13: mthu phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T02D2663a:191b-14: 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs
T02D2663a:191b-15: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad do zhes pa
T02D2663a:191b-16: nas chos kyi gzhung 'di mi 'chad par ma mthong
T02D2663a:191b-17: ngo zhes pa'i bar du ste ;
T02D2663a:191b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pas mthu che'o //
T02D2663a:191b-19: las phun sum tshogs pa la rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2663a:191b-20: sngags rnams su sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663a:191b-21: lha'i gzugs su bsgyur ba dang /
T02D2663a:191b-22: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663a:191b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rol mo'o //
T02D2663a:191b-24: de la sngags rnams su sbyor ba ni yi ge
T02D2663a:191b-25: 'bru de rnams las sngags kyi tshig gi tshul du
T02D2663a:191b-26: sbyar ba ste / sngags kyi tshul la rnam par
T02D2663a:191b-27: gnas pa'i cho ga'o zhes pa'i tshig snga ma nyid
T02D2663a:191b-28: sbyar ba ste / kyis so // lha'i gzugs su
T02D2663a:191b-29: bsgyur ba ni yi ge rnams gang yang rung ba
T02D2663a:191b-30: las lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba ste /
T02D2663a:191b-31: gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663a:191b-32: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba ni yi ge 'bru
T02D2663a:191b-33: de rnams las stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin chos
T02D2663a:191b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663a:191b-36: spyod pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las dang /
T02D2663a:191b-37: rab dang 'bring la sogs pa 'grub par spyod pa ste /
T02D2663a:191b-38: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rol pa zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663a:191b-39: thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus rnams ka tsa
T02D2663a:191b-40: ta ta pa rnams dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:191b-41: mang por 'jug pa la nan tan gyis shig dang
T02D2663a:192a-0: / byang chub dang spyod pa dang kun du sangs rgyas dang mya ngan @192a * //
T02D2663a:192a-1: las 'das pa dang bcas par thob par byed do zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:192a-2: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2663a:192a-3: po de gnyis po de rnams dang po'i aa a'a
T02D2663a:192a-5: tha ma'i aam aa zhes pa gnyis dang /
T02D2663a:192a-6: dbus kyi ai la sogs pa rnams dang ldan par sbyar na /
T02D2663a:192a-7: byang chub dang spyod pa dang kun du sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:192a-8: pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa'i
T02D2663a:192a-9: rang bzhin pas de rnams dang ting nge 'dzin du
T02D2663a:192a-10: sbyar na byang chub la sogs pa thob par 'gyur
T02D2663a:192a-11: ro zhes pa'o // de bzhin du thog ma la sogs pa dang ldan par brjod na /
T02D2663a:192a-13: thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus su ldan par
T02D2663a:192a-14: de yang rig par bya'o zhes pa thog ma la
T02D2663a:192a-18: dbus kyi ai la sogs pa dang ldan par ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams brjod na /
T02D2663a:192a-19: byang chub la sogs pa thob pa 'ba' zhig ma
T02D2663a:192a-20: yin gyis sngags kyi tshig rnams su yang 'gyur ro
T02D2663a:192a-21: zhes pa'o // mkhas pas ji ltar 'dod pas sngags
T02D2663a:192a-22: kyi gtso bor de'i tshig re re dang sbyor cig
T02D2663a:192a-23: zhes pa'o // dang / nges par 'tshang rgya zhing
T02D2663a:192a-24: bla na med par gnas mchog sbyin par byed do
T02D2663a:192a-25: zhes pa'o // dang / zhes pa'o // gong du
T02D2663a:192a-26: smos pa'i tshul la mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin gang
T02D2663a:192a-27: zhes pa'o // dang / zhes pa'o // 'dod chags
T02D2663a:192a-28: pa'am / rang gi lha gang yin par sbyar ba
T02D2663a:192a-30: ji ltar 'dod par yi ge de rnams gang yang rung ba 'bru gcig la sbyar na yang /
T02D2663a:192a-31: ji ltar bsams pa'i don 'grub par byed pa'o zhes pa 'di ni de ltar 'khor lo gcig ste /
T02D2663a:192a-33: yi ge 'khor lo zhes pa ni yi ge aa
T02D2663a:192a-34: gcig po las ka la sogs pa du ma'i ting
T02D2663a:192a-35: nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo lta bur
T02D2663a:192a-37: sngags pa'i yi ge 'khor lo de shes na /
T02D2663a:192a-38: rtag tu ji ltar mdzes pa ni /
T02D2663a:192a-39: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor
T02D2663a:192a-40: ba bzhin no zhes pa ni sngags pas gong du
T02D2663a:192a-41: smos pa'i yi ge 'khor lo zhe na /
T02D2663a:192a-42: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad las dang spyod
T02D2663a:192a-43: pa thams cad du spyod nus pa bzhin du 'gyur
T02D2663a:192a-44: ro zhes pa'o // mdzes pa zhes pa ni spyod pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:192b-0: da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan @192b 'das kyi sku mi zad pa dang /
T02D2663a:192b-2: yid mi zad pa rdo rje'i rgyan rnams de dkyil
T02D2663a:192b-3: 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa la sku mi zad
T02D2663a:192b-4: pa dang / gsung mi zad pa'i byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:192b-5: kyi dkyil 'khor la snying rje chen po'i snying po
T02D2663a:192b-6: pa dang / 'byung ba dang / yi ge 'khor
T02D2663a:192b-7: lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gong du bshad zin
T02D2663a:192b-8: pa dang / 'byung ba dang / / yid mi
T02D2663a:192b-9: zad pa'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi sku'i byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:192b-11: de'i zhar la gong du dkyil 'khor gnyis bshad pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2663a:192b-12: lhag ma slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2663a:192b-13: slob ma'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:192b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad du byis pa rnams la gong du rgyas pa ma smos shing /
T02D2663a:192b-15: ma rdzogs pa rnams dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D2663a:192b-16: la sogs pa 'di nyid du rgyas par bshad de
T02D2663a:192b-17: / de la chos kyi sku ni mtshan mas bstan pa las 'das te /
T02D2663a:192b-18: dngos po med pas bstan du mi mngon pa la
T02D2663a:192b-19: yon tan gyi rjes su mthun pa las bstan par
T02D2663a:192b-20: bya ste / chos kyi sku'i yon tan ni phyin
T02D2663a:192b-21: ci ma log pa dang mi 'gyur bar yongs su
T02D2663a:192b-23: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
T02D2663a:192b-24: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /
T02D2663a:192b-25: bya ba thams cad byed nus pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:192b-26: de'i rjes su mthun pa'i sgo nas de bstan pa ni /
T02D2663a:192b-27: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663a:192b-28: sa ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid rdo rje dang 'dra bas /
T02D2663a:192b-29: dbang chen gyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:192b-30: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i rang bzhin ni /
T02D2663a:192b-31: chu'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:192b-32: chu ni thams cad 'khru bar byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:192b-33: de'i snying po ba ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:192b-34: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2663a:192b-35: me'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2663a:192b-36: me'i rang bzhin bsreg par bya ba dang /
T02D2663a:192b-37: yi ger chos thams cad rdul dang bral bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:193a-0: bya ba thams cad nus pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis @193a * //
T02D2663a:193a-2: rlung ni kun du 'gro zhing thams cad 'byed pa'o zhes sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:193a-3: de ltar chos kyi sku byin gyis brlabs su gyur pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dang /
T02D2663a:193a-4: dkyil 'khor sum char cho ga rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:193a-5: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par zhugs te /
T02D2663a:193a-6: de yang ci byas nas zhugs she na /
T02D2663a:193a-7: gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi khams
T02D2663a:193a-8: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs
T02D2663a:193a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663a:193a-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod rnam par 'phrul pa de
T02D2663a:193a-12: bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes
T02D2663a:193a-13: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhugs so
T02D2663a:193a-14: zhes pa chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid de
T02D2663a:193a-15: / de las sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:193a-16: rdo rje'i rgyan rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'byung ba ni
T02D2663a:193a-17: / / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i rgyan zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:193a-18: de dag chos kyi dbyings de las 'byung ba na /
T02D2663a:193a-19: chos kyi dbyings de nyid mdzod ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:193a-20: rnam par sprul pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:193a-21: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:193a-22: mnyam pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'byung ba de dag nyid tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:193a-23: chos kyi sku dang sems can gyi don byed par mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:193a-24: rgya cher zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig go //
T02D2663a:193a-25: snying po'o zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i gnas te /
T02D2663a:193a-26: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la bya ste /
T02D2663a:193a-27: ting nge 'dzin der zhugs na de lta bur 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:193a-28: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas kyang /
T02D2663a:193a-30: gsungs pa chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa mang po mngon par bstan pa dang /
T02D2663a:193a-31: sngags kyi spyod pa 'di las sems can gyi khams
T02D2663a:193a-32: ma lus par gdon pa'i yi dam bcas par rdzogs
T02D2663a:193a-33: par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:193a-34: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa ni skabs 'dir sems can gyi khams la bya ste /
T02D2663a:193a-35: de mngon par 'byung ba bstan pa yang las dang tshe'i rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2663a:193a-36: 'bras bu zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig 'og nas 'byung ba bshad do //
T02D2663a:193a-37: sngags kyi spyod pa 'di nyid las sems can gyi
T02D2663a:193b-0: khams ma lus par gdon par yi dam @193b bca'
T02D2663a:193b-1: ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni snying
T02D2663a:193b-2: rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2663a:193b-3: yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan du zin kyang //
T02D2663a:193b-4: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma bstan na /
T02D2663a:193b-5: dam tshig lnga la sogs pa dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
T02D2663a:193b-6: de'i zhar la snga ma'i cho ga lhag ma rnams
T02D2663a:193b-7: kyang rdzogs par bshad par bya ba ma bstan na
T02D2663a:193b-8: / sngags pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur bas /
T02D2663a:193b-9: dam tshig ma rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:193b-10: de bas na de dag kun rdzogs par bstan na /
T02D2663a:193b-11: sems can gyi khams ma lus par gdon pa'i yi dam bcas pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:193b-12: de nas 'di ltar sems can gyi khams su rnam
T02D2663a:193b-13: par sprul pa'i sgo nas las dang tshe'i rnam par
T02D2663a:193b-14: smin pa dang / 'bras bu za ba dang //
T02D2663a:193b-22: ji lta bur bsams pa bzhin pas sems can thams cad so sor mgu bar byed pa /
T02D2663a:193b-23: ba sbu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings
T02D2663a:193b-24: nas rnam par 'phel ba'i sku 'byung zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:193b-25: / de ltar bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2663a:193b-26: mnyam par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663a:193b-27: sku ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du de bzhin
T02D2663a:193b-28: gshegs pa'i sku sems can thams cad dang rjes su
T02D2663a:193b-29: / mthun pa / las dang tshe'i rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2663a:193b-31: za ba dang zar 'jug pa la sogs pa ston pa 'byung po zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:193b-32: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang tshe'i 'bras bu
T02D2663a:193b-33: za bar ston pa'i las legs nyes ci spyad pa'i
T02D2663a:193b-34: 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par rang
T02D2663a:193b-36: zar 'jug pa ni rgyal po dang sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma la sogs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2663a:193b-37: de dag gis dbang byas nas gzhan rnams la bde ba dang sdug bsngal spyod du 'jug pa'o //
T02D2663a:193b-38: de dag nyid kyi bye brag tu gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:193b-39: gzugs dang kha dog dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:193b-40: sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang bsam
T02D2663a:193b-41: pa la sogs pa'i rjes su mthun par chos 'chad
T02D2663a:193b-42: pa'i sku rnams 'byung ngo zhes pa dang sbyar te
T02D2663a:193b-44: sems can thams cad so sor mgu bar byed pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:194a-0: sems can gyi khams su rnam par sprul @194a * //
T02D2663a:194a-1: pa'i sgo'o zhes pa'i tshig gong ma de ba spu'i khung bu zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:194a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ba spu'i khung bu de
T02D2663a:194a-3: sems can gyi khams rnam par sprul pa las dang
T02D2663a:194a-4: che'i rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2663a:194a-5: 'bras bu za ba dang zar 'jug pa rnams snang
T02D2663a:194a-6: ba'i sku rnams 'byung ba'i sgo yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663a:194a-7: // de byung nas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par khyab pa dang /
T02D2663a:194a-8: dbyangs sgra gcig tu chos dbyings rig par byed cing /
T02D2663a:194a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su
T02D2663a:194a-10: bcad pa 'di skad ces bsgrags so zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:194a-11: tshig tu 'og nas 'byung ba de bsgrags te /
T02D2663a:194a-12: de yang thams cad tshig gcig tu sgra sgrogs pa na /
T02D2663a:194a-13: sems can gyi khams thams cad du thos shing chud par byed pa ste /
T02D2663a:194a-14: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa'i tshig ni 'dir sems can gyi khams su shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:194a-16: sgra sgrogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de chos kyi dbyings su dmigs pa ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2663a:194a-17: tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de la chud cing goms par byas nas /
T02D2663a:194a-18: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bas na /
T02D2663a:194a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:194a-20: tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa 'di ltar gang nas 'byung ba de kun zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:194a-21: sangs rgyas rdzogs pas bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:194a-23: gang nas zhes pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:194a-24: 'byung ba de kun zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang
T02D2663a:194a-25: nyan thos la sogs pa ming gis smos pa rnams
T02D2663a:194a-26: te / mdo ran chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan
T02D2663a:194a-27: nyid ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid las sangs
T02D2663a:194a-28: rgyas dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2663a:194a-29: te / / kun du sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02D2663a:194a-31: snod kyi 'jig rten dang chos rnams 'byung zhing gnas pa dag 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:194a-32: de dag rtag tu ji ltar 'byung ba shes rab
T02D2663a:194a-33: dang thabs su ldan pas lam 'di khyed kyis bsgom
T02D2663a:194a-34: par gyis shig ces pa ste /
T02D2663a:194a-35: de yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:194a-36: rnam par brtag pa'o zhes pa na kun rdzob tu 'ang zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:194a-37: mdor na chos rnams kyi dbyings mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba dang /
T02D2663a:194a-38: de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa las sprul pa'i
T02D2663a:194b-0: @194b sku la sogs pa 'byung ba dang de la
T02D2663a:194b-1: dmigs nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs
T02D2663a:194b-2: pa mthar sangs rgyas pa'i bar du /
T02D2663a:194b-3: ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba'i lam de khyed kyis shes par byos shig ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:194b-4: de ltar bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin der zhugs nas /
T02D2663a:194b-5: 'jig rten pa'i tshig dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis bstan te /
T02D2663a:194b-7: tshe'i rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2663a:194b-8: 'bras bu za ba dang zar 'jug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:194b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di nyid do //
T02D2663a:194b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2663a:194b-11: sems kyi dbang tsam gyis spu'i bu ga thams cad
T02D2663a:194b-12: nas / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu byin gyi rlabs
T02D2663a:194b-13: chos kyi dbyings las 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663a:194b-14: sku chos kyi dbyings thams cad du /
T02D2663a:194b-15: rang gi sku rig par byed pa /
T02D2663a:194b-16: sprul pa'i sprin khyab par byas nas /
T02D2663a:194b-17: chos kyi dbyings rang rang gi gnas su slar zhugs so zhes pa ni ;
T02D2663a:194b-18: gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas /
T02D2663a:194b-19: chos kyi dbyings nas 'phrul pa'i sku 'byung ba de
T02D2663a:194b-20: dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sems
T02D2663a:194b-22: sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02D2663a:194b-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sems
T02D2663a:194b-24: can gyi khams thams cad du rang gi sku rig
T02D2663a:194b-25: par byed pa / sprul pa'i sku mang pos khyab par byas nas /
T02D2663a:194b-26: sems kyi dbang tsam gyis rang rang gi chos kyi
T02D2663a:194b-27: dbyings su slar zhugs pa bstan to zhes pa ste
T02D2663a:194b-28: / sems kyi dbang tsam gyis zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:194b-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D2663a:194b-30: sgrub pa po lta bur blta /
T02D2663a:194b-31: sbrul pa'i sku rnams 'byung ba ni bsgrub pa'i lha rnams lta bur blta'o //
T02D2663a:194b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi las 'phrul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:194b-33: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi bcom ldan
T02D2663a:194b-34: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams
T02D2663a:194b-36: des kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D2663a:194b-37: sgrub pa po'i sems kyi dbang tsam gyis rang gi sku'i gzugs su snang bar gyur pa /
T02D2663a:194b-38: ma 'ongs pa'i gdul pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:194b-39: chos kyi dbyings rang rang gi gnas su slar zhugs
T02D2663a:194b-40: so zhes pa ni slar bsdu'i bu ga rnams su
T02D2663a:194b-41: zhugs pa la ni mi bya'i /
T02D2663a:195a-1: du byung ba de dag gi gnas nyid du chos
T02D2663a:195a-2: kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi
T02D2663a:195a-3: snang bar gyur pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:195a-4: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gis sku las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'byung bas /
T02D2663a:195a-5: sems can gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byas te /
T02D2663a:195a-6: slar mi snang bar gyur pa bstan nas /
T02D2663a:195a-7: yid mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs gsang
T02D2663a:195a-8: ba'i dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gsum gyi cho ga'i
T02D2663a:195a-9: lhag ma rnams bshad par gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:195a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663a:195a-11: byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa zhes pa
T02D2663a:195a-13: gsang ba zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i yid kyi
T02D2663a:195a-14: rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i byin gyis brlabs pas yid
T02D2663a:195a-15: kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku ste /
T02D2663a:195a-16: dngos por bstan pa'i rang bzhin ma yin to /
T02D2663a:195a-17: phra bas na gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:195a-18: gnyis su na sku dang gsung gi rang bzhin phyag
T02D2663a:195a-19: bzhin phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bsgyur bas sku dang
T02D2663a:195a-20: gsung du mi mngon pa la'ang bya'o //
T02D2663a:195a-21: lha rnams gshegs pa'i gnas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195a-22: dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag lha
T02D2663a:195a-23: rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663a:195a-24: // rang gi sa bon gyi mtshan mas btab pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195a-25: dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so so'i sa
T02D2663a:195a-26: bon aa ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mas btab pa
T02D2663a:195a-27: zhes pa'o // thog mar dkyil 'khor sngags pa yis //
T02D2663a:195a-28: bdag gi lus la dgod do zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195a-29: tshon dgye ba la sogs pa'i sngon rol du /
T02D2663a:195a-30: sngags pa sbyor ba'i stan sngar bshad pa la gnas nas /
T02D2663a:195a-31: snga ma bzhin du dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2663a:195a-32: 'khor lus la rim bzhin du bzhag go zhes pa
T02D2663a:195a-33: ste / de bas na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:195a-34: rkang pa nas rked pa'i bar du ni bsam pa yang ni dbang chen du /
T02D2663a:195a-35: de nas snying ga'i bar du ni chur bsam mo //
T02D2663a:195a-36: chu yan chad ni me ru ste /
T02D2663a:195a-37: me yan chad ni rlung du yang zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:195a-38: chu yan chad me ru ste zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195a-39: snying g-yan chad me ru bsam par gsal na me yan chad ni rlung du yang zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195a-40: rlung du gang yan chad bsam pa'i mtshams gsal bar ma smos kyang dbang po chen po'o //
T02D2663a:195a-41: snying po las smin mtshams su yi ge h'um bsam par gsungs pas /
T02D2663a:195b-0: smin mtshams yan chad rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par shes @195b par bya'o //
T02D2663a:195b-1: mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su //
T02D2663a:195b-2: de nas sa la gzugs bzhag go //
T02D2663a:195b-3: zhes pa ni sngags pas de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byas nas /
T02D2663a:195b-4: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sa la bri bra bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:195b-5: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663a:195b-6: par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T02D2663a:195b-7: sa la zhugs nas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:195b-8: kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mi zad pa'i rdo
T02D2663a:195b-9: rje rgyan la zhugs zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:195b-10: chos mnyam pa la bltas te zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195b-11: don dam par yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa'o //
T02D2663a:195b-12: kun rdzob tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:195b-13: sems can gyi khams ji snyed par mnyam pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:195b-14: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bltas nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras so zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:195b-16: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sngags pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sngon rol du /
T02D2663a:195b-17: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bsnyen par byas nas /
T02D2663a:195b-19: sngags 'di'i don la 'jug pa dang 'dis bsrung bar bya pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:195b-20: phyag rdo rje de gsang ba'i bdag pos smras ma thag tu zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:195b-21: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpang du 'gyur //
T02D2663a:195b-22: 'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:195b-23: phyag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po 'di smras
T02D2663a:195b-24: pa'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs so //
T02D2663a:195b-25: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2663a:195b-28: zhes pa'i bar du gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa gsungs te /
T02D2663a:195b-29: the tshom dang yid gnyis med par lam 'di khyed
T02D2663a:195b-30: kyis sgoms shig ces gdams pa de nyid kyi don
T02D2663a:195b-31: te / phyag na rdo rje ji ltar chud pa ltar //
T02D2663a:195b-32: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad pa ste /
T02D2663a:195b-33: chud pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs su chud do zhes gsungs so //
T02D2663a:195b-34: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2663a:195b-35: bsam pa rab tu rangs mgu ba //
T02D2663a:195b-36: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:195b-37: bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:195b-38: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste /
T02D2663a:195b-39: spyi bor bzhag nas byin gyis brlabs zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:195b-40: chos de dag ni mtshan nyid med de zhes pa'i phung po dang /
T02D2663a:196a-0: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i tshes @196a * //
T02D2663a:196a-1: rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663a:196a-2: gnas med pa ni pha rol po rnams kyi cha
T02D2663a:196a-3: shas can la sogs pa kun gyi gnas su brtags
T02D2663a:196a-4: pa de yod pa ma yin zhes so //
T02D2663a:196a-5: ngo bo ma yin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2663a:196a-6: bdag dang bdag gi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:196a-7: las dar tshe las rnam par bral //
T02D2663a:196a-8: zhes pa ni chos rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med ces pa ste /
T02D2663a:196a-9: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pas na /
T02D2663a:196a-10: mtshan nyid med pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gong ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:196a-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:196a-12: chos thams cad dngos po yod pa gang yang ma yin te /
T02D2663a:196a-13: 'du shes tsam du zad do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:196a-14: mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni //
T02D2663a:196a-15: snying rje dbang du gyur bas su //
T02D2663a:196a-16: chud par byas nas chud par bya'o //
T02D2663a:196a-17: zhes pa ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra ba ni /
T02D2663a:196a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi
T02D2663a:196a-19: sgo nas byin gyis brlabs pas bdag cag gi chud
T02D2663a:196a-20: do zhes pa'o // de ltar phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663a:196a-21: gsang ba'i bdag pos gler pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D2663a:196a-22: de ched du smras nas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:196a-23: las dang skye ba las thar par ni /
T02D2663a:196a-24: ji ltar sngags pa nam zhig 'gyur //
T02D2663a:196a-25: zhes pa'i bar du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri pa dang /
T02D2663a:196a-26: dkyil 'khor gsum char gyi cho ga'i lhag ma rnams dris pa ste /
T02D2663a:196a-27: slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin dang dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2663a:196a-28: cho ga rnams ma gtogs par gzhan thams cad dkyil
T02D2663a:196a-29: 'khor gsum char cho ga mthun par shes par bya'o
T02D2663a:196a-30: // snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2663a:196a-31: rgyal po'i de'i the tshom bcad pa dang zhes pa
T02D2663a:196a-32: ni dkyil 'khor gsum char yang snying rje chen po
T02D2663a:196a-34: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la snying rje chen po 'byung ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:196a-35: the tshom bcad pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams ma bshad na /
T02D2663a:196a-36: cho ga rnams ma rdzogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams the tshom can du 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:196a-37: de bas na de dag gi the tshom bcad pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:196a-38: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la brtags nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste dngos kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663a:196a-39: dngos po 'di rnams dris pa'i lan ni /
T02D2663a:196b-0: da ni 'og tu phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i @196b skabs la bab ste /
T02D2663a:196b-1: de nas sangs rgyas kun mkhyen la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:196b-2: phyag na rdo rjes dris pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyir bsdus te /
T02D2663a:196b-3: rnam pa gsum du byas nas gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:196b-4: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang //
T02D2663a:196b-5: lha rnams dgong pa'i gnas kyang ni //
T02D2663a:196b-6: snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung ;
T02D2663a:196b-7: / theg pa chen po'i gnas mchog sta //
T02D2663a:196b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po //
T02D2663a:196b-9: khyod kyis kun kyang dris pa ni //
T02D2663a:196b-10: mdo ru yang ni bstan par bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-13: lha rnams dgod pa'i gnas kyang ni //
T02D2663a:196b-14: zhes pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i bye brag dang /
T02D2663a:196b-15: lha de rnams kyi kha dog la sogs dris pa dang /
T02D2663a:196b-16: lha rnams kyi gnas dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa la sogs brtag pa dang /
T02D2663a:196b-17: de dag mdor bsdus te gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663a:196b-18: theg pa chen po'i gnas mchog de //
T02D2663a:196b-19: zhes pa ni sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D2663a:196b-20: bden pa thob pa ji ltar zhes pa dris pa de dag bsdus te gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:196b-21: tshig de dag ni byang chub tu gzhol ba'i tshig pas theg pa chen po'i lam mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-22: gzhan rnams kyang theg pa chen po'i tshig yin mod kyi /
T02D2663a:196b-23: gzhan pas 'di nye zhing gtso bo'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:196b-24: de gnyis las gzhan pa slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2663a:196b-25: tshon 'gyed pa la sogs pa ji srid dris pa
T02D2663a:196b-26: de dag thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba
T02D2663a:196b-27: zhes pa'i nang du 'dus par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-28: de la skabs 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa
T02D2663a:196b-29: ni dkyil 'khor gsum char gyi cho ga spyir dris
T02D2663a:196b-30: pa'i dngos bo de dag nyid chen po 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:196b-31: rgyu zhes pa'o // dam tshig can ma yin pa las mi bstan pas gsang zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-32: gzhan ni gong du smos pa bzhin no //
T02D2663a:196b-33: 'byung ba chen po zhes gong du dris pa de
T02D2663a:196b-34: dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2663a:196b-35: rgyu she dag dris pa'i dngos po de dag nyid
T02D2663a:196b-36: chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-37: snying rje chen po rtsa las 'byung //
T02D2663a:196b-38: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de dag snying rje chen po las byung bas /
T02D2663a:196b-39: de'i yo byad dris pa'i dngos po de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsi las 'byung zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:196b-40: sangs rgyas rdzogs pa'i gsang chen po //
T02D2663a:197a-0: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po'i gnas mchog de dag la sogs pa snod ma yin @197a * //
T02D2663a:197a-1: pa'i sems can rnams la mi bshad pas gsang ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:197a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog ma ru //
T02D2663a:197a-4: so so'i las la 'dod bzhin du'o //
T02D2663a:197a-5: zhes pa'i bar du'o zhes pa dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol du /
T02D2663a:197a-6: slob dpon gyis bdag dang slob ma bsrung ba la
T02D2663a:197a-7: sogs pa'i las byas pa'i sngags rnams la yun du
T02D2663a:197a-9: so so'i las la sbyar ro zhes gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa nas 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:197a-10: de'i phyir rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol du bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2663a:197a-11: mtshan ma byung ba'i bar du bzlas na /
T02D2663a:197a-12: de dag thams cad mtshan ma byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663a:197a-13: 'di'i mtshan ma yang dkyil 'khor gyi lhag mar gnas pa na /
T02D2663a:197a-14: sngags pa'i rmi lam du sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2663a:197a-15: sems dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rtsom pa
T02D2663a:197a-16: mthong na zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:197a-17: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig las byung //
T02D2663a:197a-18: zhes pa ni yig 'bru yan lag bcu gnyis sngags tshig tu gyur pa la yang bya /
T02D2663a:197a-19: gnyis su na yi ge 'bru bcu gnyis las /
T02D2663a:197a-20: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid du chud par 'gyur ba la yang bya ste /
T02D2663a:197a-21: yan lag ces pa ni yi ge 'bru'o //
T02D2663a:197a-22: pad ces pa ni chud pa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:197a-23: rig pa'i rgyal po stobs chen po //
T02D2663a:197a-24: zhes pa ni don dam par kyang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ston par byed pa dang /
T02D2663a:197a-25: kun rdzob tu yang sbrul pa la sogs pa byed pas na mthu che ba'o //
T02D2663a:197a-26: de nas rim gyis bzlas par bya //
T02D2663a:197a-27: zhes pa ni rtsa ba dang snying po dang nye
T02D2663a:197a-28: ba'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i rim bzhin
T02D2663a:197a-29: bzlas zhes pa ste tshig bcu gnyis po tshang bar
T02D2663a:197a-30: bzlas zhes pa'o // rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te //
T02D2663a:197a-31: zhes pa ni slob dpon rang gi ring nge 'dzin
T02D2663a:197a-32: la rigs gsum gyi snying po gnas gsum du bzhag
T02D2663a:197a-33: pa dang / dpa' po chen po'i snying po gnas ldar dgod pa dang /
T02D2663a:197a-34: yan lag thams cad du yi ge dgong pa gang
T02D2663a:197a-35: yang rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas bzlas
T02D2663a:197a-37: ji ltar rim pa'i tshul shes nas //
T02D2663a:197a-38: so so'i las la 'dod bzhin du'o //
T02D2663a:197a-39: zhes pa de ltar rim pa dang sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2663a:197a-42: slob ma srung ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar rim par sbyar ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:197a-43: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa bya
T02D2663a:197b-0: ba yang dkyil @197b 'khor gsum du sbyar bar shes
T02D2663a:197b-1: par bya'o // slob dpon gnyis su shes par bya //
T02D2663a:197b-3: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bos so //
T02D2663a:197b-4: zhes pa'i bar du slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:197b-5: de 'ang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:197b-6: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2663a:197b-8: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:197b-9: 'dir ni zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang /
T02D2663a:197b-10: dmigs pa can gyi bye brag bshad pa ste de bas na /
T02D2663a:197b-11: de yi mtshan ma rtogs par bya //
T02D2663a:197b-12: zab mo dang yang ba yin zhes pa la mos pa'o //
T02D2663a:197b-13: phyag rgya sngags rgyud rtogs pa ste //
T02D2663a:197b-14: zhes pa ni slob dpon gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663a:197b-15: de phyag rgya dang sngags rnams gzhung las ji skad
T02D2663a:197b-16: bshad pa bzhin shes pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:197b-17: zab ste rgya cher shes par bya //
T02D2663a:197b-19: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spang ba'o //
T02D2663a:197b-20: zhes pa'i bar du zab cing rgya che ba la
T02D2663a:197b-21: mos pa'i slob dpon gyi bye brag ste zab pa
T02D2663a:197b-22: ni stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa la mos
T02D2663a:197b-23: pas / de'i sems kyi rgyud sus kyang rig par mi nus te dpag dka' zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:197b-24: rgya chen po'i don dam par chos thams cad stong
T02D2663a:197b-25: pa nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bur chud pa'o
T02D2663a:197b-26: // kun rdzob tu 'ang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu lta bur shes nas /
T02D2663a:197b-27: mchod pa la sogs pa rgya chen por sbyor ba'o //
T02D2663a:197b-28: sems can rnams la yid mi ches pa ni sems can rnams dang /
T02D2663a:197b-29: spyod lam mi mthun pas gcig la gcig yid mi rton pa'o //
T02D2663a:197b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste //
T02D2663a:197b-31: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir te /
T02D2663a:197b-32: 'jig rten na yang ba'i spyod pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod pa ni be'u mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:197b-33: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spang ba'o //
T02D2663a:197b-34: zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi chos rnams lam chags pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:197b-35: gnyis po da ltar yis ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:197b-36: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bos so //
T02D2663a:197b-37: zhes pa'i bar du dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyi bye brag ste /
T02D2663a:197b-38: mthong ba yi ni chos kyis su //
T02D2663a:197b-39: mos nas dmigs par 'gyur ba ste //
T02D2663a:197b-40: zhes pa ni nyan pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab kyis sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing /
T02D2663a:198a-0: bsam pa stong pa'i rang bzhin @198a * //
T02D2663a:198a-1: du mos su zin kyang bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis goms par bya bar mi nus pas /
T02D2663a:198a-2: phyi rol gyi spyod pa rnams la mos par 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:198a-3: de 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor tshon la sogs pas
T02D2663a:198a-4: bri bar bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur zhing lung
T02D2663a:198a-6: 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni tshon la
T02D2663a:198a-7: sogs pas bris nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi lta
T02D2663a:198a-8: ba'i spyod yul du gyur pas 'jig rten gyi dkyil
T02D2663a:198a-9: 'khor zhes bya'i mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2663a:198a-11: de bas na slob dpon dmigs pa can gyis phyi
T02D2663a:198a-12: rol gyi tshon la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bri bar
T02D2663a:198a-13: dbang bskur gyi / sems kyi dbang du mi 'gyur
T02D2663a:198a-14: bas yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bas ni dbang mi
T02D2663a:198a-15: dbang bskur gyi / bskur ro // zab cing rgya
T02D2663a:198a-16: che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon de ni phyi'i
T02D2663a:198a-17: dbang bskur gyi / bskur ro // dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2663a:198a-18: / nang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis ka bri bar dbang
T02D2663a:198a-19: bskur te phyi rol gyi spyod pa rnams la mi
T02D2663a:198a-20: dbang bskur gyi / bskur ro // dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2663a:198a-21: / chags shing / sems kyi dbang du gyur bas
T02D2663a:198a-22: nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar dbang bskur ro //
T02D2663a:198a-23: slob ma rnams kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor yang bri bar gsungs so //
T02D2663a:198a-24: slob ma rnams rig bya zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:198a-25: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2663a:198a-26: ba'i bar du slob ma'i bye brag bshad pa ste
T02D2663a:198a-27: dus dang dus ma yin par dbye ba zhes pa
T02D2663a:198a-28: ni spyir slob ma rnams pa bzhi slob ma kha
T02D2663a:198a-29: cig sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing shes
T02D2663a:198a-30: / byang chub kyi sems kyang bsgoms pas ni dkyil
T02D2663a:198a-31: 'khor du bcug pa nyid kyi tshe na bsgrub par
T02D2663a:198a-32: / dbang bskur / byang chub kyi sems dang mi
T02D2663a:198a-33: ldan pas kyang slob dpon dmigs pa can gyi mtshan
T02D2663a:198a-34: nyid dang ldan na de nyid kyi tshe na slob
T02D2663a:198a-35: dpon du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2663a:198a-36: de dag ni gcig ni de'i dus na bsgrub ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:198a-37: gcig ni sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing
T02D2663a:198a-38: shes kyang byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na bsgrub
T02D2663a:198a-40: der dkyil 'khor du bcug nas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i thabs bstan te /
T02D2663a:198a-41: byang chub kyi sems goms par gyur na /
T02D2663a:198a-42: phyis sgrub par dbang bskur bar bya ba ni gnyis po'i dus na bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2663a:198a-43: de bzhin du slob dpon du dbang bskur na yang
T02D2663a:198a-44: sngar sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa ni mi shes
T02D2663a:198a-45: na / der dbang mi bskur bar sngags kyi rgyud
T02D2663a:198b-0: la sogs pa rdzogs par @198b slob tu bcug ste
T02D2663a:198b-1: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan na /
T02D2663a:198b-2: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba ni gnyis po'i dus na bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2663a:198b-3: de kha cig snga nas kyang rgyud la sogs pa
T02D2663a:198b-4: mi shes shing byang chub kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms
T02D2663a:198b-6: sgom par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du gzud
T02D2663a:198b-7: pa tsam yin gyi dus gnyis kar yang slob dpon
T02D2663a:198b-8: dang / bsgrub par dbang mi bskur ba ni gnyis kar ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:198b-9: mtshan rnams kun ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:198b-10: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / ces pa ni rgyud la sogs pa yang rdzogs par shes /
T02D2663a:198b-11: byang chub kyi sems kyang tshul bzhin du bsgoms /
T02D2663a:198b-12: 'ga' zhig bsod nams spel ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du
T02D2663a:198b-13: 'ugs pa de yang slob ma'i grangs su yang gtogs
T02D2663a:198b-14: te / de ni dbang la sogs pa bskur bas
T02D2663a:198b-15: 'dir dbang la sogs pa gdod bskur mi dgos te
T02D2663a:198b-16: te / / de ni mtshan rnams kun rdzogs pa //
T02D2663a:198b-18: da ni thog mar rig bya ba //
T02D2663a:198b-20: de bas rtog pa rnams spangs la //
T02D2663a:198b-21: sa kun yang ni sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:198b-22: zhes pa'i bar du sa sbyang bar bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:198b-23: sa la phyi nang gi rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663a:198b-24: de la phyi'i sa sbyang ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:198b-25: 'dir ni nang gi sa sbyang bar bshad de /
T02D2663a:198b-26: sems kyi sa zhes bya ba yin //
T02D2663a:198b-28: sbyang ba sngon du bshad pa ste //
T02D2663a:198b-29: zhes pa ni sngar byang chub kyi sems rang gi
T02D2663a:198b-30: sems ji lta bu nyid du shes pa ste kha
T02D2663a:198b-32: dbyibs su yang ma yin zhes pa nas rnam pa
T02D2663a:198b-33: thams cad du btsal kyang mi rnyed do zhes pa
T02D2663a:198b-34: la sogs pa'i bar du ste de'i tshul du ting
T02D2663a:198b-35: nge 'dzin dag pa dang ji bzhin pa thams cad
T02D2663a:198b-36: spangs pa dang / rnam rtog dang bral bas na sems kyi dri ma dag pa ste /
T02D2663a:198b-37: de ltar dag par byas nas phyi rol gyi dkyil
T02D2663a:198b-38: 'khor ram nang gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba
T02D2663a:198b-40: de yis ni yongs su sbyang ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:198b-41: sngar byang chub kyi sems sbyang ba bshad pa ste
T02D2663a:198b-42: / sems kyis sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:198b-43: nam zhig nyes dang bral ba ni //
T02D2663a:198b-44: mi 'jigs pa ni sems kyis zhes pa ni ji
T02D2663a:198b-45: ltar phyi rol gyi sa'i nyes pa rus pa dang
T02D2663a:198b-46: rdo ba la sogs pa med pa bzhin du /
T02D2663a:199a-0: 'dir ni rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa dang 'dod chags la sogs @199a * //
T02D2663a:199a-1: pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral na bgegs la
T02D2663a:199a-2: sogs pas skabs mi rnyed pas mi 'jigs pa zhes
T02D2663a:199a-4: gsungs pa de ni dag pa ste //
T02D2663a:199a-5: nyes pa kun dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663a:199a-7: de bas 'di ltar rig par bya //
T02D2663a:199a-9: rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyud 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663a:199a-10: zhes pa'i bar du phyi rol gyi sa rnams sbyang
T02D2663a:199a-11: ba yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi ldan par
T02D2663a:199a-12: rtog pa la gnas te sbyong ba ni mi dbang
T02D2663a:199a-14: de las gzhan yang ni zhes pa gong gi sbyang ba las gzhan pa ste phyi'i sa la bya'o //
T02D2663a:199a-15: sngags mkhan rtog pa la gnas te //
T02D2663a:199a-16: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D2663a:199a-17: la sogs pa'i dngos por yod par rtogs te sbyang
T02D2663a:199a-19: rus pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa yang dngos po yod par rtog cing sa de sbyang na /
T02D2663a:199a-20: de byang chub sems dang mi ldan pas de dag par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:199a-21: de bas na gsungs pa de bas rnam par spangs pa la sogs pa phyi rol gyi sbyang ba /
T02D2663a:199a-22: rgya cher bshad pa de yang rtog pa 'ba' zhig
T02D2663a:199a-23: gnas nas sbyang ba ngas bshad pa ni byang chub
T02D2663a:199a-24: kyi sems sngon du bar sa de sbyang bar bshad
T02D2663a:199a-25: pa ste / byang chub kyi sems sngon du ba
T02D2663a:199a-26: yang ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid smos pa nyid
T02D2663a:199a-27: na slob dpon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2663a:199a-28: pa'i tshul la mkhas pa theg pa gsum 'byed mkhas
T02D2663a:199a-29: pa zhes pa la sogs pa smos pas byang chub
T02D2663a:199a-30: kyi sems sngon du rig par bya ste /
T02D2663a:199a-31: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la
T02D2663a:199a-32: mkhas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la
T02D2663a:199a-34: theg pa gsum 'byed mkhas pa yang gang zag dang
T02D2663a:199a-35: tshes la bdag med pa'i bye brag la mkhas pas
T02D2663a:199a-36: stong pa nyid la mkhas par mngon te /
T02D2663a:199a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi las 'di rnams thams cad kyang slob
T02D2663a:199a-38: dpon gyi bya ba byas pas slob dpon de lta
T02D2663a:199a-39: bu dang ldan bas sa sbyang bar bya na rtog
T02D2663a:199a-40: pa 'ba' zhig la mi gnas kyi byang chub kyi
T02D2663a:199a-41: sems dang ldan par 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sems
T02D2663a:199a-43: phyi rol gyi sa rnams sbyang bar bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:199a-44: kyis rgya cher bshad pa de'i dgongs pa de ma
T02D2663a:199a-45: mos pa rnams kyis shes par mi 'gyur ba zhes
T02D2663a:199a-46: pa'o // gang gis de lta bu'i rtog pa ma
T02D2663a:199a-47: spangs pa de ni sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen
T02D2663a:199a-48: pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:199b-1: 'jig rten du na sangs rgyas ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa /
T02D2663a:199b-2: byang chub sems kyis sbyang ba ru //
T02D2663a:199b-3: slob ma rnams la nan tan bya //
T02D2663a:199b-4: zhes pa ni slob ma sbyang ba ste /
T02D2663a:199b-5: de yang smon lam gyi byang chub kyi sems dang
T02D2663a:199b-6: 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyis sbyang bar
T02D2663a:199b-7: bya ste / 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis sngar bsgoms na de yang sbyang ba ste /
T02D2663a:199b-8: phyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug kar smon lam gyi byang
T02D2663a:199b-9: chub kyi sems sbyin pa dang gnyis kyis sa sbyang
T02D2663a:199b-10: ba'o // de ste sngar 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2663a:199b-11: sems goms par ma byas na dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2663a:199b-12: pa'i tshe smon lam gyi byang chub kyi sems byin
T02D2663a:199b-13: la phyis 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgom du
T02D2663a:199b-14: ba'o // gzhug pa ste / de ni slob ma rnams byang chub kyi sems kyis sbyang ba'o //
T02D2663a:199b-15: srung ba mi g-yo mgon po ste //
T02D2663a:199b-16: yang khams rnams brtul bas zhes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi srung ba ste /
T02D2663a:199b-17: slob ma rnams thog mar nang du 'ong ba'i tsha
T02D2663a:199b-18: srung ba dang lhag par gnas pa'i tshe srung ba
T02D2663a:199b-19: la sogs pa thams cad 'di gnyis gang yang rung
T02D2663a:199b-21: slob ma nam zhig mi g-yo ba //
T02D2663a:199b-22: dmigs pa rnams kyis nam yang rung //
T02D2663a:199b-23: de tshe yongs su dag pa ste //
T02D2663a:199b-24: nam mkha' dri ma med pa'o //
T02D2663a:199b-25: zhes pa ni slob ma dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:199b-26: de yang nam slob ma de sbyor ba la gnas pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /
T02D2663a:199b-27: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang ji bzhin pa
T02D2663a:199b-28: nyid dang bral ba ste dge ba dang mi dge
T02D2663a:199b-29: ba gnyis ka la dmigs pas ma g-yos pa dang
T02D2663a:199b-30: / sbyor ba las langs nas yang mchod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba ni spyod kyi /
T02D2663a:199b-31: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yul la dmigs pas mi
T02D2663a:199b-32: g-yo bar gyur na de dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces
T02D2663a:199b-33: pa'o // dri med nam mkha' 'dra'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:199b-34: ji ltar nam mkha' cis kyang ma bsdus pa'i tshe /
T02D2663a:199b-35: rang bzhin gyis dangs pa dang /
T02D2663a:199b-36: glo bur gyi sprin la sogs pas chod na yang nam mkha' rang bzhin dag pa ste /
T02D2663a:199b-37: de nyams par mi 'gyur ba bzhin du 'di yang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe /
T02D2663a:199b-38: dge ba dang mi dge ba gnyis la rtog pa'i dri ma med pa dang /
T02D2663a:199b-39: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i tshe mchod pa la
T02D2663a:199b-40: sogs pa'i spyod pa byed kyang sgyu ma la sogs
T02D2663a:200a-1: byed de dngos po yod par rtog pa'i dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:200a-2: byin gyis brlab pa dang po ste //
T02D2663a:200a-3: yongs su dag ces bya ba yin //
T02D2663a:200a-4: gnyis pos sme skyid bang gis te //
T02D2663a:200a-5: gzhan gyi su ni ma yin no //
T02D2663a:200a-6: zhes pa ni sngar snying rje chen pos sa yongs
T02D2663a:200a-7: su gzung ba'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyis sbyangs pa der
T02D2663a:200a-8: / sangs rgyas lnga bsam pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de nyid 'dir gleng ste /
T02D2663a:200a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi sa de dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams der bsams nas byin gyis brlab /
T02D2663a:200a-11: de'i 'og tu sems kyis bdag gi bar gzung /
T02D2663a:200a-12: de'i 'og tu sngags kyis bsrung ba ste de gsum
T02D2663a:200a-13: gyis yongs su gzung gi de las gzhan du ma
T02D2663a:200a-14: yin zhes pa'o // srad bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de //
T02D2663a:200a-16: lnga po nam mkha' 'dra bar bshad //
T02D2663a:200a-17: ces pa'i bar du ni sngar tshon lnga'i srad bu zhes spyir bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:200a-18: tshon sna lnga gang yin pa 'dir ming gis smos pa gsal bar bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:200a-19: bar snang la ni bzung nas su //
T02D2663a:200a-20: de yang dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2663a:200a-21: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor snga ma la /
T02D2663a:200a-22: lte ba'i thad kar srad bu gzung //
T02D2663a:200a-23: zhes spyir gsungs kyi dkyil 'khor gar bri bar ma bshad de /
T02D2663a:200a-24: de nyid gsal bar gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:200a-25: bar snang la srad bu bzung nas bar snang der dkyil 'khor bri zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:200a-26: srad bu gnyis pa de yis nam //
T02D2663a:200a-27: sa la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:200a-28: zhes pa ni sngar srad bu gnyis po blangs nas
T02D2663a:200a-29: kha shar phyogs su blta zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:200a-30: spyir smos te / dkyil 'khor nyid gang bris bzhin du ma bshad de /
T02D2663a:200a-31: de nyid la gsal bar gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:200a-32: bar snang la bri zhes pa'i 'og tu srad bu
T02D2663a:200a-33: gnyis pa blangs pa des sa la dkyil 'khor bri'o
T02D2663a:200a-34: zhes pa'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan dang ni /
T02D2663a:200a-35: de'i sras dpa' bo rnams kyis yang //
T02D2663a:200a-37: kra shi 'jig rten gyis bsngags so //
T02D2663a:200a-38: zhes pa ni gdan padmo dkar pos bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:200a-39: yid las byung ba'i mchog ces pa ni sngar bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi bshad pa'i tshe /
T02D2663a:200a-40: snying gar padmo dkar po bsam par bshad par bya ste /
T02D2663a:200a-41: 'dir padmo dkar po zhes ma bshad pas yid las
T02D2663a:200a-42: byung ba'i padmo smos pas yid kyis bsams pa'i padmo
T02D2663a:200b-0: dkar po @200b de dang 'dra ba'i gdan bya'o zhes
T02D2663a:200b-1: pa'o // rang rgyal dgra bcom rnams kyis ni //
T02D2663a:200b-2: phyogs gcig ces par bsgrags pas na //
T02D2663a:200b-3: de dag stan du rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:200b-4: padmo rnams kyi 'dab ma zhes pa ni nyan thos
T02D2663a:200b-5: dang rang sangs rgyas ye shes phyogs gcig pa dang
T02D2663a:200b-6: ldan pa rnams kyi stan padmo dkar po 'dab ma
T02D2663a:200b-7: gcig gi steng du bya zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:200b-8: 'jig rten gyi lha rnams la zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:200b-9: rgyal por bsgrags pa de'i stan no //
T02D2663a:200b-10: zhes pa'i bar du 'jig rten pa'i lha tshangs pa
T02D2663a:200b-11: la sogs pa rgyal po chen po'i gzugs can de
T02D2663a:200b-12: dag 'dod chags dang bcas pas padmo dkar po'i stan
T02D2663a:200b-13: du bshad pa'o // lhag ma rnams ni gar rigs
T02D2663a:200b-14: par sa'i rim pa las bsam par bya'o zhes pa
T02D2663a:200b-15: du bshad pa'o // ni / 'jig rten gyi 'khor
T02D2663a:200b-16: phal ba rnams bla ma'i drung na bla ma dang
T02D2663a:200b-17: 'dra ba'i padmo'i stan ni mi rigs pas de las
T02D2663a:200b-18: dma' ba'i stan rnams gar rigs par bya'o zhes pa
T02D2663a:200b-19: du bshad pa'o // ni / ste / nyan thos
T02D2663a:200b-20: dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams
T02D2663a:200b-22: 'di rnams dkyil 'khor 'dir ma smos pas zhar la bshad par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:200b-23: dkyil 'khor bar ma la gshin rje la sogs pa
T02D2663a:200b-24: 'jig rten gyi lha rnams smos pa yang de bzhin
T02D2663a:200b-25: gshegs pa'i sku las sbrul pa sha stag pas padmo'i
T02D2663a:200b-26: gdan nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:200b-27: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ma yin no //
T02D2663a:200b-28: mchod pa rnams ba bzhir shes par bya'o zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:200b-29: 'jig rten gyi rim bzhin du'o zhes pa'i bar du mchod pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:200b-30: de la spyir mchod pa rnam bzhi ste thal mo sbyar ba dang /
T02D2663a:200b-33: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa dang yid kyis mchod pa'o //
T02D2663a:200b-34: de la sngags pa zab cing rgya che ba las
T02D2663a:200b-35: mchod pa ni mchod pa 'di bzhi char spyod de
T02D2663a:200b-36: yid kyi mchod pa yang byed /
T02D2663a:200b-37: phyi rol gyi mchod pa yang mthong /
T02D2663a:200b-38: dmigs pa can gyi sngags pa ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams byed kyi //
T02D2663a:200b-39: ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pas yid kyi mchod pa med do //
T02D2663a:200b-40: byams pa dang snying rje ni nan tan gyis mchod
T02D2663a:200b-41: pa ste phyi dang nang gi mchod pa gang yang
T02D2663a:200b-43: sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje bskyed
T02D2663a:200b-44: nas mchod pa de dag nyid sems can rnams la
T02D2663a:201a-0: de la phyi rol gyi mchod pa @201a * //
T02D2663a:201a-1: rnams ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:201a-2: da 'dir ni yid kyi mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2663a:201a-4: thal sbyar me tog 'gyur ba yis //
T02D2663a:201a-5: zhes pa la sogs te de la /
T02D2663a:201a-6: thal sbyar me tog 'gyur ba yis //
T02D2663a:201a-7: zhes pa ni de thal mo sbyar ba las me
T02D2663a:201a-8: tog 'byung ba des mgon po rnams la gsol zhes
T02D2663a:201a-9: pa ste / de nyid dgrol ba gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:201a-10: phyag rgya yan lag kun 'byung bas //
T02D2663a:201a-11: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D2663a:201a-12: zhes pa ste yid kyi mchod pa bya ba yang
T02D2663a:201a-13: thog mar bdag gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pas ji
T02D2663a:201a-14: ltar bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2663a:201a-15: sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i sprin 'byung bar shog
T02D2663a:201a-16: cig ces smon lam btab nas stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:201a-17: ting nge 'dzin du gnas te byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663a:201a-19: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa nyid na
T02D2663a:201a-20: yang yid la nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pa bzlas
T02D2663a:201a-21: te / de nas phyag rgya de las mchod pa
T02D2663a:201a-22: rgya chen po 'og nas smos pa rnams char bzhin
T02D2663a:201a-24: de ltar bsams nas chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab /
T02D2663a:201a-25: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang dang sngags kyi mthus de'i
T02D2663a:201a-26: tshe sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar char bzhin du bab
T02D2663a:201a-27: par gyur te / de bas na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:201a-28: de ni nyes med me tog ste //
T02D2663a:201a-29: zhes pa la sogs pa rjes su bsngags pa dang bcas par gsungs so //
T02D2663a:201a-30: lhag ma rnams kyi lha rnams la //
T02D2663a:201a-31: zhes pa nas rnam par soms shig / gar rigs
T02D2663a:201a-32: par zhes pa'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:201a-33: tshon gyis bris pa'i lha rnams la phyi'i mchod pa
T02D2663a:201a-34: me tog la sogs pa dbul ba'i rim pa bstan
T02D2663a:201a-35: pa ste so so'i sngags kyis btab nas thog mar
T02D2663a:201a-36: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2663a:201a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchod de /
T02D2663a:201a-38: de nas padmo'i rigs la sogs pa la rim bzhin
T02D2663a:201a-39: du mchod pa byas te de bas na gsungs pa
T02D2663a:201a-40: / gang du ji ltar rim bzhin du //
T02D2663a:201a-42: mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar te //
T02D2663a:201a-43: zhes pa nas 'jig rten gyi sde rim bzhin du'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2663a:201a-44: mchod pa rnams dbul ba'i thabs bstan pa ste me tog dbul bar gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:201a-45: mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar nas //
T02D2663a:201a-46: zhes pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi lha rnams
T02D2663a:201b-0: @201b las gzhan ni lte ba'i thad kar rig par
T02D2663a:201b-2: 'jig rten zhes pa ni 'dir gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la bya ste /
T02D2663a:201b-3: de'i lha rnams la lte ba'i thad ka nas me tog dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2663a:201b-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yid kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la ni snying ga nas dbul bar bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:201b-5: bdug pa khu tshur rdo rjes so //
T02D2663a:201b-6: yang na padmo phreng gis te //
T02D2663a:201b-7: bar snang la ni bzung nas su //
T02D2663a:201b-9: zhes pa ni bdug pa gsol ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i khu tshur ram /
T02D2663a:201b-11: pog snod can du byas na ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung /
T02D2663a:201b-12: kham phor ni padma'i phyag rgyas bzung ste yid kyi
T02D2663a:201b-13: dkyil 'khor lha rnams la bar snang la stod de
T02D2663a:201b-15: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor lha rnams la lte ba'i
T02D2663a:201b-16: thad ka nas rim bzhin du gsol zhes pa ste
T02D2663a:201b-18: de las lha rnams gzhan dag ni //
T02D2663a:201b-19: 'jig rten gyi rim bzhin du zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:201b-20: sbyin sreg gnyis su rig par bya ste zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:201b-21: sngags kyi shes pa med pa'o //
T02D2663a:201b-22: zhes pa'i bar du phyi nang gnyis kyi sbyin sreg bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:201b-23: de la phyi'i sbyin sreg ni bsreg par bya ste /
T02D2663a:201b-24: sreg pa'i me la sogs pa phyi'i dngos po gzugs la sogs pa la ltos pa'o//
T02D2663a:201b-25: nang gi sbyin sreg ni de rnams ni sems nyid kyis bya ste /
T02D2663a:201b-26: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin te de bas na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:201b-27: las dang skye ba rnam par bral //
T02D2663a:201b-28: zhes pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D2663a:201b-29: la sogs pa'i chos rnams 'jig par byed pa'i byang
T02D2663a:201b-30: chub kyi sems kyis chos rnams stong pa zhig ste
T02D2663a:201b-31: / las dang skye ba la sogs pa dmigs su
T02D2663a:201b-32: med par rab tu mi 'pho ba'i shes rab kyis
T02D2663a:201b-33: chud de yid la phung po la sogs pa dang
T02D2663a:201b-34: / / sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi
T02D2663a:201b-35: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dmigs su med par gyur
T02D2663a:201b-36: / / pa de ni / las dang skye ba rnam par bral //
T02D2663a:201b-37: zhes bya ba ste de la sreg par byed pa'i bar du mi 'pho ba'i shes rab bo //
T02D2663a:201b-38: sreg par byed pa ni las dang skye ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:201b-39: sreg pa'i me ni ji bzhin pa dang bral ba'i yid la bya'o //
T02D2663a:201b-40: sa bon du ni phyis 'gyur zhes pa ni las
T02D2663a:201b-41: dang skye ba sred pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:201b-42: kyi ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas snying rje'i
T02D2663a:202a-0: @202a * // dbang gis lha'i gzugs su bya ba la bya ste /
T02D2663a:202a-1: bdag gi lha gang yin pa'i sngags kyi sa bon
T02D2663a:202a-2: las lhar bsgyur ba'i rim pa ji skad du gsungs
T02D2663a:202a-3: pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid kyi lha'i gzugs su bsgyur
T02D2663a:202a-5: de la dang po phung po la sogs pa 'jig
T02D2663a:202a-6: pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni 'jug pa'i byang chub
T02D2663a:202a-7: kyi sems so // ji ltar 'jig cing rtog pa de yang spangs te rab tu mi 'phro ba'o //
T02D2663a:202a-8: shes rab rnam par mi rtog pa las dang skye
T02D2663a:202a-9: ba sreg par byed pa so so rang gis rig
T02D2663a:202a-10: pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa ni byang chub kyi
T02D2663a:202a-11: sems so // slar rang gi sa bon las lha'i
T02D2663a:202a-12: gzugs su bsgyur ba ni ldang ba'i byang chub kyi
T02D2663a:202a-13: sems so // sems so // las su 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2663a:202a-14: zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs
T02D2663a:202a-15: pa'i las rnams grub par 'dod pa'i phyir dang nang
T02D2663a:202a-16: gi sbyin sreg de bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:202a-17: mtshan ma can gyis mtshan ma dang bcas par 'grub /
T02D2663a:202a-18: mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma dang bcas pa gnyis ka 'grub /
T02D2663a:202a-19: bya ba dang sbyar te nang gi sbyin sreg phyi
T02D2663a:202a-20: rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa la ltos par mtshan
T02D2663a:202a-21: ma med pa des kyang shing la sogs pa mtshan
T02D2663a:202a-22: ma dang bcas pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2663a:202a-23: pa'o // phyi rol gyi gsum ldan zhing zhes pa
T02D2663a:202a-24: ni phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg byed pa na gsum
T02D2663a:202a-25: dang ldan par bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D2663a:202a-26: pa dang mngon par spyod pa'i las gang yang rung
T02D2663a:202a-27: ba'i kha dog dang tshul du ldan par bya ba
T02D2663a:202a-28: dang rdzas rnams kyang de'i kha dog dang ldan par
T02D2663a:202a-29: pa'o // bsam pa dang / bdag nyid kyang de'i
T02D2663a:202a-30: kha dog dang mtshungs shing ldan pa'i lhar bsgyur ba
T02D2663a:202a-31: pa'o // bsam pa dang / ste / de ltar
T02D2663a:202a-32: me dang rdzas dang bdag gsum zhib la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:202a-33: las gang yang rung ba'i kha dog dang tshul du
T02D2663a:202a-34: ldan par bya ba gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663a:202a-35: gsum dang ldan pa zhes pa ni zhi ba dang
T02D2663a:202a-36: rgyas pa dang mngon par spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang
T02D2663a:202a-37: chen dang chu dang rlung gi gnas gsum dang ldan
T02D2663a:202a-38: pa'o // gsum la gnas te zhes pa ni zhi
T02D2663a:202a-39: ba la sogs pa'i zhugs thab zlum po dang gru
T02D2663a:202a-40: pa'o // bzhi dang / gru gsum po la bsreg pa'i rdzas la sogs pa gnas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:202a-41: las gsum ni gnas grub pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:202a-42: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon par spyod pa'i 'bras bu gsum 'grub pa'o //
T02D2663a:202a-43: phyi nang gang yang rung ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho
T02D2663a:202b-0: ga de las gzhan du byas na de @202b dag
T02D2663a:202b-1: gi 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:202b-2: de bas na gnyis ka'i spyir gsungs pa gang gis
T02D2663a:202b-3: gzhan du byas na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o
T02D2663a:202b-4: // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i sngags dang zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:202b-5: lha rnams kyang de bzhin te zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663a:202b-6: sngags kyi lha la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs
T02D2663a:202b-7: dang tshad rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:202b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa /
T02D2663a:202b-9: sangs rgyas rdzogs par gsungs pa ni //
T02D2663a:202b-10: dkar dang ser du rig par bya //
T02D2663a:202b-11: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chos thams
T02D2663a:202b-12: cad rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid zhi ba'i rang
T02D2663a:202b-13: bzhin pas kha dog dkar por rig par bya'o zhes
T02D2663a:202b-14: so // sangs rgyas rdzogs par gsungs zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:202b-15: sh'akya thub pa dang 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs
T02D2663a:202b-16: pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du sangs rgyas pa
T02D2663a:202b-17: so // rnams kyi ste / de dag ni ting
T02D2663a:202b-18: nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas sems can gyi don la
T02D2663a:202b-19: sogs pa spyod pas na tshogs mdzad de /
T02D2663a:202b-20: rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid pas kha dog ser por rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:202b-21: phyag na rdo rje'i thams cad du //
T02D2663a:202b-22: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje bya ba nan
T02D2663a:202b-23: tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin sems can gyi
T02D2663a:202b-24: don spyod pa thams cad pas kha dog thams cad
T02D2663a:202b-26: 'jig rten dbang po'i sngags rnams ni //
T02D2663a:202b-27: dkar te las kyi rim pa'o //
T02D2663a:202b-28: zhes pa ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po so
T02D2663a:202b-29: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos thams
T02D2663a:202b-30: cad 'khru bar byed pa'i bdag nyid pas kha dog
T02D2663a:202b-32: gru bzhi ldan par gdon mi za //
T02D2663a:202b-33: zlum por yang ni rim bzhin te //
T02D2663a:202b-34: zla ba kham 'dra khru gsum du /
T02D2663a:202b-35: de 'dra dbyibs zhes sgrogs pa yin //
T02D2663a:202b-36: zhes pa ni lha de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dbang
T02D2663a:202b-37: chen la sogs pa'i dbyibs bshad pa ste rim bzhin
T02D2663a:202b-39: gzugs ni gnyis su rig par bya //
T02D2663a:202b-40: bud med dang ni skyes par ro //
T02D2663a:202b-41: zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi gzugs bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:202b-42: de la lha rnams kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2663a:202b-43: rnam par smin pa'i gzugs dang gnas yongs su gyur pa dang sprul pa ste /
T02D2663a:202b-44: de la rnam par smin pa'i gzugs ni rang gi las dang bsod nams las skyes pa'o //
T02D2663a:202b-45: gnas yongs su gyur pa ni bsgrubs pa las grub pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2663a:203a-0: sprul pa ni ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i dbang gis yid la @203a * //
T02D2663a:203a-1: bsams par gyur pa ste de dag la la ni skyes par snang /
T02D2663a:203a-2: la la ni bud med du snang ba'o //
T02D2663a:203a-3: yang na kun du thams cad kyang //
