T02D2663a:218a-11: thabs de ni de ltar chos thams cad stong par
T02D2663a:218a-12: chud kyang sems can gyi don du dngos po rnam
T02D2663a:218a-13: pa sna tshogs yod par ston te /
T02D2663a:218a-14: de dag ngo mtshar che ste bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:218a-15: tshig de dag grol bar gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:218a-16: gnas med pa ru shes nas su //
T02D2663a:218a-17: gnas dang bcas pa'i chos rnams 'chad //
T02D2663a:218a-18: ces pa ste gnas med par ni shes nas zhes
T02D2663a:218a-19: pa ni shes rab kyis chos thams cad gzung ba
T02D2663a:218a-20: dang 'dzin pa'i gnas med de stong pa nyid du
T02D2663a:218a-21: shes zhes pa'o // gnas dang bcas pa'i chos rnams 'chad //
T02D2663a:218a-22: ces pa ni de ltar shes rab kyis chos thams
T02D2663a:218a-23: cad dngos po med par chud kyang thabs kyis sems
T02D2663a:218a-24: can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir gzung ba dang
T02D2663a:218a-25: 'dzin pa'i gnas la sogs pa'i chos rnams dngos po
T02D2663a:218a-26: yod par snang ba dngos su ston zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:218a-27: mi shes pa ni gang shes pa //
T02D2663a:218a-28: chos rnams chos kyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663a:218a-29: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D2663a:218a-30: la sogs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gang gis mi
T02D2663a:218a-33: mgon po kun gyis gang rnyed pa //
T02D2663a:218a-35: de ltar chos rnams dmigs su med par gang gis
T02D2663a:218a-36: chud pa de mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:218a-37: kyis 'thob pa sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par
T02D2663a:218a-39: mdor na chos rnams stong pa nyid du chud pa de sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:218a-40: gleng ba'i tshig de skad ces smras nas /
T02D2663a:218a-41: sku de dag slar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
T02D2663a:218a-42: sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bzhugs so zhes
T02D2663a:218a-43: pa ni de dag chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:218a-44: kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te mi snang bar 'gyur
T02D2663a:218b-0: ba'o // de ltar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis @218b sngar bstan nas /
T02D2663a:218b-1: da ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid bri ba'i thabs bshad de /
T02D2663a:218b-2: de yang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na
T02D2663a:218b-3: rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa
T02D2663a:218b-4: / rigs kyi bu nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyon
T02D2663a:218b-5: cig ces pa la sogs te 'dir yang slob ma
T02D2663a:218b-6: lhag par gnas pa de nyid kyi nub mo bya
T02D2663a:218b-8: de'i rim pa yang de la thog mar slob dpon
T02D2663a:218b-9: gyis mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag la sogs pa
T02D2663a:218b-10: nyid gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du sta gon byas
T02D2663a:218b-11: nas slob ma rnams kyang bsogs te /
T02D2663a:218b-12: phyi rol du bkod la de nas slob dpon de dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs te /
T02D2663a:218b-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D2663a:218b-14: phyag 'tshal nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2663a:218b-15: / mdun du rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snying rje
T02D2663a:218b-16: chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa rang bzhin du
T02D2663a:218b-17: so so'i sngags 'bru re'am spyi'i snying po der bsams
T02D2663a:218b-18: / te / de nas bdag nyid chos dbyings kyi
T02D2663a:218b-19: phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang
T02D2663a:218b-20: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2663a:218b-21: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663a:218b-22: rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2663a:218b-23: de nas las kyi rdo rjer bsgyur te de rnams la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D2663a:218b-24: yon chab dbul ba dang dri dang me tog la
T02D2663a:218b-25: sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams so so'i sngags kyis btab
T02D2663a:218b-26: ste dbul ba dang yid kyi mchod pa yang bya'o
T02D2663a:218b-27: // de ltar phyi nang gi mchod pa la sogs
T02D2663a:218b-28: pa byas nas slob dpon de'i phyir byung la slob
T02D2663a:218b-29: ma rnams la dri dang me tog byin te /
T02D2663a:218b-30: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya ba
T02D2663a:218b-31: dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i skud
T02D2663a:218b-32: pa dpung par bcing ba dang so shing sbyin pa
T02D2663a:218b-33: rnams byas te / de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2663a:218b-36: de dag ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2663a:218b-37: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga yang grogs po
T02D2663a:218b-38: bsgrub pa'i phyi ma yod na yang des rim bzhin
T02D2663a:218b-39: du bya ste / med na slob dpon gyis de
T02D2663a:218b-40: nyid du slob ma dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching
T02D2663a:218b-41: du gzhug pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
T02D2663a:218b-42: dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663a:219a-1: rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663a:219a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa rim bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2663a:219a-3: de nas slob dpon des slar mchod pa'i gnas su zhugs te /
T02D2663a:219a-4: sems mnyam par gzhag la snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2663a:219a-5: yi ge ra kha dog dkar po yid tsam dmar ba bsams te /
T02D2663a:219a-6: yi ge de'i sgra'i kha de kho na nyid chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba bsgom pa ni /
T02D2663a:219a-7: bdag gi lus nyid rdul la sogs pa'i tshul du bshigs te /
T02D2663a:219a-8: rdul phran de yang phyogs dang cha phral na dmigs su med /
T02D2663a:219a-9: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dngos po med par bsgoms te /
T02D2663a:219a-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yi ge ra yang stong
T02D2663a:219a-11: par bsams te tha mar sgra'i de kho na nyid
T02D2663a:219a-12: de yang dmigs su med par bsgoms te stong pa
T02D2663a:219a-13: nyid du ji srid 'dod par gnas te /
T02D2663a:219a-14: de'i 'og tu thog mar rlung gi dkyil 'khor de
T02D2663a:219a-15: nas chu'i dkyil 'khor de nas gser gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:219a-16: bsams te / gser gyi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
T02D2663a:219a-17: bdag gi lus lte ba man chad kyang gser gyi
T02D2663a:219a-18: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bsams te /
T02D2663a:219a-19: de'i steng du padmo rtsa ba dang bcas pa snying ga'i bar du phyin par bsams te /
T02D2663a:219a-20: de'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs te ;
T02D2663a:219a-21: de'i shar phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la rin po che dpal de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D2663a:219a-22: lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la kun du rgyas pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D2663a:219a-23: nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D2663a:219a-24: byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la rnga dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa bsam mo //
T02D2663a:219a-25: shar lho'i 'dab ma la kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa'/
T02D2663a:219a-26: byang shar gyi 'dab ma la spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po /
T02D2663a:219a-27: lho nub kyi 'dab ma la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
T02D2663a:219a-28: nub byang gi 'dab ma la byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bsams te /
T02D2663a:219a-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2663a:219a-30: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang me tog dor
T02D2663a:219a-32: de rnams kun gyi sku bdag gi //
T02D2663a:219a-33: klad pa'i bar du phyin par bsam //
T02D2663a:219a-34: padmo'i ge sar kun la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum rnams dang /
T02D2663a:219b-0: sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug @219b
T02D2663a:219b-1: dang ting nge 'dzin rnams lha mo'i gzugs su bsam
T02D2663a:219b-2: mo // padmo'i rtsa ba la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bsam mo //
T02D2663a:219b-3: de'i drung g-yas g-yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'khor rnams dang /
T02D2663a:219b-4: phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa khro bo rnams dang /
T02D2663a:219b-5: skyong ba dang khro gnyer la sogs pa rim bzhin du bsam mo //
T02D2663a:219b-6: de'i phyi rim du lha dang klu la sogs pa mang po bsams te /
T02D2663a:219b-7: de ltar brtan par byas nas yid kyis mchod pa tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2663a:219b-8: de nas de dag kun zin pa dang se gol brdab par bya ste /
T02D2663a:219b-9: slob ma rnams mgon po la me tog 'dor du gzhug go //
T02D2663a:219b-10: me tog de dag kyang yid la bsams pa'i lha
T02D2663a:219b-11: gang gi steng du bab pa de slob ma de
T02D2663a:219b-13: de dag ni bsdu ba'i don du tshig gi don
T02D2663a:219b-14: la gsang ba'i bdag po de ni rang bzhin gyis
T02D2663a:219b-15: rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyis gang ba de
T02D2663a:219b-16: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sngags dang
T02D2663a:219b-17: phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs shig
T02D2663a:219b-18: ces pa ni mchod pa la sogs pa sngar smos
T02D2663a:219b-19: pa'i rim bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2663a:219b-20: bdag gi lus la chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
T02D2663a:219b-21: dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:219b-23: de nas bdag las kyi lha rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:219b-24: snga ma'i rim bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag
T02D2663a:219b-25: rgyas byin gyis brlab pa dag byas nas las kyi
T02D2663a:219b-26: rdo rje sems dpar bsgyur te /
T02D2663a:219b-27: mchod pa dang slob ma'i cho ga bya ba la
T02D2663a:219b-28: sogs pa thams cad gong du smos pa'i rim bzhin
T02D2663a:219b-29: du bya'o // rdul dang zhes pa ni de nas
T02D2663a:219b-30: slar bdag nang du zhugs nas yi ger snying gar
T02D2663a:219b-31: du bya'o // bsams te / chos thams cad rdul
T02D2663a:219b-32: dang bral ba'i bar bsgom pa'i rim pa snga ma
T02D2663a:219b-33: du bya'o // bsams te / bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2663a:219b-34: bdag dang sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang
T02D2663a:219b-35: shed las skyes dang shed can dang /
T02D2663a:219b-36: byed pa po la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang /
T02D2663a:219b-37: zug rdur bral zhes pa ni mu stegs gzhan rnams
T02D2663a:219b-38: kyi bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po de rnams kyang
T02D2663a:219b-39: dmigs su med par sgom zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:219b-40: de dag ni ji ltar phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:219b-41: gyis sbyang ba rdo shing la sogs pa'i zug rdu
T02D2663a:219b-42: dang nyes pa bsal ba bzhin du gang gis sbyang
T02D2663a:219b-43: ba yang thabs ji ltar sbyang ngo zhes bshad pa'o
T02D2663a:220a-0: // gru bzhi sgo bzhi las nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag @220a * //
T02D2663a:220a-1: par phye ba sgo khyud dang stegs bu rab tu
T02D2663a:220a-2: brgyan pa zhes pa de ni de ltar stong pa
T02D2663a:220a-3: nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas la /
T02D2663a:220a-4: de nas rlung dang chu'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bsams te /
T02D2663a:220a-5: de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2663a:220a-6: du bdag gi rked pa man chad 'gyur bar bsams
T02D2663a:220a-7: te / stegs bu zhes pa ni dbus kyi gzhi'i
T02D2663a:220a-8: gdan de nyid la bya ste de yang gser gyi
T02D2663a:220a-10: dbus na yid bzhin gyi padmo'i rgyal po chen po dang /
T02D2663a:220a-11: ge sar rgyas pa dang bcas shing shin tu rnam
T02D2663a:220a-12: par brgyan pa yid kyis zhes pa ni yid las
T02D2663a:220a-13: byung ba'i padmo zhes pa ste sngar bshad zin to
T02D2663a:220a-14: // shin tu rnam par brgyan pa'i yid la zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:220a-15: 'dab ma brgyad la sangs rgyas bzhi dang byang chub
T02D2663a:220a-16: sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyi kha dog ci 'dra ba
T02D2663a:220a-17: dang mthun par kha dog sna tshogs su bya ba
T02D2663a:220a-18: ste / rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi kha dog dkar po /
T02D2663a:220a-19: kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i kha dog ser po /
T02D2663a:220a-20: rnga dbyangs kyi kha dog smug nag / snang ba mtha' yas kyi kha dog dmar po /
T02D2663a:220a-21: de bzhin du kun du bzang po ni ser po /
T02D2663a:220a-22: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni dkar po /
T02D2663a:220a-23: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ser po /
T02D2663a:220a-24: byams pa ni dmar po bya'o //
T02D2663a:220a-25: yang na thams cad kyang kha dog thams cad do
T02D2663a:220a-26: zhes pa dang sbyar te chad pa med par shes
T02D2663a:220a-27: par bya'o // de'i dbus su yang lus dang ngag
T02D2663a:220a-28: yid 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i de bzhin
T02D2663a:220a-29: gshegs pa'i sku zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:220a-30: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku padmo'i
T02D2663a:220a-31: dbus su bsam pa ste mchog tu bzang ba 'jig
T02D2663a:220a-32: rten thams cad las 'das pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:220a-33: sems kyi sa las 'das zhes pa ni gzung ba
T02D2663a:220a-34: dang 'dzin pa'i cha sems kyi yul spangs pa zhes
T02D2663a:220a-35: pa'o // sems kyis shin tu thob ces pa ni
T02D2663a:220a-36: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de so sor rang
T02D2663a:220a-37: gis rig pa thob pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:220a-38: des ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:220a-39: 'bras bu dam pa yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa
T02D2663a:220a-40: zhes pa ni pha rol gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D2663a:220a-41: pa bstan pa ste sems can rnams la mtho ris
T02D2663a:220a-42: dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu rnams sbyin
T02D2663a:220a-43: zhes pa'o // de'i shar du zhes pa ni de'i drung du rig pa dang /
T02D2663a:220b-0: khro bo rnams zhes pa'i bar du @220b sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:220b-1: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams padmo'i 'dab ma dang
T02D2663a:220b-2: ge sar dag la bsam pa sngar smos pa'i rim
T02D2663a:220b-3: bzhin du bya'o // gzhan ni mtsho chen por zhes
T02D2663a:220b-4: pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor de'i 'og tu chu'i dkyil
T02D2663a:220b-9: bshos dang bdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnams sngags pas kun bsam zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:220b-10: yid kyis dri dang me tog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sngags pas bsam zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:220b-11: sems can kun gyi dam tshig phyir //
T02D2663a:220b-12: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de sems can rnams dam tshig la zhugs pa'i phyir /
T02D2663a:220b-13: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams rdzogs pa rgyas par
T02D2663a:220b-14: bri mi nus shing zab cing rgya che ba la
T02D2663a:220b-15: mos pas dkyil 'khor 'di bya zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:220b-16: drung gi sa gzhi kun du ni //
T02D2663a:220b-17: lha rnams grangs med pa yang ni //
T02D2663a:220b-18: sngags mkhan gyis ni nan tan bri //
T02D2663a:220b-20: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po dkyil
T02D2663a:220b-21: 'khor 'di'i dbus kyi stegs bu'i 'og phyi rim gyi
T02D2663a:220b-22: sa gzhi thams cad du lha dang klu la sogs
T02D2663a:220b-23: pa grangs med pa bri zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:220b-24: rang lus rang gis bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:220b-25: ras kyi rnam pa sbyangs nas su //
T02D2663a:220b-26: sngags pa sbyar stan der 'dug nas ;
T02D2663a:220b-27: / de bzhin gshegs rnams rjes mos pas //
T02D2663a:220b-28: zhes pa ni sbyor ba de rnams bya ba yang
T02D2663a:220b-29: bdag nyid yi ge ram snying po nyid du sbyang
T02D2663a:220b-30: ba la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i tshul bzhin
T02D2663a:220b-31: du byas nas gdod las ni 'di rnams bya zhes
T02D2663a:220b-32: pa'o // slob ma rnams kyi spyi bo ru //
T02D2663a:220b-33: aa ni 'khor dang bcas te gzhag / ces pa
T02D2663a:220b-34: ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe chos
T02D2663a:220b-35: kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa
T02D2663a:220b-36: byas nas de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:220b-37: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i snying po aom spyi bor bsam zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:220b-38: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:220b-39: rig pa yang ni de la byin //
T02D2663a:220b-40: zhes pa'i bar du slob ma rnams bdag gi lus
T02D2663a:220b-41: la me tog bor nas gang la bab pa'i rig
T02D2663a:220b-43: de la bsgom par zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor bar zhes
T02D2663a:220b-44: pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul rnams slob ma la
T02D2663a:220b-45: bstan pa'o // 'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02D2663a:221a-1: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa las
T02D2663a:221a-2: byung ba'i pha rol gyi mtshan ma rnams la mi
T02D2663a:221a-3: rtog pas dam pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:221a-4: lus can rnams kyi dam tshig phyi ru gsungs //
T02D2663a:221a-5: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di dam tshig can du
T02D2663a:221a-6: bya ba'i phyir ro zhes pa sngar bshad pa bzhin
T02D2663a:221a-7: no // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i thabs
T02D2663a:221a-8: zhes pa ni mgon na gong ma'i nang du bshad
T02D2663a:221a-10: / da ni rig pa'i dka' thub kyi le'u 'chad de /
T02D2663a:221a-11: rig pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa nyid
T02D2663a:221a-12: don ji lta ba bzhin ba nyid rig pas na
T02D2663a:221a-13: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2663a:221a-14: de las byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya la yang bya ste /
T02D2663a:221a-15: de'i dka' thub ni de dang rjes su mthun par spyod pa ste /
T02D2663a:221a-16: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang rjes
T02D2663a:221a-17: su mthun pa'i spyod pa skra dang kha spu bregs
T02D2663a:221a-18: pa dang chos gos bgo ba la sogs pa dge
T02D2663a:221a-19: slong gi gzugs su spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:221a-20: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yang lha chen po la
T02D2663a:221a-21: dad pa la sogs pa nyid kyi spyod pa dang
T02D2663a:221a-22: / tshul 'jig rten du rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di
T02D2663a:221a-23: yang bdag nyid kyi lha'i gzugs ci 'dra ba dang
T02D2663a:221a-24: / / rjes su mthun par spyod pa dang ting
T02D2663a:221a-25: nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang rjes
T02D2663a:221a-26: su mthun par spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:221a-27: ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin rtogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:221a-28: rjes su spyod par mthun par spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:221a-29: de'i sngags slob par byed pa rnams te yan lag
T02D2663a:221a-30: de bzhi dang ldan pa ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D2663a:221a-31: zhes pa'o // de la kha cig ni brtul zhugs
T02D2663a:221a-32: 'di spyod cing sngon du bsnyen pa'i grangs sum 'bum
T02D2663a:221a-33: la sogs pa ji skad du gzhung las 'byung ba
T02D2663a:221a-34: bzhin du byas nas sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o
T02D2663a:221a-35: zhes pa'o // // de ste de bas kyang lhag par bstan par 'dod pas /
T02D2663a:221a-36: dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing /
T02D2663a:221a-37: zla ba drug tu rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:221a-38: de bas na brtul zhugs 'di ni dbang chen la sogs pa la gnas /
T02D2663a:221a-39: brtul zhugs kyi rgyu lta bur bltas te rig pa'i
T02D2663a:221a-40: brtul zhugs 'di las byung ba'i dbang chen la sogs
T02D2663a:221a-41: pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i brtul zhugs ni brtul
T02D2663a:221a-42: zhugs gong ma 'di las byung bar blta ste /
T02D2663a:221b-0: de bas na brtul zhugs 'dis sngar sems @221b yongs
T02D2663a:221b-1: su sbyangs nas phyis brtul zhugs 'og ma la 'jug
T02D2663a:221b-2: ste brtul zhugs 'og ma spyod pa dang /
T02D2663a:221b-3: lha'i gzugs su bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang /
T02D2663a:221b-4: ting nge 'dzin las langs nas spyod pa'i tshe yang
T02D2663a:221b-5: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rtogs shing chags par
T02D2663a:221b-6: spyod pa dang / sngags slob par byed pa'i rim bzhin du spyad par bya ste /
T02D2663a:221b-7: lhag pa ni dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:221b-8: la gnas shing de'i rang bzhin la bya ba dang
T02D2663a:221b-9: / dbang chen la sogs pa so so'i phyag rgya 'ching ba'o //
T02D2663a:221b-10: rig pa'i brtul zhugs de dris pa yang /
T02D2663a:221b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2663a:221b-12: phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis
T02D2663a:221b-13: sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
T02D2663a:221b-14: pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir rig pa'i dka' thub
T02D2663a:221b-15: kun dris pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663a:221b-16: phyag na rdo rje rig pa'i dka' thub dris pa
T02D2663a:221b-17: yang dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2663a:221b-18: shing / rig pa'i dka' thub spyod pa de gtsor dris par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:221b-19: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa ni don
T02D2663a:221b-20: dka' zhing zhes pas don gyi tshig dang 'bru rnams
T02D2663a:221b-21: mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663a:221b-22: sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod
T02D2663a:221b-23: pa rnams kyi spyir zhes pa ni phyag na rdo
T02D2663a:221b-24: rje nyid dmigs mi mkhyen te /
T02D2663a:221b-25: 'dri ba ma yin gyi ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba
T02D2663a:221b-26: sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
T02D2663a:221b-27: pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:221b-28: 'di ltar dka' thub spyad pa lags //
T02D2663a:221b-29: zhes pa nas rgyal po gtso nyid dbang du zhes
T02D2663a:221b-30: pa'i bar du phyag na rdo rjes dris pa'i tshig
T02D2663a:221b-31: ste / de la sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
T02D2663a:221b-32: zhes pa las 'di ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis
T02D2663a:221b-33: zin na da dri ci dgos she na /
T02D2663a:221b-34: bdag nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pas de'i don 'tshal mod kyis /
T02D2663a:221b-35: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bshad na /
T02D2663a:221b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du bstan na /
T02D2663a:221b-37: de rnams yid ches par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2663a:221b-38: bcom ldan 'das nyid du dbang du bgyis pa'i phyir zhes pa ste de bas na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:221b-39: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bshad de /
T02D2663a:221b-40: rgyal ba gtso nyid dbang du bya //
T02D2663a:222a-0: dris pa'i tshig gzhan rnams ni @222a * //
T02D2663a:222a-1: 'og nas lan ldon pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:222a-2: rig pa'i dka' thub las byung ba'i //
T02D2663a:222a-3: dka' thub gnas pa sangs rgyas bzhin //
T02D2663a:222a-5: rig pa'i dka' thub las byung ba //
T02D2663a:222a-6: zhes pa ni sems su sbyor ba'i mtshan ma nyid
T02D2663a:222a-7: yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i rig pa'i dka' thub

T02D2663a:222a-9: 'khor la gnas te spyod pa de bshad do zhes
T02D2663a:222a-11: dka' thub gnas pa sangs rgyas bzhin //

T02D2663a:222a-14: nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i tshe yang chos thams cad

T02D2663a:222a-17: ma lta bur mkhyen pas ji ltar yang mi chags

T02D2663a:222a-23: rtogs shing gang la yang mi chags pas spyod pas
T02D2663a:222a-24: bzhin du gnas / na / kun du sangs rgyas pa dang 'dra //
T02D2663a:222a-26: yang dag 'di byas nas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:222a-27: nam zhig rtag tu sems thub na //

T02D2663a:222a-29: yang dag nyid du bdag byas nas //

T02D2663a:222a-35: pa'i bar snang ba rnam par rtog pa gzhan med

T02D2663a:222a-37: snang na de / dka' thub spyad pa spyod pa yin //
T02D2663a:222a-40: nam zhig rtag tu sems thub na //

T02D2663a:222b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang chos rnams @222b dang ;
T02D2663a:222b-1: gzhan gyi tshul khrims can ma yin zhes pa'i bar du /

T02D2663a:222b-3: zhes zhus pa de bshad pa ste 'jug pa'i byang
T02D2663a:222b-4: chub kyi sems chos sun 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam
T02D2663a:222b-5: par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /

T02D2663a:222b-12: de de bas na gsungs pa /

T02D2663a:222b-14: zhes pa ste ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:222b-15: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2663a:222b-16: mtshan nyid gcig tu chud pa bzhin du zhes pa

T02D2663a:222b-18: pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin spyod pa

T02D2663a:222b-21: phyir lha'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de so so nas

T02D2663a:222b-23: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par

T02D2663a:222b-26: gang na ji ltar gnas nas so //

T02D2663a:222b-29: zhes pa ni chos thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin du chud de /
T02D2663a:222b-30: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gro zhes pa'o //

T02D2663a:222b-33: gser dang rdo bar snyoms na'o //
T02D2663a:222b-34: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas /

T02D2663a:222b-37: shing de rnams la chags pa mi 'byung ba ni

T02D2663a:222b-39: sems mi skye bzhin du gser la yang chags pa'i
T02D2663a:222b-40: sems mi skye na gang na gnas kyang mi chags

T02D2663a:222b-42: tu yang spyod na rig pa dang rjes su mthun
T02D2663a:223a-0: par spyod pa'o // ji srid mtshan mar bshad pa ni sngags kyi grangs @223a * //

T02D2663a:223a-3: zhes pa ni ji srid du bsgrubs na /
T02D2663a:223a-4: dka' thub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2663a:223a-6: sngags bzlas pa'i grangs sum 'bum la sogs pa ji srid du gzhung las bshad pa /
T02D2663a:223a-7: ji srid kyi bar du dka' thub de gong du

T02D2663a:223a-10: de yang dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la

T02D2663a:223a-14: dbang chen gyi ni lha lta bur //

T02D2663a:223a-18: dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas

T02D2663a:223a-20: / dbang chen gyi ni lha lta bur //

T02D2663a:223a-23: zhes pa'i bar du dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2663a:223a-24: 'khor la gnas nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs
T02D2663a:223a-25: su bsgyur te / ji ltar sa'i rang bzhin sra
T02D2663a:223a-26: zhing mkhrang ba ltar bdag gi lus kyang de lta
T02D2663a:223a-27: bur sems la zhar la bsgom zhing zla ba gcig

T02D2663a:223a-29: dbang chen gyi ni lha lta bur //

T02D2663a:223a-34: ge de nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du

T02D2663a:223a-37: nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings te dbang chen gyi
T02D2663a:223a-38: rang bzhin lta bu sra zhing brtan par bsgom zhes
T02D2663a:223a-39: pa'o // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas su //

T02D2663a:223a-44: 'jig rten na yang sems dang kha zas gnyis kyis lus 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /

T02D2663a:223b-14: bsgom zhing padmo'i phyag rgya bcings la zla ba gcig
T02D2663a:223b-16: padmo'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang zas su chu btung

T02D2663a:223b-38: bzhi la rlung gi ldan par te //

T02D2663a:223b-43: 'dzin du sbyar ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te

T02D2663a:224a-29: ro smad kyang snga ma bzhin du rlung gi rang bzhin du bsams te /

T02D2663a:224a-34: gzugs su sbyor ba ni so so'i dkyil 'khor kha

T02D2663a:224a-40: brgya byin tshangs pa la sogs pa'i //

T02D2663a:225a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:225a-9: snying ga ru ni snying po gzhag / yan lag
T02D2663a:225a-10: tu ni yan lag gzhag / ces pa dang sbyar
T02D2663a:225a-11: te / de rnams kyang bkod pa tsam gyis chog pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:225a-12: de dag sgra'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa shes na slob dpon zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:225a-13: gsang ba'i ye shes de zhes pa ni sngags spyad
T02D2663a:225a-14: pa'i tshul rang bzhin gyis gsang ba'i steng du sngags
T02D2663a:225a-15: kyi snying po yi ge aa zhes thams cad thog
T02D2663a:225a-16: ma ma skyes par chud pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i
T02D2663a:225a-17: sgo ste / shin tu zab ste snod ma yin
T02D2663a:225a-18: zhing dam tshig med pa la mi bstan pas na
T02D2663a:225a-19: gsang ba'i gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:225a-20: sngags kyi yi ges 'byung chen po //
T02D2663a:225a-21: zhes pa ni snying po'i sgo nas chos thams cad
T02D2663a:225a-22: stong pa nyid du chud par 'gyur bas de nyid
T02D2663a:225a-24: ye shes de las bla na med pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2663a:225a-25: thob pa chen po 'byung bas na 'byung chen po
T02D2663a:225a-26: zhes bya'o // pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
T02D2663a:225a-27: pa'i sgo nas ye shes 'byung ba yang 'bras bu
T02D2663a:225a-28: chen po 'byung ba yin mod kyi /
T02D2663a:225a-29: de las khyad par du gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:225a-30: sngags kyi ye shes 'byung chen po //
T02D2663a:225a-31: zhes pa ste de lta bur dris pa dge ba'i tshig dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663a:225a-32: aa zhes bya ba sngags kun gyi //
T02D2663a:225a-33: snying po ru ni gsungs pa yin //
T02D2663a:225a-34: de las byung ba sngags rnams ni //
T02D2663a:225a-35: grangs med pa ru skyes pa ste //
T02D2663a:225a-37: sngags kun gyi ni snying po gang //
T02D2663a:225a-39: de la yi ge aa zhes pa ni sngags thams cad kyi snying po /
T02D2663a:225a-40: snying po zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i gnas so //
T02D2663a:225a-41: de bas na kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis ka 'byung ba'i gnas te /
T02D2663a:225a-42: de la ka la sogs pa yi ge 'bru thams
T02D2663a:225a-43: cad kyang aa dang mi ldan na mi smra ste
T02D2663a:225a-44: / de bas na yi ge ka la sogs pa
T02D2663a:225a-45: thams cad kyang aa las byung bar shes par bya
T02D2663a:225a-46: / ste / de ni kun rdzob tu 'byung ba'i gnas so //
T02D2663a:225a-47: don dam pa ni yi ge aa de las chos
T02D2663a:225a-48: thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ma skyes par
T02D2663a:225a-49: chud pa'i ye shes 'byung ste 'di ni don dam
T02D2663a:225a-51: de las 'byung ba'i sngags rnams ni //
T02D2663a:225a-52: grangs med bar du skyes pa ste //
T02D2663a:225b-0: @225b zhes pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2663a:225b-1: 'das pa'i sngags ji snyed du gsungs pa de thams
T02D2663a:225b-2: cad yi ge 'bru'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2663a:225b-3: 'bru de rnams kyang aa las gyur bas sngags grangs med de /
T02D2663a:225b-4: de dag thams cad aa las 'byung //
T02D2663a:225b-5: zhes pa ste des ni kun rdzob tu thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas su ston pa'o //
T02D2663a:225b-6: 'phro ba thams cad zhi bar byed //
T02D2663a:225b-7: ma lus ye shes kyang 'byung zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:225b-8: aa de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas chos thams
T02D2663a:225b-9: cad thog ma nas ma byung ba stong pa nyid
T02D2663a:225b-10: kyi rang bzhin du chud pas gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2663a:225b-11: pa la sogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'phro
T02D2663a:225b-12: ba dang bral ba'i ye shes kyang aa de las
T02D2663a:225b-13: 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa ste des ni don dam
T02D2663a:225b-14: par 'byung ba'i gnas su bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:225b-15: de lta bur na gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:225b-16: sna tshogs pa'i lus las byung ba'o //
T02D2663a:225b-17: zhes pa'i bar du gong ma'i tshigs su bcad pa mdor gsungs pa de nyid ni 'brel pa ste /
T02D2663a:225b-18: de la spyir rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2663a:225b-19: aa dang aam dang ai dang au rnams so //
T02D2663a:225b-20: de dag yi ge thams cad spyi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663a:225b-21: aom klad kor gyi nga dang nya dang na dang na dang ma rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:225b-26: ma'i nang du pa'i 'khor rnams 'dus par blta'o //
T02D2663a:225b-27: aa dang ai'i nang du ya 'dus par blta'o //
T02D2663a:225b-28: ra dang la ni ri r'i dang li l'i'i nang du 'dus /
T02D2663a:225b-29: sha sha dang sa ha rnams ni yi ge zhes pa'i tshig gnyis po'i nang du 'dus te /
T02D2663a:225b-30: aa de rnams las ka la sogs pa'i yan lag thams cad 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:225b-31: de la aa de ni srog tu gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:225b-32: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog gis zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:225b-33: yi ge aa de kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis ka ru thams cad kyi srog ste /
T02D2663a:225b-34: kun rdzob tu yang gong du bshad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2663a:225b-35: aa de med na ka la sogs pa smras pa
T02D2663a:225b-36: thams cad kyi srog ces bya'o //
T02D2663a:225b-37: chos thams cad thog ma nas ma skyes par chud pa'i ye shes 'byung bas srog ces bya ste /
T02D2663a:225b-38: de lta bur srog yin par 'ga' zhig gis bshad pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:225b-39: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'o //
T02D2663a:225b-40: de bas 'di kun thams cad de //
T02D2663a:226a-0: zhes pa ni aa de ltar de srog yin pas @226a * //
T02D2663a:226a-1: ka la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad 'di ji ltar yin zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:226a-2: yan lag kun rnam par zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:226a-3: aa de rnams ka la sogs pa'i 'bru rnams la gnas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:226a-4: yan lag rnams kyang ci rigs par //
T02D2663a:226a-5: rtag par kun la'ang shes par byos //
T02D2663a:226a-6: zhes pa ni ka la sogs pa'i yan lag ji
T02D2663a:226a-7: ltar rigs par sngags kun la rtag tu gnas par
T02D2663a:226a-9: yi ge rnams kyis thams cad khyab //
T02D2663a:226a-10: ces pa dang de nyid kyi don du gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:226a-11: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis sngags kyi tshig thams cad du khyab ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:226a-12: yi ge rnams kyang de yis so //
T02D2663a:226a-13: zhes pa ni ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams la aa des khyab ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:226a-14: yi ge las ni sgra 'byung ba dang /
T02D2663a:226a-15: cha ru kun du 'byung ngo zhes pa ni ka
T02D2663a:226a-16: la sogs pa'i yi ge'i sgra rnams las chos thams
T02D2663a:226a-17: cad dgos pa dang bral ba'o zhes pa la sogs
T02D2663a:226a-18: pa'i sgra'i phyogs gcig pa rnams 'byung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:226a-19: de bas na de kun thams cad de sna tshogs pa'i lus 'byung ba'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:226a-20: de bas na aa de ni ka la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad de /
T02D2663a:226a-21: ka la sogs pa de rnams kyang lha rnams thams
T02D2663a:226a-22: cad kyi sa bon bas lha rnams kyi gzugs rnams
T02D2663a:226a-23: tshogs pa'i yi ge de rnams las ji ltar rigs
T02D2663a:226a-25: de yis gzhan pa bshad pa yin //
T02D2663a:226a-27: slob dpon gyis su de bsgrags pa //
T02D2663a:226a-28: mthu chen sangs rgyas rnams kyis so //
T02D2663a:226a-29: zhes pa'i bar du yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2663a:226a-30: de dag thams cad 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis slob dpon gyi lus la dgod pa bshad de /
T02D2663a:226a-31: de'i gzhag pa yin zhes pa ni yi ge de snying gar gzhag go //
T02D2663a:226a-32: sngar bshad zin to zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:226a-33: dpa' bo snying po de nyid tshig / ces pa
T02D2663a:226a-34: snying po zhes pa'i tshig ni aa 'ba' zhig la
T02D2663a:226a-35: mi bya'i / sems mgu ba ni snying yin te //
T02D2663a:226a-36: rigs nas sngags rnams grub sder zhes bshad pa'i tshul du rig par bya ste /
T02D2663a:226a-37: yi ge 'di rnams lus la bkod pa tsam gyis chog pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:226a-38: so so'i sgra de kho na nyid sems tshim zhing
T02D2663a:226a-39: mgu ba'i bar du bsgom par bya ba nyon cig
T02D2663a:226a-40: ces pa'o // snying ga ru ni snying po gzhag
T02D2663a:226a-41: / yan lag rnams su yan lag gzhag / ces
T02D2663a:226b-0: pa snying @226b gar yi ge aa /
T02D2663a:226b-1: lus kyi yan lag rnams su ka la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:226b-2: 'bru rnams ka de lhag mar rig par bya'o zhes
T02D2663a:226b-3: pa la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim bzhin
T02D2663a:226b-5: de ltar 'di kun bya ba ni //
T02D2663a:226b-6: bdag gi lus ni kun du sangs rgyas su //
T02D2663a:226b-7: zhes slob dpon bdag gi lus kun sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D2663a:226b-8: skur bsgyur te yi ge 'di thams cad dgod par
T02D2663a:226b-9: bya'o zhes pa'o // sbyor ba'i stan gnas blo can gyis //
T02D2663a:226b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas //
T02D2663a:226b-11: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsams te /
T02D2663a:226b-12: phyag byas la sbyor ba'i skyil mo krung du bcas
T02D2663a:226b-13: te sems dang lus mnyam par bzhag nas gong du
T02D2663a:226b-15: rgyal chen ye shes sras 'di la //
T02D2663a:226b-16: cho ga bzhin du shes nas dgod //
T02D2663a:226b-17: slob dpon zhes su de bsgrags pa //
T02D2663a:226b-18: mthu chen sangs rgyas rnams kyis so //
T02D2663a:226b-20: de ltar yi ge rnams bkod cing de rnams kyi
T02D2663a:226b-21: sgra'i de kho na nyid stong pa nyid du chud
T02D2663a:226b-22: pa'i ye shes rgya chen po de dag cho ga
T02D2663a:226b-23: bzhin du bgyis nas she na kun du sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:226b-24: pa rnams kyis slob dpon zhes gsungs so //
T02D2663a:226b-25: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:226b-26: yi ge 'khor lo ma lus par //
T02D2663a:226b-27: rang gi lus la gnas pa'o //
T02D2663a:226b-28: zhes pa'i bar du de'i rjes su bsngags pa bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:226b-29: de la sangs rgyas la sogs pa grub pa yang
T02D2663a:226b-30: rgyu rnam pa gnyis te bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2663a:226b-31: kyis so // de la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D2663a:226b-32: ye shes ni mngon sum pa'i rgyu ste /
T02D2663a:226b-33: de la 'dir sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi sgra
T02D2663a:226b-34: de kho na nyid stong pa nyid chud par byed
T02D2663a:226b-35: pa'i ye shes mngon du byas nas /
T02D2663a:226b-36: 'di ni mngon sum pa'i rgya ste /
T02D2663a:226b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes pa la sogs pas bstod pa ni /
T02D2663a:226b-38: slob dpon de mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin /
T02D2663a:226b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu
T02D2663a:226b-40: byed pas rgyu las 'bras bu bstan par shes par
T02D2663a:226b-41: bya'o // de bzhin du 'jig rten na snang ba char chu mod cing /
T02D2663a:226b-42: myu gu bzang na 'bras bu ma gyur kyang lo legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:226b-43: rjes su bsngags pa yang rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas te /
T02D2663a:226b-44: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02D2663a:227a-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi ni 'jig rten gyi mi rnams te /
T02D2663a:227a-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha ni de bas de ni /
T02D2663a:227a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas rdzogs //
T02D2663a:227a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:227a-7: tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang //
T02D2663a:227a-9: 'jig rten gyi mi ni bram ze khru gang //
T02D2663a:227a-10: tshangs par spyod pa zhes kyang bya //
T02D2663a:227a-13: dge slong zag zad dpal chen dang //
T02D2663a:227a-15: gsang ba thams cad 'chang zhes pa ni bdag lus lha'i gzugs su bsgyur ba dang /
T02D2663a:227a-16: dag gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge rnams bdag gi lus la tshang ba dang /
T02D2663a:227a-17: yi ge de rnams kyi sgra'i de kho na nyid
T02D2663a:227a-18: la dmigs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus dang
T02D2663a:227a-19: ngag yid gsum gyi gsang ba 'chang ba zhes pa'i
T02D2663a:227a-20: chos kun gyi dbang phyug gtso bo ste zhes pa
T02D2663a:227a-21: ni / chud pa'i chos gzhung gi chos gnyis ka la dbang du gyur pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:227a-22: gang gis byang chub brtan pa la //
T02D2663a:227a-23: sgra yi ye shes la yang bstun //
T02D2663a:227a-24: zhes pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yang /
T02D2663a:227a-25: yi ge lus la bkod pa tsam gyis 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:227a-26: byang chub kyi sems brtan zhing yi ge rnams kyi
T02D2663a:227a-27: sgra'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bsgom pa
T02D2663a:227a-28: la brtson na 'di skad smos pa de rnams su
T02D2663a:227a-29: 'gyur zhes pa'o // de ni slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ste dang po'o //
T02D2663a:227a-30: smin ma gnyis kyi mtshams su zhes pa ni 'gro
T02D2663a:227a-31: ba dang mi 'gro ba ma lus pa'o zhes pa'i
T02D2663a:227a-32: bar du slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa
T02D2663a:227a-33: ste / rigs gsum gyi steng du dgod pa'o //
T02D2663a:227a-34: smin ma gnyis kyi mtshams su ni h'um zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:227a-35: snying rje'i gnas zhes pa ni slob dpon yang snga
T02D2663a:227a-36: ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663a:227a-38: smin mtshams su phyag na rdo rje'i snying po'i yi
T02D2663a:227a-39: ge h'um rang gi dkyil 'khor la bzhag par bsams
T02D2663a:227a-40: te brar khar shes par bya /
T02D2663a:227a-41: phyag na padmo'i gnas zhes bya //
T02D2663a:227a-42: zhes pa ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i snying po ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas te /
T02D2663a:227a-44: da ni snying gar gnas pa ni //
T02D2663a:227a-45: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi snying po
T02D2663a:227b-0: aa de rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor @227b bsam
T02D2663a:227b-1: zhes pa'o // kun gyi gtso bo dbang po yin //
T02D2663a:227b-2: nga yis su ni kun khyab pa //
T02D2663a:227b-4: zhes pa ni snying po de'i yon tan bsngags pa ste /
T02D2663a:227b-5: 'gro ba ni mi la sogs pa'i sems can no //
T02D2663a:227b-6: mi 'gro ba ni sa dang shing la sogs pa ste de dag kun khyab ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:227b-7: aa zhes pa ni srog gi mchog / ces pa nas /
T02D2663a:227b-8: 'chi ba med pa'i gnas mchog thob //
T02D2663a:227b-10: bar du slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ste /
T02D2663a:227b-11: dpa' po chen po'i snying po rnams las /
T02D2663a:227b-12: yi ge aa srog gi mchog pas bdag gi khong
T02D2663a:227b-13: du dbugs yan man du lhan cig tu sngar bshad
T02D2663a:227b-14: pa bzhin du bsam mo zhes pa tshig ces bya
T02D2663a:227b-15: zhes pa ni yi ge'i tshig rang bzhin pas khar
T02D2663a:227b-17: ra zhes pa ni me ru bsgrags //
T02D2663a:227b-18: zhes pa ni yi ger de rang bzhin gyis dkyil
T02D2663a:227b-19: 'khor dang bcas par bsams la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663a:227b-20: bsam mo // h'um ni khro bo zhes su bya //
T02D2663a:227b-21: zhes pa ni smin mtshams su yi ge h'um gi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par bsam mo //
T02D2663a:227b-22: kha ni nam mkha' rig par bya //
T02D2663a:227b-23: 'khor ni stong pa mchog ces pa ni /
T02D2663a:227b-24: yi ge kha klad kor dang bcas pa klad pa'i steng du bsams te /
T02D2663a:227b-25: kha ni chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid par ston pa'o //
T02D2663a:227b-26: 'khor ni stong pa yang stong pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:227b-27: yang dag pa'i mchog de rnams slob dpon zhes bya /
T02D2663a:227b-28: bsdus she na'o zhes pa ni gong du smos pa'i
T02D2663a:227b-29: yi ge rnams kyi sgra'i de kho na nyid dang
T02D2663a:227b-30: / dgos pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni de slob dpon zhes bya zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:227b-31: de bas rnam pa thams cad du'ang //
T02D2663a:227b-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs ye shes //
T02D2663a:227b-33: rtag tu nan tan mngon byas nas //
T02D2663a:227b-35: zhes pa ni de dag gi rjes su bsam pa ste /
T02D2663a:227b-36: snying po de rnams nga 'ba' zhig gis bshad pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:227b-37: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663a:227b-38: de bas na rnam pa thams cad du de dag
T02D2663a:227b-39: gi sgra de kho na nyid du stong pa la
T02D2663a:227b-40: bsgom pa la sogs pa rtag tu nan tan byas
T02D2663a:227b-41: na sangs rgyas pa'i gnas thob pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:227b-42: ka de lkog mar rig par bya //
T02D2663a:227b-43: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D2663a:227b-44: dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen bzhin no //
T02D2663a:228a-0: zhes pa'i bar du yi ge dgod pa'i le'u gsungs @228a * //
T02D2663a:228a-2: yan lag rnams su yan lag bzhag / ces smos
T02D2663a:228a-3: pa de ka la sogs pa'i yan lag gang rnams
T02D2663a:228a-4: lus kyi yan lag gzhag pa'i gnas 'chad par gsungs
T02D2663a:228a-5: pa ste / yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis po
T02D2663a:228a-6: 'di rnams bkod pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
T02D2663a:228a-7: cu rtsa gnyis su sbyar ba'o //
T02D2663a:228a-8: de la slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin dang po
T02D2663a:228a-9: snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe
T02D2663a:228a-10: sbyar / gnyis pa ni yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe sbyar /
T02D2663a:228a-11: gsum pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe sbyar bar shes par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:228a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663a:228a-13: gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to zhes

T02D2663a:231a-15: sems can rnams so so'i rjes su mthun par sbyar

T02D2663a:231a-17: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2663a:231a-19: de ni srog gcod pa rab tu spangs pa yin
T02D2663a:231a-20: zhes pa na log par lta ba rab tu yang
T02D2663a:231a-21: spangs shes pa yin zhes pa'i bar byang chub sems
T02D2663a:231a-22: dpa'i khrims lnga po'i dngos po smos pa'o //
T02D2663a:231a-23: bslab pa'i gnas 'di lnga bzung nas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:231a-24: thabs dang shes rab kyis zin pas bslab pa'i bar
T02D2663a:231a-25: du bslab pa de rnams kyis rjes su bsngags pa
T02D2663a:231a-26: dang / de lta bur slob pas ltung pa'i rtsa
T02D2663a:231a-27: ba 'di bzhi srog gi phyir yang nyams par mi
T02D2663a:231a-28: bya'o zhes pa dang sbyar te /
T02D2663a:231a-29: khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di skad smos pa'i
T02D2663a:231a-30: bslab pa'i 'di lnga la dad pas bslabs nas snod
T02D2663a:231a-31: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa bla na med
T02D2663a:231a-32: pa de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pas bsngags pa bslab
T02D2663a:231a-33: pa dang rjes su mthun par bslab pa yin no
T02D2663a:231a-34: zhes so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663a:231a-35: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'dus ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas nas /
T02D2663a:231a-36: 'dus byas pa'i tshul khrims thabs dang shes rab yongs
T02D2663a:231a-37: su zin pas bslabs nas bla na med pa brnyes
T02D2663a:231a-38: te / de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab pa ni /
T02D2663a:231a-39: de dag gi rjes su slob pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:231a-40: 'dus ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po la
T02D2663a:231a-41: gnas nas zhes pa ni chos thams cad thog ma
T02D2663a:231a-42: nas ma byung ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663a:231a-43: rang bzhin la chud par gnas nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:231a-44: 'dus byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi zhes pa ni srog
T02D2663a:231b-0: gcod pa @231b rab tu spang ba yin zhes pa
T02D2663a:231b-1: la sogs pa ming gis smos pa rnams te /
T02D2663a:231b-2: de bas na thags dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2663a:231b-3: de ltar slob ma des 'og nas ming gis 'byung
T02D2663a:231b-4: ba'i rtsa ba 'di bzhi srog gi phyir yang nyams
T02D2663a:231b-6: 'di bzhi bshad pa yang dam tshig gi skabs su sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663a:231b-8: de ni slar 'byung du med pa zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:231b-9: 'di bzhi dang mi ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:231b-10: zhes kyang mi bya ste slar gsor mi rung ngo
T02D2663a:231b-11: zhes pa'o // thabs dang shes rab tu bral ba //
T02D2663a:231b-12: zhes pa ni de bzhin ni 'jigs par byed pa'i
T02D2663a:231b-13: thabs dang shes rab tu sbyar bar rang bzhin gyis
T02D2663a:231b-14: nyon mongs pa yin te slar dbyung du med pa
T02D2663a:231b-16: de bas na gsungs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663a:231b-18: gang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D2663a:231b-19: da ltar bzhugs pa'i mgon po yang shes rab dang
T02D2663a:231b-20: thabs yongs su zin par bslabs nas bla na med
T02D2663a:231b-21: pa'i byang chub 'thob bo zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:231b-22: de bas na 'di bzhi dang mi ldan zhing thabs
T02D2663a:231b-23: dang shes rab med na bla na med pa'i byang
T02D2663a:231b-24: chub 'dus ma byas pa thob par mi 'gyur bas
T02D2663a:231b-25: slar dbyung du med do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:231b-26: de ltar thabs dang shes rab tu mi ldan pas na slar dbyung du med na /
T02D2663a:231b-27: nyan thos pa rnams la ngas thabs dang shes rab tu mi ldan pa'i bslab pa bshad ce na /
T02D2663a:231b-28: thabs dang mi ldan pa'i ye shes nyan thos rnams la bslab pa bshad pa ni /
T02D2663a:231b-29: dpa' bo chen po de dag gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:231b-30: nyan thos rnams la ngas thabs dang shes rab tu
T02D2663a:231b-31: mi ldan pa'i bslab pa bstan pa yang nges pa'i
T02D2663a:231b-32: don du bstan pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:231b-33: de dag snod dang sbyar zhing bkri ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:231b-34: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mi
T02D2663a:231b-35: zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi 'khor
T02D2663a:231b-36: lo 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa las sngags bzlas pa'i
T02D2663a:231b-37: skabs la thog mar spyir phyi nang gi bzlas pa
T02D2663a:231b-39: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bzhi'i
T02D2663a:231b-40: skabs su nang gi bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi bstan
T02D2663a:231b-41: / de'i 'og tu dpa' bo chen po snying po'i
T02D2663a:231b-42: skabs su nang gi bzlas pa'i yan lag gsum bstan
T02D2663a:231b-43: te de rnams kyang bzlas pa'i grangs su dus nges
T02D2663a:231b-44: pa'i bsnyen par byas pa gsungs so //
T02D2663a:232a-1: pa'i skabs su 'dir yang bzlas pa'i yan lag gcig
T02D2663a:232a-2: dang grangs dang dus nges pa'i bsnyen pa ma yin
T02D2663a:232a-3: / kun du sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgrub pa'i gnas
T02D2663a:232a-4: yongs su gyur pa'i bar du bzlas pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2663a:232a-5: / 'chad de / de bas na bzlas pa de
T02D2663a:232a-6: rnams kyang sgom rim tsam yang bshad par shes par
T02D2663a:232a-7: / 'chad de / bya ste / dang po nyid
T02D2663a:232a-8: du phyi nang gi bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi phyi
T02D2663a:232a-9: dang nang gnyis ka la dmigs pas spom mo //
T02D2663a:232a-10: de'i 'og tu nang gi bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi
T02D2663a:232a-11: phyi rol du sangs rgyas kyi skul mi dmigs par
T02D2663a:232a-12: nang du rang gi nying gar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663a:232a-13: sku bsams nas slob pa de bas phra'o //
T02D2663a:232a-14: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo chen po'i skabs su snying
T02D2663a:232a-15: gar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsams pa yang btang
T02D2663a:232a-16: ste / dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang
T02D2663a:232a-17: rung ba bsams nas yan lag gsum du bya ste
T02D2663a:232a-18: zlos bas de bas kyang phra'o //
T02D2663a:232a-19: yi ge brgya ba'i skabs 'dir ni bdag stong pa
T02D2663a:232a-20: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas snying po'i
T02D2663a:232a-21: sgra tsam la yan lag gcig pur bya ste /
T02D2663a:232a-22: zlos pas gong ma kun phra par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663a:232a-23: de la yi ge brgya pa yang kun du sangs rgyas pa yin yang /
T02D2663a:232a-24: yi ge aam gis byin gyi brlab pa ste /
T02D2663a:232a-25: de yang le'u lngas yi ge brgya ba'i bshad pa'i yan lag rdzogs par shes par bya ba ni /
T02D2663a:232a-26: yi ge brgya pa 'byung ba'i le'u dang /
T02D2663a:232a-27: sgra'i 'bras bu'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u dang /
T02D2663a:232a-28: yi ge brgya pa'i le'u pa sgrags pa'i le'u dang /
T02D2663a:232a-29: bdag bsgrub pa'i le'u dang kun du byang chub pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i de'u rnams te /
T02D2663a:232a-30: de la 'dir dang por yi ge brgya ba 'byung ba'i le'u bshad de /
T02D2663a:232a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2663a:232a-32: pos 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la gzigs nas zhes
T02D2663a:232a-34: de la yi ge brgya pa ni aam zhes pa
T02D2663a:232a-35: nyid kyi nang du 'dus par shes par bya ba
T02D2663a:232a-36: ste / de ni klad kor ni nga dang /
T02D2663a:232a-39: na dang ma rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2663a:232a-44: ma'i nang du pa'i ris 'dus te /
T02D2663a:232a-45: yi ge de nyi shu dang rnam par shes pa'i le'u las bshad pa dang sbyar nas /
T02D2663a:232a-46: aa dang aom nang du yang 'dus /
T02D2663a:232a-47: ri r'i dang li l'i ni ra dang la dngos so //
T02D2663a:232b-0: ai @232b a'i'i nang du bha 'dus te /
T02D2663a:232b-1: de ltar sa ra la ba rnams kyang der 'dus te /
T02D2663a:232b-2: aam la sogs pa gang dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2663a:232b-3: yi ge nyi shu lnga rnams byang chub pa dang /
T02D2663a:232b-4: spyod pa dang kun du sangs rgyas pa dang mya
T02D2663a:232b-5: ngan las 'das pa bzhi re re la yi ge
T02D2663a:232b-6: nyi shu lnga lngar sbyar nas brgya par 'gyur te
T02D2663a:232b-7: / yi ge de rnams gcig tu bsdus pa ni aa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:232b-8: aa ni shes bya dang ye shes gnyis ka stong pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2663a:232b-9: klad kor ni stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663a:232b-10: yi ge aa bzhi char yang de'i nang du 'dus pas /
T02D2663a:232b-11: aam de nyid bcom ldan 'das kun du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yi ge brgya pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:232b-18: aam dang aa rnams ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dbang po pas 'dir yi ge mi bgrang /
T02D2663a:232b-19: 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la gzhigs nas zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2663a:232b-20: bstan pa gdon mi za bar dngos grub par bzhed nas /
T02D2663a:232b-21: bstan pa zhes pa'i tshig ni 'dul ba'i 'gro ba
T02D2663a:232b-22: rnams la bslab pa'i phyir bstan pa zhes bya ste
T02D2663a:232b-23: / mdo sde la sogs pa thams cad la yang bya mod kyi /
T02D2663a:232b-24: skabs 'dir ni sngags bstan pa la bya ste de yang bzlas pa'i grangs dang /
T02D2663a:232b-25: dus te des pa sngon du bstan pa byas nas
T02D2663a:232b-26: bsgrub par bya ba gong du bshad pa rnams bzlas
T02D2663a:232b-27: pa'i grangs sum 'bum la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub
T02D2663a:232b-28: bo zhes / yang bshad pa rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sems can rnams la yang gsungs kyi //
T02D2663a:232b-29: thams cad lam yin no zhes 'byung bas grangs dang
T02D2663a:232b-30: dus nges pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas kyang rgyud
T02D2663a:232b-31: ma dag pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi 'grub kyang
T02D2663a:232b-32: srid de de dag ni gdon mi za ba'o //
T02D2663a:232b-33: 'dir ni gnas yongs su 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma byung
T02D2663a:232b-34: gi bar du bzlas pa gsungs pas mtshan ma byung
T02D2663a:232b-36: mtshan ma de byung nas mi 'grub par mi srid pas gdon mi za ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:232b-37: bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de grub par bzhed nas
T02D2663a:232b-38: sngags kyi mgon po shin tu 'bar ba gsungs so
T02D2663a:232b-40: sngags thams cad kyi dbang po sngags kyi rgyal po
T02D2663a:232b-41: mgon po shin tu 'bar ba zhes pa ni kun
T02D2663a:232b-42: du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin aam zhes pa de
T02D2663a:233a-0: de'i rang bzhin kyang rnam pa gsum @233a * //
T02D2663a:233a-1: du rig par shes par bya ste /
T02D2663a:233a-2: chud pa'i mtshan nyid dang gzhung gi mtshan nyid de /
T02D2663a:233a-3: gzhung gi mtshan nyid la yang don dam pa dang
T02D2663a:233a-4: kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid de de ltar rnam pa
T02D2663a:233a-5: gsum mo // de la chud pa'i don dam pa'i
T02D2663a:233a-6: rang bzhin ni yi ge aa dang zhes pa dang
T02D2663a:233a-7: gsum mo // / de la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams so //
T02D2663a:233a-8: de la sngags thams cad kyi dngos po zhes pa
T02D2663a:233a-9: sngags thams cad ces pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur
T02D2663a:233a-10: gyur pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang
T02D2663a:233a-11: bzhin rnam par thar pa'i ye shes phyogs gcig pa
T02D2663a:233a-12: / chos thams cad pa dang zhes bral lo zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2663a:233a-13: kun rdzob tu de dag nyid kyi skur snang ba dang /
T02D2663a:233a-14: gzhug gi chos su yi ge aam la sogs pa ni sngags thams cad de /
T02D2663a:233a-15: de dag gi dbang po ni bcom ldan 'das kun
T02D2663a:233a-16: du sangs rgyas pa'i yi ge brgya pa ste phyogs
T02D2663a:233a-18: kun rdzob tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las sngags phal gyi gzugs rnams 'byung /
T02D2663a:233a-19: gzhung gi chos kyang yi ge aam la sogs pa ni yi ge thams cad 'byung ste /
T02D2663a:233a-20: kun rdzob dang don dam pa kun du yang sngags
T02D2663a:233a-21: thams cad der gtogs shing ge'i dbang gis gyur pas
T02D2663a:233a-22: na aam de sngags thams cad kyi dbang po zhes
T02D2663a:233a-23: pa'o // sngags kyi rgyal po zhes pa ni kun
T02D2663a:233a-24: rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kar yang sngags phal
T02D2663a:233a-25: las yon tan thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663a:233a-26: pa'o // // sngags kyi mgon po zhes pa ni skyabs zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2663a:233a-27: sngags thams cad kyi gong du bshad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2663a:233a-28: de las byung zhing der 'du ba'i phyir shin tu
T02D2663a:233a-29: 'bar ba zhes pa ni mthu phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2663a:233a-30: bstan pa ste / mthu chen dang ldan zhes pa
T02D2663a:233a-31: ste de lta bu'i snying po 'jam pa'i tshig gi
T02D2663a:233a-32: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa zhes pa dang sbyar
T02D2663a:233a-33: bstan pa ste / te / phyag na rdo rje yang ci 'dra zhig ce na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:233a-34: sa ma ya ni gsum pa gnas dang lam gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:233a-35: dam tshig gsum pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663a:233a-36: kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mi zad pa'i rdo
T02D2663a:233a-38: rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa
T02D2663a:233a-39: bcu yongs su rdzogs te ye shes chen po dang
T02D2663a:233a-40: ldan pa'i dbang bskur ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663a:233b-0: sku las 'od zer btang ba'i byin gyi rlabs @233b
T02D2663a:233b-1: kyis sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2663a:233b-2: rgyan te / gsum pa mthong ba la zhugs pa ni dam tshig gsum la gnas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:233b-3: lam gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed ces pa ste /
T02D2663a:233b-4: dam tshig gsum thob par byed pa'i lam phyag na rdo rje thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2663a:233b-5: sngags kyi mgon po zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2663a:233b-6: de'i ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:233b-7: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs nas /
T02D2663a:233b-8: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes dam pa thams
T02D2663a:233b-9: cad thog ma nas ma byung ma skyes ba ste
T02D2663a:233b-10: / mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge 'chad pas
T02D2663a:233b-11: ting nge 'dzin gyi ming ye shes dam pa zhes
T02D2663a:233b-12: / bya'o // de bas na yi ge aam de khyad par gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:233b-13: rnam pa mang po'i ye shes 'byung //
T02D2663a:233b-14: zhes pa ste rnam pa mang po'i ye shes ni chung pa'i chos dang /
T02D2663a:233b-15: gzhung gi chos rnam pa mang po kun rdzob dang
T02D2663a:233b-16: don dam pa'i tshul gnyis kar mkhyen pa la bya
T02D2663a:233b-17: ste / de lta bu'i ye shes yi ge aam
T02D2663a:233b-18: zhes pa'i yi ge 'di las ye shes de 'byung
T02D2663a:233b-19: ste / ba la bya'o // 'od zer brgyas khyab pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:233b-20: don dam par yang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes
T02D2663a:233b-21: rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba de las sngags gzhan pa'i
T02D2663a:233b-22: ye shes phyogs gcig pa rnams 'byung ba dang /
T02D2663a:233b-23: kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las sngags
T02D2663a:233b-24: kyi sku mang po 'byung bas khams gsum kun du
T02D2663a:233b-25: khyab pa dang / gzhung gi chos su yang yi
T02D2663a:233b-26: ge aa las gong du 'chad pa'i tshul gyis yi
T02D2663a:233b-27: ge brgya rnams 'byung zhing sngags thams cad du khyab
T02D2663a:233b-28: khyab pa dang / pa'i phyir ro // phyag na
T02D2663a:233b-29: rdo rje 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi sngags kyi
T02D2663a:233b-30: mgon po shin tu 'bar ba zhes pa ni gong
T02D2663a:233b-31: du bshad pa'i tshul bzhin no //
T02D2663a:233b-32: 'di ni kun du sangs rgyas pa nyid do zhes
T02D2663a:233b-33: pa ni ye ge aam zhes pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2663a:233b-34: 'das kun du sangs rgyas pa'i phung po lhag ma
T02D2663a:233b-35: dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663a:233b-37: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces pa ni chud
T02D2663a:233b-38: pa'i chos dang gzhung gi chos thams cad mkhyen pas
T02D2663a:233b-39: na chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:233b-40: thub pa zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yod
T02D2663a:233b-41: gsum thub pa'i mtshan nyid de sh'a kya thub pa
T02D2663a:233b-42: nyid la bya'o // mi shes pa'i mun pa thams
T02D2663a:233b-43: cad med par byed pas nyi ma shar ba bzhin
T02D2663a:233b-44: no zhes pa ni chud pa'i chos dang /
T02D2663a:234a-0: @234a * // gzhung gi chos gnyis ka la sgrib pa spangs te /
T02D2663a:234a-1: ji ltar chud pa na 'dug pa'i rdzas rnams dngos
T02D2663a:234a-2: po gang yin mi shes pa nyi ma shar ba
T02D2663a:234a-3: na rdzas dag gsal bar mthong ba bzhin du thams
T02D2663a:234a-4: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des kyang ma rig pa'i
T02D2663a:234a-5: mun pa bsal nas kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
T02D2663a:234a-6: dngos po rnams gsal bar mkhyen pa ste /
T02D2663a:234a-7: des ni spong pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:234a-8: tshig gong mas ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663a:234a-9: bdag nyid kyang 'di ltar thub pa chen por byin
T02D2663a:234a-10: gyis brlabs pa ste zhes pa ni kun du sangs
T02D2663a:234a-11: rgyas pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
T02D2663a:234a-12: bzhin de nyid sh'akya thug pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663a:234a-13: te zhes pa'o // de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas kyang ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:234a-14: rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa ste //
T02D2663a:234a-15: sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir //
T02D2663a:234a-16: zhes pa ste sh'akya thub pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams kyi don du /
T02D2663a:234a-17: rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs sprul //
T02D2663a:234a-19: rnam par sprul pa de yang ji snyed du sprul zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2663a:234a-20: ji snyed sems can rnams kyi ni //
T02D2663a:234a-21: sems su mngon par gyur rnams te //
T02D2663a:234a-22: de snyed du ni de byas pa //
T02D2663a:234a-23: rnam par sprul pa gnas mchog go //
T02D2663a:234a-25: sems can ji snyed du 'jug cing ji snyid 'dod
T02D2663a:234a-26: pa de snyed kyi sku rnams su rnam par sprul
T02D2663a:234a-28: de ni stong pa nyid las ldang par bstan pa ste /
T02D2663a:234a-29: de lta bas na don dam pa bstan pa stong pa nyid yi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
T02D2663a:234a-30: phyis kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas pa'i sku la sogs par bsgyur pa'i spyod pa rnams bya'o zhes dgongs so//
T02D2663a:234a-31: de lta bas na kun du sangs rgyas pa'i gnas 'dod nas /
T02D2663a:234a-32: rtag tu nan tan mngon bya ba //
T02D2663a:234a-33: bdag gi nang nyid dag pas so //
T02D2663a:234a-34: zhes pa ni sdud pa'i tshig ste kun dus sangs
T02D2663a:234a-35: rgyas pa'i rang bzhin de lta bus na gang kun
T02D2663a:234a-36: du sangs rgyas pa'i sku thob par 'dod pas /
T02D2663a:234a-37: yi ge brgya pa'i rang bzhin du kun du sangs
T02D2663a:234a-38: rgyas pa'i sku bsgom pa la brtson par bya'o zhes
T02D2663a:234a-39: pa ste / de lta bas na kun du yang
T02D2663a:234a-40: zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid kun gyi
T02D2663a:234a-42: rtag tu zhes pa ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D2663a:234a-43: bdag gi nang nyid dag pas so //
T02D2663a:234a-44: zhes pa ni sems gtso bor bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:234b-0: bdag gi lta bas bcom ldan @234b 'das kyi skur bsgyur ba tsam gyis chog pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:234b-1: nang gi sems kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas nan tan mngon par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:234b-2: yi ge brgya pa'i rang bzhin gsum la chud pa'i
T02D2663a:234b-3: rang bzhin don dam pa de bzhin nyid kyi ye
T02D2663a:234b-4: shes dang kun rdzob tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i
T02D2663a:234b-5: rang bzhin yi ge aam don du lta /
T02D2663a:234b-6: yi ge aam gi tshig gi rang bzhin du blta ste /
T02D2663a:234b-7: de la yi ge aam kun sangs rgyas pa'i rang
T02D2663a:234b-8: bzhin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi rgyan
T02D2663a:234b-9: sna tshogs su 'byung ba'i sdud pa'i sgor gyur pa
T02D2663a:234b-10: ste / de yang 'di ltar don dang tshig gi bye brag rang bzhin gsum du dbye mod kyi /
T02D2663a:234b-11: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i sgo tha mi dad de /
T02D2663a:234b-12: gang gis bya ba'i las kyang gzugs dang sems kyis
T02D2663a:234b-13: byed pa'i gzugs kyis bya ba'i las kyang ngag dang
T02D2663a:234b-14: sems kyis bya ba'i las kyang lus dang ngag gis
T02D2663a:234b-15: byed / de bas na skabs 'dir kun dus sangs rgyas pa'i gsung mi zad pa de /
T02D2663a:234b-16: yi ge brgya ba'i 'bras bu'i sbyor ba ston te /
T02D2663a:234b-17: de las kun du sangs rgyas pa'i yi ge'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D2663a:234b-18: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
T02D2663a:234b-19: ma smin pa rnams yongs su grol ba dang smin par byed pa ste /
T02D2663a:234b-20: de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D2663a:234b-21: phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po la bka'
T02D2663a:234b-22: stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663a:234b-23: de la gsang ba'i bdag po nam sangs rgyas bcom
T02D2663a:234b-24: ldan 'das rnams zhes pa nas dam tshig gsum la
T02D2663a:234b-25: bdag nyid gnas par mthong zhes pa'i bar du kun
T02D2663a:234b-26: du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:234b-27: sa bcus yongs su phyug pa rnams rang rang gi
T02D2663a:234b-28: mthu dang spyod yul yi rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang
T02D2663a:234b-29: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i mthus mgu zhing 'khod pa la /
T02D2663a:234b-30: bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i sku las
T02D2663a:234b-31: dpal gyi cho ga'i rgyan gyi 'od zer byung bas
T02D2663a:234b-32: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi gtsug tu phog
T02D2663a:234b-33: ste / 'od zer de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang
T02D2663a:234b-34: chub sems dpa' de rnams ye shes chen por mngon
T02D2663a:234b-35: par shes par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pas rab
T02D2663a:234b-36: ste / tu thob ste / de'i tshe byang chub
T02D2663a:234b-37: sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi lus
T02D2663a:234b-38: dang ngag yid mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan /
T02D2663a:234b-39: dam tshig gsum gyi rang bzhin chud cing mngon par gyur ces pa'o //
T02D2663a:235a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni skabs 'dir sa
T02D2663a:235a-2: bcu la gnas yongs su rdzogs shing dbang bcu la
T02D2663a:235a-4: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rnam pa thams cad
T02D2663a:235a-5: chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams nyid la
T02D2663a:235a-7: ye shes chen po zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la bya ste /
T02D2663a:235a-8: ye shes de byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2663a:235a-9: 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba las ye shes chen por mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663a:235a-10: yang na ye shes chen po yang de mngon par shes pa yang de ste /
T02D2663a:235a-11: ye shes chen po ni snga ma bzhin te don dam par chos thams cad stong par chud pa'o //
T02D2663a:235a-12: mngon par shes pa drug ni mngon par shes pa ste kun rdzob kyi ye shes so //
T02D2663a:235a-13: de ltar don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye
T02D2663a:235a-14: shes de byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis thob
T02D2663a:235a-16: dbang bskur ba ni ye shes chen po mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2663a:235a-17: dbang bskur ba de dang ldan pa ni dbang bskur
T02D2663a:235a-18: ba dang ldan pa'i sa rab tu thob po zhes
T02D2663a:235a-19: bya ba ste zhes pa ni sems kyi khyad par
T02D2663a:235a-20: nyid la bya'o // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2663a:235a-21: 'das de dag ces pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:235a-22: de dag nyid la bya'o// dam tshig gsum zhes pa
T02D2663a:235a-23: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lus dang ngag yid mi
T02D2663a:235a-24: zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi khas gsum thams cad
T02D2663a:235a-25: du khyab pa la bya ste /
T02D2663a:235a-26: dam tshig ces pa ni tshig gi don ni skabs
T02D2663a:235a-27: 'dir kun du chud pa'am thob pa la bya ste
T02D2663a:235a-28: / sku mi zad pa'i rgyan la sogs pa khams
T02D2663a:235a-29: gsum du khyab par 'byung ba byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:235a-30: de rnams kyis de'i tshe mthong zhing ye shes kyis
T02D2663a:235a-32: lam zhes pa ni tshig de dag chud par zhugs pa la bya /
T02D2663a:235a-33: bdag nyid gnas par mthong ngo zhes pa ni bcom
T02D2663a:235a-34: ldan 'das kyi spyod yul dam tshig gsum gyi rang
T02D2663a:235a-35: bzhin la bya / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
T02D2663a:235a-36: kyang spyod yul du gyur te mthong zhing chud par
T02D2663a:235a-37: bdag cag nyid kyis mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:235a-38: de bas na gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das de zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:235a-39: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba mngon du ston pa'o zhes
T02D2663a:235a-40: pa'i bar dus bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:235a-41: dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bya ba de rnams kyi dam
T02D2663a:235a-42: tshig gsum la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe na
T02D2663a:235b-0: / @235b sangs rgyas kyi gsung sna tshogs su sdud
T02D2663a:235b-1: pa'i sgor gyur pa'i yi ge brgya pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663a:235b-2: bcom ldan 'das kun du sangs rgyas pa gzungs kyi
T02D2663a:235b-4: sangs rgyas pa zhes ya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663a:235b-5: de rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba nye bar
T02D2663a:235b-6: ston pa ste / gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan
T02D2663a:235b-7: 'das zhes pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa nyid
T02D2663a:235b-8: ston pa ste / la bya'o // ye shes chen
T02D2663a:235b-9: po mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes
T02D2663a:235b-10: pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa de nyid kyi
T02D2663a:235b-11: bye brag la bya ste ye shes chen po ni
T02D2663a:235b-13: mngon par shes ba zhes pa ni ye shes chen po de mngon du chud pa zhes pa'o//
T02D2663a:235b-14: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:235b-15: ye shes chen po de mngon par chud par ldan pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:235b-16: gzud kyi gzungs zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:235b-17: don gyi gzungs dang tshig gi gzungs de rnam par
T02D2663a:235b-18: mi rtog par 'jug pa'i dbang dang gzungs la sogs
T02D2663a:235b-19: pa ste / bcom ldan 'das kun du sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:235b-20: pa'i ye shes chen po mngon par chud pa'i dbang
T02D2663a:235b-21: dang ldan pa de nyid gzungs su gyur nas /
T02D2663a:235b-22: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba sems can yongs su smin
T02D2663a:235b-23: pa dang grol bar gyur pa'i thabs sna tshogs byang
T02D2663a:235b-24: chub sems dpa' de rnams la ston te /
T02D2663a:235b-26: sangs rgyas bya ba mngon par ston //
T02D2663a:235b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de nyid //
T02D2663a:235b-30: dam tshig gsum gyi lam ston par //
T02D2663a:235b-31: so sor nye bar gnas par gyur //
T02D2663a:235b-32: zhes pa ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kun du
T02D2663a:235b-33: sangs rgyas pa de byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
T02D2663a:235b-34: zhes pa bya ba de rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663a:235b-36: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang rang gi dam
T02D2663a:235b-37: tshig gsum pa rang bzhin ji ltar mthong zhing chud
T02D2663a:235b-38: pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2663a:235b-39: dam tshig gsum po de rnams kyi lam ston par
T02D2663a:235b-41: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid
T02D2663a:235b-42: ces pa ni gong du smos pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663a:235b-43: dpa' de dag nyid la bya'o //
T02D2663a:235b-44: sems can thams cad ces pa ni yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D2663a:235b-45: ma dag pa'i sems can ji ltar snod du gyur pa rnams so //
T02D2663a:235b-46: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2663a:236a-0: dam tshig gsum gyi lam zhes nga ni sku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan @236a * //
T02D2663a:236a-1: la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ba'i lam de ston
T02D2663a:236a-2: par rab tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2663a:236a-3: pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ji
T02D2663a:236a-4: ltar snod du gyur pa'i sems can rnams la dam
T02D2663a:236a-5: tshig gsum thob par byed pa'i lam de so sor
T02D2663a:236a-7: lam de bstan pas sems can de rnams kyi sku
T02D2663a:236a-8: mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dam tshig gsum
T02D2663a:236a-9: gyi rang bzhin te thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
T02D2663a:236a-10: // gsang ba'i bdag po nga'i ngag gi 'khor lo zhes pa nas /
T02D2663a:236a-11: rab tu byung bar mi shes so //
T02D2663a:236a-12: zhes pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dag gi
T02D2663a:236a-13: 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyi rgyan sna tshogs
T02D2663a:236a-14: las sh'akya thub pa'i skur sprul te /
T02D2663a:236a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par yongs
T02D2663a:236a-16: su smin pa dang ma smin pa'i sems can ji
T02D2663a:236a-17: ltar snod du gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663a:236a-18: bya ba byed par 'gyur ba bshad pa ste /
T02D2663a:236a-19: gsang ba'i bdag po ngag gi 'khor lo zhes pa
T02D2663a:236a-20: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam
T02D2663a:236a-22: sems can rnams kyi rgyud du grol bas na 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2663a:236a-23: 'khor lo de nyid 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul pa rgya chen po zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:236a-24: ngag gi 'khor lo de las sh'akya thub pa'i skur
T02D2663a:236a-25: sprul pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i
T02D2663a:236a-26: dbyings ma lus pa de snyed du khyab pa sangs
T02D2663a:236a-27: rgyas kyi bya ba ston pas na rgya chen po
T02D2663a:236a-28: zhes bya'o // mtha' yas ba'i 'jig rten du khyab pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:236a-29: chos kyi dbyings rab tu ston pa zhes pa dang 'brel pa ste /
T02D2663a:236a-30: sprul pa'i sku ste chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig dang
T02D2663a:236a-31: don rnams 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab par sems
T02D2663a:236a-32: can thams cad la ston pa ste /
T02D2663a:236a-33: de yang rnam par dag pa'i sgo sha stag go //
T02D2663a:236a-34: rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes pa ni chos kyi
T02D2663a:236a-35: dbyings rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa'i thabs zhes
T02D2663a:236a-36: bya'o // sems can thams cad ji lta bur bsams
T02D2663a:236a-37: pa bzhin mgu bar byed pa chos kyi dbyings rab
T02D2663a:236a-38: tu ston pa'i sgo mo zhes pa ni de lta
T02D2663a:236a-39: bur chos thams cad ston pa de yang sems can
T02D2663a:236a-40: rnams so so'i dad pa dang rjes su mthun pa
T02D2663a:236a-41: bya'o // ste / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba la sangs rgyas kyi chos ston /
T02D2663a:236a-42: de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
T02D2663a:236b-0: brgya byin dang tshangs pa @236b la sogs pa so sor bstan pa dang /
T02D2663a:236b-1: rjes su mthun pa'i chos thams cad du ston te
T02D2663a:236b-2: de yang chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa'i thabs sha
T02D2663a:236b-4: sh'akya thub pas nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas pa ma
T02D2663a:236b-5: lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:236b-6: de lta bu'i chos ston pa dang /
T02D2663a:236b-7: sh'akya thub pa'i sku gcig gam gnyis ma yin gyi /
T02D2663a:236b-8: nam mkha'i khams rgyas par ji snyed pa de snyed
T02D2663a:236b-9: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par khyab pa'i
T02D2663a:236b-10: sh'akya thub pa'i skus sems can thams cad la ji
T02D2663a:236b-11: ltar bsams pa bzhin du mgu bar byed pa'i chos
T02D2663a:236b-12: kyi dbyings rab tu ston zhes pa'o //
T02D2663a:236b-13: de bas na gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rab tu zhugs pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:236b-14: sh'akya thub pa'i sku de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2663a:236b-15: de snyed du sems can de ltar snod du gyur
T02D2663a:236b-16: pa rnams ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par
T02D2663a:236b-17: byed / smin pa rnams ni grol par byed pa'i
T02D2663a:236b-18: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba rab tu zhugs zhes pa'o
T02D2663a:236b-19: byed / // sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa
T02D2663a:236b-20: sh'akya thub pa'i sku de rnams sangs rgyas kyi dbyings
T02D2663a:236b-21: su mang po'i rgyan gyi snying po las 'byung ba
T02D2663a:236b-22: byed / // / bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag gi
T02D2663a:236b-23: 'khor lo las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su
T02D2663a:236b-24: ni sems can rnams kyis mi shes kyi /
T02D2663a:236b-25: sh'akya'i rigs kyi rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rigs 'di
T02D2663a:236b-26: ltar gyur to zhes 'dzin te de'i phyir gsungs pa
T02D2663a:236b-27: / gsang ba'i bdag po sems can rnams kyis ni
T02D2663a:236b-28: zhes pa la sogs pa 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi
T02D2663a:236b-29: khams mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho'i sgo nas zhes pa
T02D2663a:236b-31: de ltar ngag gi 'khor lo las sprul pa'i sku
T02D2663a:236b-32: rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab
T02D2663a:236b-33: par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i sh'akya thub
T02D2663a:236b-35: sems can rnams kyis sprul pa de dag gi 'khor
T02D2663a:236b-36: lo las byung bar mi shes mod kyi 'on kyang
T02D2663a:236b-37: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa las byung ba'i byang
T02D2663a:236b-38: chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mngon par chud par
T02D2663a:236b-39: byed pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa
T02D2663a:236b-40: nas byung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi
T02D2663a:236b-41: gzhi snying po rgyan gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T02D2663a:236b-42: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
T02D2663a:237a-0: byang chub kyi snying po mngon par sgrub @237a * //
T02D2663a:237a-2: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
T02D2663a:237a-3: la sogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
T02D2663a:237a-4: kyi rang rang gi mthu 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi
T02D2663a:237a-5: / nga'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed
T02D2663a:237a-6: pa la sogs pa de rnams byed do zhes pa
T02D2663a:237a-7: / ste / de lta bur mdzad pa yang sh'akya
T02D2663a:237a-8: thub pa'i sku nyid mod kyi 'dul ba'i 'gro ba
T02D2663a:237a-9: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag
T02D2663a:237a-10: pa de dag gis ni sh'akya thub pa'i sku yang
T02D2663a:237a-11: rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02D2663a:237a-12: de bas na skabs mtha' ma 'di ni rdzogs longs
T02D2663a:237a-13: spyod pa'i skus byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi
T02D2663a:237a-14: don mdzad par bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663a:237a-15: de dag gi bsdus pa'i don du tshig gi don la 'on kyang zhes pa ni /
T02D2663a:237a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sems can rnams la
T02D2663a:237a-17: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba bstan pa de sh'akya thub
T02D2663a:237a-18: pa'i sku 'jig rten pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663a:237a-19: pa'i sprul par mi shes mod kyi /

T02D2663a:237a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams mkha' yas rgya mtsho'i sgo nas

T02D2663a:237b-0: me tog gi gzhi zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams de me tog @237b gis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2663a:237b-1: snying po zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i gnas so //

T02D2663a:237b-4: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bur skye bar 'gyur te /

T02D2663a:237b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes yongs su spyod ngo zhes

T02D2663a:238a-18: de ltar sems tshad med pa thob pas /

T02D2663a:238a-25: lus ji snyed pa de dag gi ye shes su

T02D2663a:238a-29: de dag tshad med pas sems can tshad med pa'o //

T02D2663a:238a-32: khams ji snyed pa sems can gyi khams kyang de

T02D2663a:238a-42: // thob nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2663a:238a-43: rgyas par 'gyur te zhes pa ni de ltar de

T02D2663a:238b-2: pa phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa mya ngan
T02D2663a:238b-3: las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gnas thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2663a:238b-4: // / zhes pa'o // stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan
T02D2663a:238b-5: par bdud bzhi rab tu 'dul ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663a:238b-6: // / zhes pa'o // / kun du sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi bye brag ste /
T02D2663a:238b-7: gzhung las ji skad grags pa'o //
T02D2663a:238b-8: chos kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2663a:238b-9: zhes pa ni ji ltar seng ge'i sgras byol song
T02D2663a:238b-10: thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba bzhin du

T02D2663a:238b-16: 'di dag thams cad dpa' bo dag gis /

T02D2663a:238b-20: thob nas kun du sangs rgyas pa'i gnas dam pa

T02D2663a:238b-26: snying po yi ge brgya pa de bzlas shing bsgoms
T02D2663a:238b-28: yi ge brgya pa'i 'bras bu'i sbyor ba rnams gsum

T02D2663a:239a-10: le'u 'dir ni yongs su ma dag pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa ste /
T02D2663a:239a-11: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras

T02D2663a:239a-18: rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D2663a:239a-20: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi mgon po

T02D2663a:239a-23: du bshad pa de yon tan dang mthu che pas

T02D2663a:239a-28: gang gis ji ltar rig par bgyi //
T02D2663a:239a-29: thub pa chen po gnas na gang //

T02D2663a:239a-31: gang gis zhes pa ni bsgrub cing 'dra bas shes par bgyi zhes pa ste /
T02D2663a:239a-32: theg chen du ni dbang bskur zhes pa la sogs
T02D2663a:239a-33: pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid 'og nas bshad pa dang
T02D2663a:239a-34: sbyar ro // ji ltar zhes pa ni snying po
T02D2663a:239a-35: ci 'dra bar rig par bgyi zhes pa ni ste

T02D2663a:239b-27: shin tu ngo mtshar zhes pa ni //
T02D2663a:239b-28: sems kyis yi ge 'bru bsam pa las kun du

T02D2663a:239b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang mchog ces pa ni snying po de'i don dang /

T02D2663a:239b-33: can rnams kyi rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663a:239b-34: sgo nas brtag pa mi rtog pas /

T02D2663a:240a-5: 'khor du dbang bskur ba des snying po 'di shes
